description: From the creators of the very popular Greek games, Eureka and Become rich, another general knowledge quiz game. Το παιχνίδι των Γνώσεων - Κουίζ Γνώσεων στα Ελληνικά. Από τους δημιουργούς των αγαπημένων σας παιχνιδιών, Εκατομμυριούχος, Εύρηκα, Κρεμάλα και τα Σταυρόλεξα, ήρθε το νέο μας εκπαιδευτικό και διασκεδαστικό παιχνίδι! Είναι το απόλυτο παιχνίδι γνώσεων (trivia game) γιατί περιλαμβάνει πάνω από 3.500 ερωτήσεις που έχουν δημιουργηθεί από την ομάδα των συνεργαζόμενων με την εταιρεία μας εκπαιδευτικών. Ο τρόπος παιχνιδιού είναι πολύ απλός: Διαλέγετε μια κατηγορία ερωτήσεων στην οποία θέλετε να παίξετε ή όλες τις κατηγορίες μαζί. Προσπαθήστε να απαντήσετε σωστά σε όσες περισσότερες ερωτήσεις μπορείτε ώστε να συγκεντρώσετε περισσότερους πόντους. Μπορείτε να κάνετε ως τρία λάθη χωρίς να χάσετε αφού έχετε τρεις ζωές στη διάθεσή σας. Εάν απαντήσετε σωστά σε 5 ερωτήσεις στη σειρά κερδίζετε μία επιπλέον ζωή. Δεν μπορείτε όμως να έχετε πάνω από τρεις ζωές στη διάθεσή σας. Το παιχνίδι προσφέρει: ✓ Πάνω από 3500 ερωτήσεις πολλαπλής επιλογής κατάλληλα επιλεγμένες για τον διασκεδαστικό αλλά και επιμορφωτικό τους χαρακτήρα. ✓ 10 κατηγορίες ερωτήσεων ✓ Καταγραφή των υψηλότερων σκορ ✓ Online Score ✓ Όμορφα γραφικά ✓ Πολύ μικρό μέγεθος, μόλις 2,5Mb ✓ Υποστηρίζει όλα τα κινητά και tablet PCs με λειτουργικό σύστημα android. ✓ Είναι σχεδιασμένο σε συνεργασία με πολύ έμπειρους εκπαιδευτικούς ✓ Απολύτως δωρεάν Καλή διασκέδαση!

description: This is THE ultimate app for curing your insomnia (sleeplessness) and it's absolutely FREE. It's packed with useful content and includes: - 14 articles about the most common causes, signs, symptoms and treatments for insomnia based on medical research papers and my own experience. - 15 full-length PREMIUM sleep inducing tracks (relaxing music with nature sounds and binaural beats). - 'Sleep Loss' eBook in PDF format - Daily news and articles about insomnia from various media, such as blogs, videos, discussion forums and books. Insomnia is a very common sleep problem and it is often thought of as both a sign and a symptom. It can cause daytime sleepiness and a lack of energy. It also can make you feel anxious, depressed, or irritable . You may have trouble focusing on tasks, paying attention, learning, and remembering. These problems can prevent you from doing your best at work or school. However, when there are no serious underlying health causes involved, insomnia can be treated quite quickly and effectively with some simple changes in the person's lifestyle. All you need to know about curing your insomnia is right here. Enjoy the app and please leave a rating, feedback or suggestions for improvement. You can also e-mail me anytime - I always reply in 24 hours! All the best and thank you! :)

description: Загадки - это великая сокровищница человеческой мысли. Они собрали в себе мудрость и тягу к знаниям. Не случайно в сказках герои так часто загадывают загадки. Мудрость была в почете всегда(загадки). Особенно это видно в русских народных сказках. Попробуйте проверить свою догадливость и сообразительность отгадывая загадки. Попробуйте поиграть с детьми в "угадалки". 100 Загадок - игра на русском языке для детей. В древнейших загадках отражалась первобытная мифическая символизация; поэтический образ служил здесь отчасти для описания, отчасти для объяснения явлений природы и окружающей среды(загадки). С течением времени это значение загадок утратилось; осталась лишь её иносказательная аллегорическая форма, уцелел её сильный, образный язык, и народ стал смотреть на загадки, как на простое упражнение ума. В древности загадкам приписывалось особое таинственное значение: в народном эпосе она является одним из видов так называемого «Божьего суда»: отгадывание загадки ведёт к исполнению желаний, освобождает от опасности . Загадывание и отгадывание загадки, состязание в загадках составляет весьма распространённый мотив народного эпоса и создавшейся под его влиянием книжной литературы. Русские и другие славянские песни с загадками в общем примыкают к циклу сказаний о «мудрой девице» и клонятся к доказательству того, что невеста не глупее жениха. В игре собраны сто загадок, доступ к которым получается последовательно от первой загадки ко второй и так далее. Вы всегда можете вернуться к любой разгаданной загадке и разгадать её ещё раз. Debia создаёт лучшие детские игры про загадки на русском языке для детей. Новая игра от создателей "100 Ребусов" и "Составь Слова" - загадки. Puzzles - this is a great treasury of human thought. They collected the wisdom and desire for knowledge. Not by chance in fairy tales characters so often guessing riddles. Wisdom was always held in high esteem (puzzles). This is especially evident in the Russian folk tales. Try to check their shrewdness and intelligence guessing riddles. Try playing with the children in "Ugadalka." 100 Puzzles - a game in Russian for children. In ancient mysteries reflected primitive mythical symbolization; poetic image served here partly to describe, in part to explain the phenomena of nature and the environment (puzzles). Over time, this value was lost mysteries; it was only allegorical allegorical form, survived her strong, figurative language, and the people began to look at the puzzle, as a simple exercise of the mind. In ancient times, mysterious riddles attributed particular importance: it is in the national epic is a type of so-called "God's judgment": guessing the riddle leads to the fulfillment of desires, free from danger. Guessing and guessing riddles, enigmas in the contest is a very common motif of the national epic and created under the influence of his book literature. Russian and other Slavic songs with riddles generally adjacent to the cycle of tales about the "wise girl" and tends to prove that the bride groom are not stupid. The game contains a hundred puzzles to which access is obtained sequentially from the first to the second puzzle and so on. You can always go back to any unravel the mystery and solve it again. Debia creates the best children's game about puzzles in Russian for children. A new game from the creators of "100 Rebus" and "Make a Word" - puzzles.

description: *** Ranked in top 50 Learning Apps by news.com.au *** *** Rated "Exceptional" by App User Magazine *** Colorful characters teach your child their lowercase letters and alphabet song in a magical way! Does your child love to tickle bunnies or chomp on cookies? This app lets your child do both! Transform “d” into a dog that barks, or turn the letter “i” into an ice cream cone, then add the cherry! Hear silly sounds, poke objects, and sing along! Your child will squeal with laughter while playing with the letters in “abc Wow!” The “abc Wow!” app makes innovations on early learning and child development using letter to object recognition. Designed with a kindergarten teacher’s guidance, “abc Wow!” teaches the lowercase letters--the letters most used for reading and writing. Objects shaped like their beginning letter magically appear, making a natural and intuitive bond between the letter shape, name, and usage. Fun music, vibrant artwork, captivating sound effects, and delightful animations make gameplay irresistible. This interactive app makes learning fun for all children learning their letters and sounds. description: 'Lock Screen App' can lock your device easily. ## ↓↓Scroll down↓↓ to read Notes on Uninstall. ## Do you feel inconvenient to lock your device using the power button? Are your afraid of wearing out the power button? (My n1 was repaired coz of that :< ) 'Lock Screen App' is a tiny app that can help you lock easily (without power button). Features : •Lock device with one touch (Same effect as pressing the power button) •Not a widget so it does not run as service in the background •Auto-kill itself after locking to save your Battery & Memory •Tiny in size (<100k) Features (Donation Version Only): •Little bit faster •Lock by long-pressing search button **not work on xpad/apad and device without search key** •Get updates earlier ★★ Please buy the donation version to support the dev! ★★ (You could find it using 'View more applications'/ the link in the app's settings page) Thank you! :D Notes: ====== @@Compatibility Issues@@ ------------------------------------ 1.New / Updated Moto devices may not be supported Moto disallows lock screen in their OS updates, so it would not work on moto devices after updates and new device like Droid 3. I have reported it to moto, but they did not agree to fix! 2. For device running Android 4.X, sometimes flashing (screen on then off again) may happen, try to enable 'Force Lock' in Lock Screen Settings to fix it. 3.It has been tested to work on Galaxy Nexus and Android Simulators (2.2,2.3, 4.0.2, 4.0.4, 4.1, 4.2 & 4.3) However, the dev cannot guarantee that it could run / uninstall on all devices [coz I don't have all the devices]. If you encounter problem with you device, feel free to drop me an email! ### How to uninstall? ### ------------------------------------ Locking Screen in Android requires the user of device administration function, you must deactivate device administration *BEFORE* uninstall to avoid error! To do this: •Go to "Lock Screen Settings" (in launcher) -> "Remove Device Administrator" ~See screenshots~ Alternatively, you may do it via •Go to Settings -> Location & security (or Security) -> Select device administrators -> Uncheck this app. After that, uninstall it in Play Store, in case of error during uninstall in Play Store, do it at Settings->Apps->Lock Screen-->Uninstall [To use other hardware keys to unlock your device, try 'Widget Locker' / 'No Lock' app (not developed by me)]
release_text: •Add "Force Lock" option in settings (Enable "Force Lock" if your device turns on after locking.) •Better support for devices running Android 4.1.X and 4.2.X (If you use it every day/like this app, please buy the donate version/rate ★★★★★ ^_^) Notes: 1.Read the app description / screenshots if you encounter problem during uninstall 2.For device running Android 4.X, sometimes flashing (screen on then off again) may happen, try fix it by enabling 'Force Lock' in Lock Screen Settings.

description: Ever wondered about the history hidden behind the streets you walk every day? Chemistry is everywhere, you just need to know where and what to look for. Find out more about hundreds of places and explore the history of chemistry around you. Places of Chemistry is a free app by the Royal Society of Chemistry which enables you to discover the location and story behind famous chemistry landmarks. Where was penicillin discovered? Where was Michael Faraday an apprentice? Who was the first company to supply London with Gas? Use this easy and informative tool to find out more and plan your visit to key chemistry heritage locations. Places of Chemistry is the perfect travel companion for those interested in finding out more about the history hidden in the places around them. Stepping into history you’ll be able to explore the chemistry that surrounds us finding out where scientists were born, lived, died and where they made ground breaking discoveries and navigate your way around 400 years of chemical history. The Royal Society of Chemistry is world’s leading chemistry community. Supported by a worldwide network of members and an international publishing business, our activities span education, conferences, science policy and the promotion of chemistry to the public. Key feature: * Information and photos for each entry * Audio guides for selected entries * Hundreds of images, including precious historical documents * View images in portrait or landscape orientation * Maps integration for finding your way to locations of historical importance * Find places near you * Search the content for location, scientist’s name and their discoveries * Explore the entries on the map * Listen to audio guide whilst accessing the photos for the location * Save your favourite entries * Suggest new locations * Share your favourite locations with friends via email, Facebook and Twitter  * Swipe up and down and side to side to view pages * Currently includes locations based in London and the UK * Enjoy the app even from the comfort of your home
release_text: Initial Release.

description: Hardcore straight-forward learning method of Multiplication through TABLES and FACTORS (includes prime factors too). Presents you with a list of tables (1 to 99) to choose from. Move through the tables by casually swiping the screen to the left or right. Click on any line in the table to load the factors of all the numbers in the line (makes it easy to remember) Choose 'Endless Table' mode to continuously keep increasing the table range till 999. No more need to remember an infinite number of tricks to multiply two numbers. Just practice with this and you'll remember them forever. This version is for devices running Android Version >= 2.1 If your device run's on Android Ver < 2.1 then search for 'Maths Multiplication Legacy' or 'com.felix.legacy.multiplication' in the Android Market. ####Features#### 1. Open “Multiplication Tables” from the home screen to view the tables of a number from 1 to 20 (Try ‘Endless Mode’ in Settings). Click on any item to open it's quick factor info. Long click for loading the table, factors or Grid of all the numbers present in the table item. 2. Open Numbers Grid to load a grid of numbers. The grid is an Endless list of numbers. Clicking on any number will load it’s factors. Long click any number below 100 to load it’s table. 3. Open “Load Table” and enter a number (1 to 99) to load it’s Multiplication Table. Click on any item to open it's factor info. 4. Open “Find Factors” and enter a number (2 to 999999) to load it’s Prime Factors and All Factors. You can further search by clicking on the Options menu and selecting “Find Factors” Open Squares (x^2), Cubes (x^3) and Powers (x^y) from x=2 to 100. 5. Long Click on table's in either Tables view or Factor's View to select numbers to load their tables, factors (again) or Grid. Press Volume Up/Down to load prev/next item. ### Options Menu ### Previous: Loads the Previous Multiplication Table Next: Loads the Next Multiplication Table Open Table..: Opens the Multiplication Table of the specified number (1-99) Reset: Resets/Refreshes the current table to it’s default preferences. Settings: Opens the Preferences for Multiplication Table View. ### Table Preferences ### Limited Table Mode: Tables load from a specified from value to a specified to value (which can be set in the settings). eg: 2 x 1(From) = 2 to 2 x 20(To) = 40 Endless Table Mode: Tables Load Continuously as you keep on scrolling from a specified value to 999. eg: 2 x 1(From) = 2 to 2 x 999(Loads Dynamically) = 1998 ### Table Default Settings ### Text Size: Set the text size for all the text in the Multiplication Table View. Minimum size required for visibility purposes is 10. Multiply From: The default beginning From value to start multiplying from. Multiply Upto: Default ending To number to end the multiplication at. Table No: This is the default Table No. that the application should load when it is first started. The application remembers the last visited Table and loads it by default every time. Text Alignment: Specifies the alignment of the Table’s text (Left, Center, Right, etc) ### Color Preferences ### Use Theme: The Theme that should be applied to the table’s and popup’s. Four theme’s are provided by default – Blue, Red, Pink and White. Disable Theme: Disable’s the theme mode. No background effects are applied when this is selected. But when the theme’s are enabled, the option to select the text-color is available. Table Text Color: The Color of the numbers that appear in the multiplication table view – Black, Blue, Cyan, Dark Gray, etc. Text Background Color: The background color of the Table text. This is disabled if the theme mode is enabled. Separator Color: The color of the Separator lines and the Table List’s background. This is also disabled if the theme mode is enabled. A great math workout tool for you. Keywords: Maths, Multiplication, Factors, Tables, Learn, Algrebra, Workout, Multiples, Factorization, Addition, Subtraction, Division.

description: DavaghNav is an Audio Guide for Davagh Mountain Bike Trails. Located approximately 6 miles north west of Cookstown, in County Tyrone, Northern Ireland, Davagh Forest offers gentle mountain biking and walking trails as well as an impressive 16km red trail with some rock slab drops you will never forget! Using DavaghNav you can enjoy the trails with less need to watch for those small signs. Wear an earpiece or switch your phone speaker on and enjoy the ride. DavaghNav provides choices before junctions, names of trails and key feature ahead. This is not a turn by turn Navigation system and it is advised that trail maps and signs should should be considered. The App includes: -GPS activated navigation -essential tourist information -trail maps Please download the App before going to Davagh as there is VERY LIMITED phone signal on the trails. GPS MUST be enabled on your phone to use this App DavaghNav has been developed by GTracks, a team of Students from Cookstown High School in partnership with Cookstown Council. Please use DavaghNav responsibly showing consideration for other riders and paying attention to obstacles and others using the trails. This App is in initial release format and will be refined further over the coming months.

description: This application is a SIMPLE periodic table of the chemical elements. About ***** The periodic table of the chemical elements is a tabular display of the chemical elements. Although precursors to this table exist, its invention is generally credited to Russian chemist Dmitri Mendeleev in 1869, who intended the table to illustrate recurring ("periodic") trends in the properties of the elements. The layout of the table has been refined and extended over time, as new elements have been discovered, and new theoretical models have been developed to explain chemical behavior. Features ******* - The periodic table (zoomable and in some devices pinch-zoomable) - Descriptions and illustrations of the elements (touch element for information) The following properties are displayed for each element if the value is currently known by science. Name, Element category Group, Standard atomic weight Electron configuration Electrons per shell Phase, Density (near r.t.) Liquid density Melting point Boiling point Heat of fusion Heat of vaporization Specific heat capacity (25 ∞C) Oxidation states Electronegativity Ionization energies Atomic radius Covalent radius Van der Waals radius Crystal structure Magnetic ordering Electrical resistivity (20 ∞C) Thermal conductivity (300 K) Thermal expansion (25 ∞C) Speed of sound (thin rod) Young's modulus Shear modulus Bulk modulus Poisson ratio Mohs hardness Brinell hardness CAS registry number Note: Ad supported application. For ad free version buy Elements - Periodic Table Pro
release_text: v1.5 Updated Reference libraries. v1.3 Improved layout for Tablet devices. v1.2 Updated images of some elements. v1.1 Fixed Force Close issue on Android v4 devices.

description: Power Pool Mania, Be the Master of Pocket Billiards Competition, the Top Arena Game of Sports and Board! And now it's free! 5 Stages with more than 120 Levels, Special Power up balls, Experience the fun to be a Master in Power Pool Mania! How to Play: - Drag Pool Cue to Adjust Cue Angle. - Press Button to Adjust Cue Angle Slightly. - Drag Energy Button to Adjust Power, Release to Shoot. - Pocket all balls on table to win the level. Game Features: ◆ Completely Suitable for both Casual and Serious Gamers: The simple Drag and Play interface allows you to pick up and play the game quickly, The Cue Ball Controller allowing you to perform more advanced shots including Back Spin, Top Spin, Left Spin and Right Spin. ◆ Various gameplay modes: - Challenges Mode， Time limited for this mode - Free Play Mode， Cues number limited for this mode ◆ 5 Special Stages with Various Tables and More than 120 Levels: - Stage 1：Classic Pool - Stage 2：Master Pool - Stage 3：Blast Pool - Stage 4：Power Pool - Stage 5：Super Pool ◆ Ordinary Balls - Cue ball - Don't sink it! - Red ball - 100 Points - Yellow ball - 150 Points - Black ball - 200 Points ◆ Power up balls： - Bomb Ball - Explodes when Time's up - Fission Ball - Turns to three new red balls When hit by Cue ball - Suck Ball - Sucks in all balls it touches - Fire Ball - Destroys any other balls it touches - Backhole Ball - Turns into a back hole When hit by Cue ball - Pinball Ball - Turns into a pinball bumper When hit by Cue ball ◆ Watch out the Various Traps! Go and have a challenge! wiki infor: Pool, also more formally known as pocket billiards or pool billiards, is the family of cue sports and games played on a pool table having six receptacles called pockets along the rails, a wide variety of games of skill generally played with a cue stick which is used to strike billiard balls. There are three major subdivisions of games within cue sports: Carom billiards, including balkline and straight rail, cushion caroms, three-cushion billiards, artistic billiards and four-ball; Pool, including among others eight-ball, nine-ball, ten-ball, straight pool, one-pocket and bank pool; Snooker and English billiards.

description: Train your Times Tables. Train Your Brain. Train your mental math (Mathematics grade 3). Learn your multiplication tables with this fun game. Allows you to choose which times tables you wish to practice. - Be the best and unlock the 10 levels; - Times tables flash cards; - Select the tables; - Fun for all. The best math trainer, math game for young, old, kids (third grade), adults. Can also be used as multiplication flash cards en train your brain. Also suitable for children with dyscalculia. by: Chris Page Times Tables Trainer FREE is an application that makes learning multiplication tables a little more entertaining. It is a themed application that encourages kids to learn multiplication tables and have fun at the same time. Times Tables Trainer FREE is an incredibly well executed, yet easy-to-use program. Once the app installs it opens a basic interface. The main menu consists of a start button and a settings button. Once the start button has been pressed the game begins. Starting with level one, which covers all the one multiples, the application goes up to level 10. In order to pass a level you must solve all the multiplication problems for the corresponding level. Once a level is passed the next level is automatically available. The app is themed like a school chalkboard and stars are given as rewards for achievements, which adds to the overall experience. Multiplication tables are one of the hardest things for a child to learn, and anything that brings some fun to the table while learning can be a very useful learning tool. Times Tables Trainer FREE is appropriate for all ages.
release_text: More Fun!

description: Does your child like music? This kids piano app will provide fun and entertainment for your toddler while playing the piano with different kind of musical sounds (xylophone and more). Play your own favourite song on the toddler piano or listen to well known nursery rhymes. Babies will also enjoy tapping the different colorful keys on the full screen keyboard and listen to the various instrument sound effects - a kind of baby music box. Please note that the free version gives access to the piano and xylophone instrument sounds and two children nursery rhymes to play along with. This finger piano game for kids app features: - Two different playing modes. For the children, who have fully control on where they touch or tap the screen, the piano is shown along with the buttons for the children songs and instrument sounds. The second mode is a full screen baby piano which is made for babies or infants who just like to tap the fullscreen piano to hear the musical instruments sounds. Please note that the full screen keyboard is only available in the full version. - Nursery rhymes / songs such as this old man and london bridge (free version contains 2 songs (abc and old mcdonald tunes) and the remaining can be purchased in the app). - 8 notes / tones kids piano with bright colors and effects. Multi touch which makes it possible to play several tones at the same time on the pocket piano. -Real instrument sounds.This piano app contains 10 different instruments. Free version contains the tiny piano and xylophone sounds. Full version can be bought through in-app purchase and will unlock all instruments such as flute, guitar, bass, trumpet, organ and bells. - Full version also contains the possibility to record and play your own songs. It’s great fun for the young ones to play and hear the sounds of different instruments. Playback is only possible within the app. The app includes nursery rhymes or songs such as the abc song, old macdonald had a farm and itzy bitsy spider and row row your boat. Your child may be able to learn to play piano / the different tunes and be able to play the song themselves. The magic piano for toddlers may also be used by preschoolers as a first step into the world of musical instruments. The sound and touch game is optimized for both phones and tablets and has been tested on young children, kids and parents. The app is also available for iPhone and iPad. If you experience any problems with the app or have any ideas on how to improve this kids app please do not hesitate to contact us at http://www.kidstatic.net/contact . You can also go to www.facebook.com/kidstaticapps. Kidstatic apps aims at delivering educational apps and games for toddlers and kids in a simple and intuitive manner. We are continuously expanding the range of themes of learning apps and games for children. If you want to get the latest news about our apps like us on http://www.facebook.com/kidstaticapps or go to http://www.kidstatic.net and sign up for our newsletter.

description: Hi everyone, welcome to Libii pet hospital! This time you will become the pet doctor, and cure some unusual patients, they are our 4 cute pet babies ----- funny puppy, sweet kitten, cool monkey, and cute bunny! These lovely pet babies encountered something terrible, and need the pet doctor’s help in a hurry, and you are just the one we need!!! In this app ---- Pet Doctor, you can use many different kinds of medical instruments to treat the pet babies’ illness. Here you can do all the following things for them, such as taking body temperature, infusing, measuring blood pressure, taking X-ray picture, putting ice packs and so on. You not only have nearly 20 medical instruments to use to cure the pet babies, but also can take advantage of many toys to make them happy. No matter in the treatment process or finish treating, please don’t forget to take a snapshot for the cute pet baby! Therefore, if you really feel interested and excited about such a hospital game related to pet babies, please do not hesitate any more, join our amazing Pet Doctor, and enjoy the experience of being a professional pet doctor!!! How To Play: Open Pet Doctor, choose a little pet baby you like to start the game. At the bottom of the screen, you can choose different medical instruments to treat the pet baby, such as dragging the cotton swab to clean the wounds, dragging the tweezers to remove the wood splinters, dragging the X-ray machine onto the patient to find out the fracture parts, dragging the band-aid to cover the patient’s scatches, and dragging the ice packs to the patient’s forehead to lower the temperature, etc. Meanwhile, the band-aid, ice packs, infusion bottle have many different styles to choose. After all these treating process, you can take a snapshot for your healthy pet baby! Features: · 4 cute pet babies to choose from (funny puppy, sweet kitten, cool monkey, and cute bunny) · 19 medical instruments you can choose to treat the pet baby · Plentiful interesting toys you can choose to make the pet baby happy · A huge variety of decoration items to choose, including funny band-aid, colorful ice packs, attractive infusion bottles and so on · Pet babies will have various expressions and sounds when you are treating them · Share your healthy pet babies via Facebook or E-mail with just one click · Snapshots of your pet babies can be saved in your photo album · Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions Need You Know: This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Thanks.

description: Speed Reader uses a method called Rapid Serial Visual Presentation to allow you to read faster by eliminating the time spent in moving your eyes between words. Watch the center of the screen, do not move your eyes, and try not to "subvocalize," or say the words in your head. Do not listen to music or attempt to multitask while using SpeedReader. If you find it very easy to read and absorb every word, consider increasing the speed. With practice, speeds of 600 wpm are not uncommon. Supported file formats include: .txt .pdf .epub .html .xml and other markup languages Speed Reader Gold is now available! Benefits of the gold (donate) version include: The prestige of being in the elite A shiny new gold icon Updates about 15 minutes before those regular users A happier developer Supports custom colors, any speed, and multiple words at once. Speed Reader can also help those coping with dyslexia because it orders words correctly. Other color options can also aid in reading for those suffering from dyslexia. If you are using Speed Reader because you have dyslexia, it is suggested that you keep the application at a low speed. Speed Reader requires access to the external storage in order to convert .pdf and .epub files to .txt files. Files that are not .txt files get converted to .txt, and these .txt files are saved on the external storage to be accessed quickly later. Supported file formats include: .txt .pdf .epub .html .xml and other markup languages Supports custom colors, any speed, and multiple words at once. Speed Reader can also help those coping with dyslexia because it orders words correctly. Other color options can also aid in reading for those suffering from dyslexia. If you are using Speed Reader because you have dyslexia, it is suggested that you keep the application at a low speed. Speed Reader requires access to the external storage in order to convert .pdf and .epub files to .txt files. Files that are not .txt files get converted to .txt, and these .txt files are saved on the external storage to be accessed quickly later. Licensing: Speed Reader is an open source project released under AGPL, Version 3. Speed Reader uses the following libraries, with the corresponding licenses: epublib under CC-BY, itextpdf under AGPL Version 3, juniversalchardet under GPLv2.0+, android-file-dialog under 3-Clause BSD, and jsoup and slf4j under the MIT license.

description: Welcome to the world of Geeks!! How many times were you frustrated while looking out for a good collection of programming/algorithm/interview questions? What did you expect and what did you get? This portal has been created to provide well written, well thought and well explained solutions for selected questions. -Learn while you go - Mark a post as favorite by tapping on the star and we will save it for you to read it offline -Share a post with your friends through whatsapp, email and message -Search any algorithm/topic right from the app -Learn from the interview experiences of top MNC companies like Google, facebook, Microsoft, Amazon, Adobe shared by our readers -Copy/Paste any content of post by long tapping it and share it trough Whatsapp, amail and message This app has content from GeeksforGeeks. - Programming questions, solutions and articles for interview preparation - C Programs - C++ Programs - Linked Lists - Data Structures - Trees - Graphs - Algorithms - Time Complexity of Algorithms - Algorithms Explained with Figures Algorithms of -Greedy Programming -Dynamic Programming -Searching and Sorting -Pattern Searching -Backtracking -Divide and conquer -Bit Algorithms Note: The app needs few permissions. We would justify why we need those permissions. Please note that below permissions are needed for basic functioning of the app and we do not and never intend to use any of your personal data. -ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Network State Permissions to detect whether Internet is connected -ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: Use WiFi to connect to GeeksforGeeks server -READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE / WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Used for saving/reading posts from storage in offline reading feature -C2D_MESSAGE: Used in notification feature -WAKE_LOCK: Brighten up the phone screen whenever a notification for new post comes -VIBRATE: Use to vibrate the phone whenever a notification for new post comes -GET_ACCOUNTS -> GCM requires a Google account. It uses an existing connection for Google services. For pre-3.0 devices, this requires users to set up their Google account on their mobile devices. A Google account is not a requirement on devices running Android 4.0.4 or higher. SO this is the reason for requirement of the permission

description: Over 6 million players enjoy FastBall, now it's your turn to taste it... In FastBall, you control a rolling ball. In his way, there are many obstacles and his only ability is to jump. This is where he needs you, you'll make him jump by tapping the screen. With this simple mechanic, FastBall 2 contains 155 action packed levels spawned across 5 level packs. Through the levels, you'll need a good timing, pure attention as well as decisions on which path to follow to reach the level end. It is easy to play and easy to enjoy.... FastBall 2 contains the following features : - An addictive gameplay enjoyed by more than 6 million players... - New game mechanics including speed zones, long jump blocks and direction signs. - Ability to play the game in different themes as "Cartoon" and "Futuristic" with wonderful graphics. More themes are coming in the following updates.. - 3 Difficulty modes as easy, normal and hard. If you are an expert FastBall player or looking for maximum enjoyment than hard mode is strongly suggested. - Got stuck in a level? No problem, the new token feature allows you to skip any level anytime from the ingame pause menu. description: The iParadox app gives users instant, continual remote access to their property security system turning any Google device into a remote touchscreen. iParadox provides lots of functionality and information at your fingertips. The multi-lingual iParadox has an intuitive user-interface which enables you to easily connect to your security system and edit its settings. Great features include MultiSite and ByPass Zone tools. Exclusive to iParadox for Android are the following exciting features: - Vibrate or Sound upon alarm  - Portrait and landscape mode support - Faster connection to site(s) - Can run in background; allowing users to perform other tasks  - Zone view types for system/zone status and bypassed zones are remembered - Can use a language that iParadox supports even if the device does not support it - Faster/easier navigation between screens; user can tap on screen to go forward/backward instead of using button or keys - More web-like interface with less dialog pop-ups iParadox for Android is supported by Android V1.6 and higher, and is compatible with Paradox EVO192 (V2.20 or higher) and all MG5000, MG5050, SP4000, SP5500, SP6000, SP65, and SP7000 systems. Note that for iParadox to function properly, your security system must include the IP100 Internet Module V5.10 or higher or the IP150 Internet Module V1.0. You can use iParadox for: Security System Controls  - If you forget to arm the system before you leave, you can do it remotely  - To remotely disarm the system to allow service professionals to enter a property - Receive automatic email notification if there is an alarm  - Receive notification when the system is disarmed, like when the kids arrive home from school  - See the current status of the alarm system  - See if any troubles have occurred in the system  …and so much more! NOTES:  iParadox will not push alarm status notifications. In order to see if the system is in alarm, the iParadox app must be running. See paradox.com for more information.

description: The Global Currency Card is a reloadable prepaid Visa card used to make payments in multiple currencies either in person or online, wherever Visa cards are accepted. You can choose from up to 11 currencies, locking in the exchange rate when you load funds onto the card. It’s the simple, secure and convenient way to shop, whether online or overseas. The mobile app helps you manage your card on the go. You can: • View your wallet balances and transactions • Transfer money between your wallets, exchange money, remove wallets and change your wallet order • Add wallets and load money anytime through BPAY® or when in Australia, visit your nearest Westpac bank branch • Report lost or stolen cards and change your card PIN • Change and reset your username and password • Access 24/7 emergency assistance for lost or stolen cards Where do I purchase the Global Currency Card? The Global Currency Card is available at a Westpac Australian bank branch and is available to anyone who is over 16 years of age, has an Australian residential address and satisfies our ID requirements (you do not need to be a Westpac customer). For more information visit www.westpac.com.au/globalcurrencycard. Security Your money is protected by Chip and PIN card security with the Visa Zero Liability Policy, protecting you from any fraudulent charges or unauthorised purchases*. Learn more about keeping your mobile secure visit www.westpac.com.au/mobilesecurity. Support Call us 24 hours a day, 7 days a week: Within Australia: 1300 797 470 (local call cost) Outside Australia: +61 2 9374 7102 (standard call charges apply) Things you should know Downloading the app is free. Please be aware that you may incur Internet data charges through your mobile network or Internet service providers for using the app whilst roaming. Information is current as at 25 November 2013. Cuscal Limited is the issuer of the product but does not take deposits from you. Westpac is not responsible for and does not guarantee this product or card or your ability to access any prepaid value or the use of this product or card. description: Mail1Click is a free a secure mail service that uses strong encryption to keep your communications safe. All emails with files attached are stored fully encrypted by AES 256. You can access your encrypted mailbox using the your Android smart-phone or by the web mail interface available at: https://www.mail1click.com Mail1click is very easy to use, you can activate your account in only one click and it's completely free up to 25 MB of space used. Mail1Click has been created from the same team of VpnOneClick and VoipOneClick (more than 3.000.000 downloads!)

description: If you're serious about increasing your core strength, follow this six week training program and you'll soon be on your way to completing 200 consecutive sit-ups! If you're serious about increasing your core strength, follow this six week training program and you'll soon be on your way to completing 200 consecutive sit-ups! Think there's no way you could do this? I think you can! All you need is a good plan, plenty of discipline and about 30 minutes a week to achieve this goal! No doubt some of you can already do 100 consecutive sit-ups, but let's face it, you're in a big minority. Most of you reading this won't even be able to manage 20 sit-ups. Actually, I'm sure many of you can't even do 10. However, it really doesn't matter which group you fall into. If you follow the progressive sit-ups training program, I'm positive you'll soon be able to do 200 sit-ups! ••• We've had a few comments about the app being too simple. If you have ideas or suggestions, or even criticism then email us on the address supplied elsewhere on this page. We genuinely want to make the best app we can, and are always open to suggestions. •••

description: Map My Walk – GPS Walking, Jogging, Running, Tracking Workouts and Calorie Counter Start walking with the MapMyWalk community. Record GPS-based activities to view detailed stats; connect with 400+ devices to import and analyze all your data in one place; log over 600 different activity types. ALL THE FEATURES YOU NEED TO SUCCEED ☆ Gear Tracker - Add your athletic shoes and start tracking mileage with Gear Tracker. Help yourself avoid common injuries and get notified when it’s time for a new pair. ☆ 600+ Activities - Log and record workouts with the largest selection of activities, including running, cycling, walking, gym workouts, cross training, yoga and tons of others. ☆ Workout Stats - Record GPS-based workouts with customizable voice feedback for precise stats like pace, route, distance, calorie burn, elevation profile and more. SHARE FITNESS & NUTRITION DATA ☆ Share Data - Sync your account with other health and nutrition apps like MyFitnessPal and Google Fit. TRAIN LIKE A PRO WITH MVP MEMBERSHIP ☆ Go MVP - Be a premium member for an ad-free experience and access special features like heart rate analysis, personal training plans, audio coaching, and Live Tracking. ☆ MVP Members Only - Enjoy exclusive offers and promotions from our partners. JOIN THE COMMUNITY ☆ Activity Feed - Share your progress and see what friends are doing on your Activity Feed. Whether you’re a beginner, casually active, looking to rededicate yourself to fitness or an athletic enthusiast, you’ll fit in perfectly with our 30+ million member strong community. ☆ Social - Share your progress and workouts with friends on social media. MORE FEATURES ON THE WEB ☆ 24/7 Activity Graph - Connect devices to view steps, sleep, workouts and more, all in one expertly designed graph. ☆ Import Data - We make it easy to connect and import data from the best activity tracking devices in the industry. Connect devices from Jawbone, Misfit, Fitbit, Garmin, Withings and more (Bluetooth Smart™ and ANT+™). ☆ Challenges - Join Challenges for some friendly, virtual competition, climb the leaderboards and win prizes. Be sure to visit us at www.MapMyFitness.com for the full experience. Should you choose to upgrade to MVP, payment will be charged to your Google Wallet account at confirmation of purchase. The monthly subscription costs USD 5.99 per month while the yearly subscription costs USD 29.99 per year or USD 2.50 per month. Subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in cost when renewing. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off on wallet.google.com and click on ‘Update or cancel your subscription’ on the Transactions page after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be cancelled. Any unused portion of a free trial period is forfeited if you choose to purchase a subscription to MVP. Under Armour Connected Fitness powers the complete digital product suite of MapMyFitness, including MapMyRun, MapMyRide, MapMyWalk, MapMyHike, and the Under Armour Record app. Our mission is to make all athletes better by providing the digital connected fitness products they need to train, perform and improve. Find the full terms and conditions, and our privacy policy, at http://www.mapmyfitness.com/terms_of_use and http://about.mapmyfitness.com/about/user-privacy-policy/ respectively.

description: CAD Pockets (formerly ZWCAD Touch) is a powerful mobile CAD app tailor-made for designers, architects and engineers. It supports various file formats ranging from DWG, DXF, to DWF. You can instantly open files without any lag, regardless of size. Except viewing the drawings, you can also revise, markup, and export files to PDF or DWF and share the file with your colleagues via email. CAD Pockets includes many popular third-party cloud storage services like Google Drive, Dropbox, and so on. You can sync up your files to the cloud and keep your local files updated in real time, saving you the trouble of transmitting files via cable. You can conveniently communicate with designers or clients even if you are on the go, avoiding the chore of carrying clumsy laptops or paper drawings. CAD Pockets also supports offline usage. Simply by saving files into your Android device and you are free to go. Moreover, you can view files that have been downloaded to your cloud drive without access to the Internet. File Management: 1. Support both 2D and 3D DWG/DXF/DWF files. 2. Open and save CAD files from local storage, online storage (DropBox, GoogleDrive, OneDrive, etc.) and email attachment. 3. Transfer files via USB cable line from PC to Local Drawing, and support full offline usability (Open, Rename, Save as, Delete and Share). 4. Supports auto-sync and remote operations (Open, Rename, Save as, Delete and Share) for remote CAD files. 5. Supports auto cache for remote CAD files, which allows users to open and delete them offline. 6. Manage WebDav sites (Create, Delete, Modify and File Sync). 7. Share CAD drawing via Email and export drawing to JPG/PDF/DWF. Drawing Functions: 1. Supports easy-to-use multi-touch operations for Zooming, Panning and Snapping. 2. Supports CAD drawing functions like Lines, Polylines, Circles, and Texts. 3. Supports CAD editing functions like Copy, Move, Rotate and Mirror. 4. Supports CAD annotating functions like Revision cloud, Dimension, Image and Voice. 5. Supports CAD dimensioning functions like Linear, Radius, Angular and Ordinate. 6. Supports block insert and editing block attribute. 7. Supports magnifier for details, and prompt for “Last Point”. 8. Supports Undo and Redo. 9. Supports CAD layer and layout management. 10. Supports 3D viewing and view control. 11. Supports Find Text function and automatically locating the result.
release_text: 1."Auto-download cloud files" is now only activated under Wi-Fi 2.Now you can insert blocks to any layer which is set to current 3.Now you can select any object and double tap the layer name to change its layer 4.Bug fixes： * Some drawings cannot be opened * Some objects disappears after moving in some drawings * Objects in layout cannot be displayed in some drawings * Some fonts cannot be correctly displayed * The distance entered when moving objects does not match the real result

description: ABC Ranch is a fun and educational game intended for toddlers or young children learning their numbers and letters. The game contains 4 entertaining mini-games (Horse Round Up, Animal Counting, Sound Matching and Animal Memory) that we hope will help your child learn counting skills, number recognition, basic animal sound identification skills and improve memorization. The game has a barn yard/ ranch theme with easy to recognize animals to make learning interesting. The mini-games are very short and the are designed to be won easily. We hope that positive feedback and easy game play will help your child learn these important concepts. We recommend that parents play this game with their children, although it is not required. We do not guarantee that this game will educate or improve your child's memory but we sure hope your child will benefit from the game's content.

description: Andy the alien's splendid adventure in the vast universe! SuperSalad: Space Jump is the main character, Andy's long journey of going back to his own home planet. Steer the spaceship in order to avoid meteorites and other obstacles and challenge for the best score. Andy's spaceship will make a jump when getting ores. If you tilt your cell phone in the direction that you want to move the spaceship to, it will fly to that direction. Please check the fuel condition. The height of a jump depends on how much you have the fuel in the gauge. If the spacecraft collides with meteorites and electric obstacles, the fuel will decrease. If you win an item, while playing the game, it will take effect immediately. - Booster: The spacecraft goes high by jet propulsion. - Booster x2: It gets you higher than Booster. - Magnet: This draws in ores around. - Energy: This charges up 100% of fuel to the spacecraft. Come and visit our company's educational home page "SuperSalad". -Official Home Page- http://www.supersalad.co.kr *** It is not allowed to use cell phones which do not support gyro-sensor. ***

description: ★★YOU MUST HAVE UCCW INSTALLED TO USE THIS SKIN★★ If you have any problems, please do not rate low. The majority of the problems users face is from not knowing where a setting is in UCCW. Please first view the video and then email me with any problems and I can usually figure out what is going on and get back to you within a few hours. As always, I am open to feedback and suggestions on how to make this widget better for its users. Permissions are due to 4.1+ workaround. You can read more about it here: http://goo.gl/OWbfb ★INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS★ Please view the video in screenshots or follow the below instructions. The video and instructions will be the same for all of my skins. There is a problem with paid UCCW Skins on 4.1+ devices. In order to get this skin to show up on these devices, I have changed the app to a skin installer. (Note: you must have Allow installation of apps from unknown sources checked under Settings - Security for the skin installer to successfully launch the skin apk.) 1) Download and install the skin installer app from this Google Play listing. 2) After downloading and installing this skin installer app, click the "Open" button in the Google Play listing. 3) A skin installation app will launch. In the skin installer, select Install Skin. 4) A new app installation will now launch and you can proceed to install the skin as you would a normal apk. ★ADDING THE SKIN TO YOUR HOMESCREEN★ One of the most frequent issues users email me about is that the skin is not showing up for them. Paid UCCW skins from the Google Play store only show up in one location (when adding a uccw widget). To add the skin to your homescreen follow these instructions. (Please note, these instructions will work for the majority of users but in some situations, the methods might be a little different due to different launchers.) 1) Long press in an open spot on your homescreen and select "Widgets". 2) Scroll down until you see the different UCCW sizes available. 3) Select the appropriate size from the list for the skin you are adding. 4) UCCW will now open a list of installed skins including paid UCCW skins from the Google Play Store (this is the only place the paid skins will show up). 5) Select from the list the skin which you wish to add. 6) On your homescreen a hand pointing to a blue dot will now appear with the words "Touch here" written below. Tap on the hand. 7) The skin will now appear on your homescreen. To change certain skin settings (colors, hotspot settings, time format, etc) with hotspots deactivated, tap anywhere on the skin. You can now pick many color options and pick your favorite apps to launch from the hotspots (note: be sure to activate hotspots before you exit the settings by hitting the menu button and select "Lock Widgets (Hotspot mode) and select "On"). If you have any issues or problems installing the skin, please first view the video and then email me and I will get back to you as soon as I can.
release_text: ★★Please follow the installation instructions in the description when installing new as well as updating!!!★★ -Changed app to skin installer to fix skin not showing up on 4.1+ devices. Follow the installation instructions in the description. -New permissions are due to 4.1+ workaround. You can read more about it here: http://goo.gl/OWbfb -Re-did both the HexClock Bar and HexClock Bar Digital layouts for a cleaner look.

description: WHISTLE, SING and FLY… Meet Talking Larry the Bird, your very own singing, feathered friend. Unleash your inner musician by making Larry whistle along to everything you play – and share your amazing songs on Facebook or YouTube! Features: - Talk to Larry: Speak and he repeats what you say in his own hilarious voice. - Play with Larry: Stroke him, poke him and see what happens. - Feed Larry: Give him seeds and watch him peck! - Explore the fun actions: Hit Larry with a bolt of lightning or make him take a bow. - Become a musician: Use the piano keys to make Larry whistle any song you play. - Record videos and share: Record videos of all the fun things Larry does to send to your friends, or upload on Facebook and YouTube. This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates Outfit7 has established COPPA compliant privacy practices to protect your child’s personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information. description: SAVE THE POPSTAR, SAVE THE WORLD! Help Toshi dance to defeat the evil demons. Save Toshi (for iOS) reached the #7 Top Paid iPhone Puzzle Game in the US and was featured on iTunes under Best Puzzle Games. Over 1 million people have already saved Toshi, giving the game an average rating of 4.5 (out of 5)! This free android version comes with 1 free level pack (20 levels). 4 additional packs can be unlocked for free by using the awesome built in Tapjoy’s offer-wall. PRESS QUOTES (iOS VERSION): “It’s a lovely mix of cute and challenging at a price too good to pass up” Kotaku “2D physics puzzlers like Angry Birds and Cut the Rope dominated the sales charts in 2010, we’re already looking for what’s next, and we think we’ve found it!” SlideToPlay “There is only one flaw to this game, and that is that at some point the game ends.” TouchGen “In short…get this game…play this game…it’s super good!” IPwnGames A NEW DIMENSION TO PUZZLE SOLVING Physics puzzles are definitely one of the most popular game genres on mobile. While most of these puzzles take place in simple 2d worlds, Save Toshi pulls ahead of the competition by providing a unique 3D take on the genre. ME LOVE TO DANCING! Every time mega popstar Toshi dances... a demon dies! This is why the evil demons kidnapped Toshi and made her forget how to walk. Without her supernatural dancing powers the world is in danger! Your mission is to help Toshi get to the dance-floor area by shooting and smashing down the different types of blocks she is standing on. SUPER SIMPLE The intuitive controls that are incredibly simple to pick up. To shoot, tap your finger on the target. To rotate your view, just drag your finger around. Save Toshi has an easy and straightforward learning process with detailed in-game tutorials and there is also a hint system to help players with even with the most challenging levels. SUPER CHALLENGING! The level design uses a wide variety of game-play elements (different materials, explosives, hinges, and more) to create 100 mind-boggling physics puzzles. To get the best score you will need to solve all levels with as few shots as possible. And while the game starts out with extremely easy tutorial puzzles, later levels will really challenge you to think in all 3 dimensions! FEATURE LIST: * Amazingly fluid and realistic 3d physics * 100 fun and challenging levels with a smooth difficulty curve * Outstanding variety of different game-play elements * Intuitive and super easy to pick up controls * Easy and straightforward learning process with in-game tutorials * Hint system available for all levels * Simple stars scoring system (based on number of shots) * Unlock levels for free using Tapjoy’s offerwall * Cute and hilarious lead anime character * HD quality 3D graphics * Unlock new outfits, music & environments We believe in an ongoing conversation with our players, so please let us know what you think about Save Toshi! follow us on facebook or subscribe to our mailing list on our website to get FREE bonus content alerts in the future. -------------------------------------------------------- Website: http://www.nitako.com Twitter: http://twitter.com/nitako Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/user/noamabta Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/home.php?#/profile.php?id=698460871&ref=profile iTunes

description: If you are familiar with our game City Island, or if you played simulation city builder games before, this new 'citybuilder in the snow' edition is definitely something you need to try and play for free! In City Island: Winter Edition you will be responsible for building a city on this cold and snowy Island instead of the exotic paradise of City Island. Build houses for your citizens and create jobs with commercial buildings to earn money. At the same time, be sure to build enough decorations and community buildings to keep them happy. Gameplay in this edition is the similar to the original City Island, but with the winter season ahead of us, this city building game with snowflakes dropping from the sky, provides you a completely new user experience. In this romantic scenery, simulate a wonderful virtual city with a choice of over 100+ unique buildings, like hotels, cinema's, offices, bakeries, restaurants, and even an oil platform. Catch some fish with your boats in the docks, make people happy by building schools, churches, parks, museums, libraries and much more. Furthermore, share codes with your friends in the community and be rewarded with extra cash and gold! A mini simulation of life on an island in its best form! Try this free builder game now and enjoy many hours of free play!

description: *** Brag about your Pitch Speed! *** "By far the most accurate baseball radar gun on the app store." Did you ever wonder how you compare against others, or against professional athletes? Is your pitch as fast as theirs, or at least in the same ballpark? Try using Baseball Radar Gun+ to see exactly how fast you can throw, right down to a tenth of a mile per hour. Baseball Radar Gun+ is a simple and precise way to test your strength and compete with your friends. Did you ever wonder how you compare against others, or against professional athletes? Is your pitch as fast as theirs, or at least in the same ballpark? Try using Baseball Radar Gun+ to see exactly how fast you can throw, right down to a tenth of a mile per hour. Baseball Radar Gun+ is a simple and precise way to test your strength and compete with your friends. Get the answers at a glance Baseball Radar Gun+ uses color coding for easy identification of your speed. The entire user interface will change in color according to the speed of your throw. Pitch speeds and colors: ► 76 Over Red - Watch out, the ball is about to go supersonic! That's a powerful shot! ► 61-75 Orange - Fast! People would do well to get out of your way when you have a ball in your hand. ► 51-60 Yellow - pretty darn good! Your pitch is pretty fast, that's quite the arm you have there! ► 41-50 Green - the speed of your throw is pretty average; although it can be improved, it's nothing to be ashamed of. ► 00-40 Blue - indicating a slow pitch; that's okay, everybody has their off days. How it works Baseball Radar Gun+ uses a really simple method to accurately calculate the pitch speed. Simply press Start when the ball leaves the pitcher's hand, and press Stop when you see the ball land in the catcher's hand. This method of pitch speed calculation allows Baseball Radar Gun+ to be used on any phone, regardless of its age or camera quality. Also, it makes the pitch calculator very easy to use. Features ► Find out exactly how fast your pitch was. ► Pitch counter. Don't miss a single pitch with the counter function. ► Stopwatch. Very useful in practice. ► Pitch history. Don't write down the times yourself, Baseball Pitch Speed Radar Gun remembers the last 4 pitches. ► Color Coding, for easy identification, at a glance. ► League Presets: Little League, Major League Baseball, Fast Pitch Softball. ► Cheaper than a radar gun, and just about as effective. ► Can be used in many sports! Hockey, soccer, handball, you pick the sport and Baseball Pitch Speed Radar Gun does the measurements. Learn by doing It’s really easy and fun to use Baseball Radar Gun+ an indispensable tool for when you’re having fun or practicing and improving your skills! DOWNLOAD IT NOW AND TRY IT OUT FOR YOURSELF! Baseball Radar Gun+ is brought to your by CS Sports, A Division of CobbySoft Media Inc.

app_name: Amy in Love – Game for Girls
description: Looking for fun adventure games for girls? Look no further! Get 'Amy in Love – Game for Girls' and fun is guaranteed! If you're a fan of sweet girl games, but also searching for some action in it, this addicting side-scroller is all you ever wanted! Download this platformer game on your phone right away and discover the breathtaking game story about a brave little girl ready to do anything for her love! Is there anything cuter than a little girl in love? Amy is a little red-haired girl trying to win Ricky’s heart and give him a kiss! In this 2D side scrolling adventure your task is to help Amy pass through the park and arrive in time for her date! If you succeed in helping her, they will have a long lasting love! Help Amy always arrive in time for her date with Ricky and their love will beat the summer heat, autumn rain, winter frost and spring allergies! Collect as many hearts as you can because the more hearts you manage to collect the bigger smooch Ricky will get! Run and jump over obstacles, collect powerups, gain special powers and complete achievements to make this love crush possible! Each time you hit the Hater (grumpy rocks) it will slow you down and you’ll lose your precious hearts! Bit if you jump on top of them you’ll get a power-up (Super Speed, Super Jump, Bounce Back…)! There are six types of Haters: - Moody (Purple Hater) - Quarrel (Red Hater) - Cheater (Orange Hater) - Jealous (Yellow Hater) - Grouchy (Blue Hater) - Softy (Pink Hater) Features: - Heart Chest - Jump on the chest to get bonus hearts! - Teddy Bears - Increase your score! You can collect three Teddy Bears in each level! Help Amy find her true love 'Amy in Love – Game for Girls' is not just another one from many love games for girls! It is completely unique 2D platformer, with a totally innovative gameplay and simple game mechanics, which makes playing this side-scrolling action runner easy even for babies and toddlers! This cool game for girls is a brand new love saga and its candy graphics are such a refreshment set side by side to dress up games for girls and other fashion games available on the market these days! Colorful and vivid HD graphics make 'Amy in Love – Game for Girls' eye-catching to toddlers and older kids and its challenging gameplay and lightning fast jump acrobatics make it interesting to teenagers and even adults! There are so many free games for Android™ that children and little girls love to play, but this is definitely one of the best girlgames you'll ever play! A universal app with HD optimized graphics is waiting for you to download it! Get it for free, right now, and join the most lovely game for smartphones! One touch controls make playing Amy in Love – Game for Girls extremely easy! Dash as fast as you can, dodge the oncoming Haters, jump over gaps and collect hearts and teddy bears with only one touch! This amazing park surfer has beautiful new graphics and gorgeous new environments, which will keep little girls interested for hours! We wanted to create something special for all of you who love playing gamesforgirls! Hope you’ll enjoy playing our free game for Android!

'맘 잡고 공부하려고 해도 계속 카톡! 카톡! ㅠ' 2. '계획을 세워도 지키질 못하니.. 자괴감만 들어' 3. 스마트폰 중독인 것 같아.. 공부에 집중 할 수가 없어 4. '내가 지금 공부를 제대로 하고 있는건가..?' 5. '오래 앉아 있으면 뭐해.. 공부한 시간은 적은데' => 고민된다면 를 사용해 보세요 => 공부시간 측정 + 공부할 때 모든 푸쉬알림을 차단하는 유일한 앱 Study Helper ================================= (스터디 헬퍼는 계속 업데이트 됩니다!) ========= 지난 업데이트 사항 ========== v 1.3.2 - 삼성 계열 일부 스마트폰에서 앱이 중복 실행되어 공부 시간이 늘어나는 현상을 해결했습니다. v 1.3.0 - 한 목표를 다른 목표에 합칠 수 있습니다. 목표 편집 화면에서 가능합니다. - 목표별 총 공부시간이 노출되지 않던 문제를 해결했습니다. - 앱 시작시 멈추던 문제를 해결했습니다. v1.2.3 - 기기를 바꾸더라도 공부시간이 동기화 됩니다. 수동 동기화는 메인 화면을 아래로 끌어내리면 됩니다. - 앱의 용량이 계속 늘어나는 문제를 해결했습니다. 앱 내 데이터베이스를 거의 사용하지 않도록 한 것으로 이에 따라 일부 기능이 네트워크에 연결된 상태에서만 가능합니다. v1.1.7(2015.1.13) - VPN 기술을 활용해 네트워크를 차단하는 기능이 추가 되었습니다. v1.1.6 (2015.1.12) - 새로운 방식을 적용해 공부 중 모든 기기에서 푸시알림이 차단되도록 만들었습니다. 인터넷에 연결된 것처럼 보이나 사실은 끊긴 상태입니다. - 프로필 설정에서 지역, 학년, 목표를 바꿀 수 있습니다. - 날짜 변경 기준 시각을 오전 5시로 통일했습니다. - 스터디 그룹이 한 번에 여러 개 만들어 지는 문제를 해결했습니다. v1.1.1 (2014.12.31) - 닉네임 수정 버그 처리 - 서버 싱크 주석 처리 - DB Upgrade 부분 Exception 처리 v1.1.0 (2014.12.30) - 공부량이 많아 동기화 중 렉이 걸리는 현상은 1월 초 업데이트를 통해 해결하겠습니다. - 각종 설정 변경시 앱에 바로 적용되지 않던 문제를 해결했습니다. - 주간 통계가 잘못 반영되는 오류를 해결했습니다. - 그룹 타임라인 수정/삭제 기능추가 - 그룹 타임라인 덧글 수정/삭제 기능추가 - 날짜변경시간 오전 5시로 고정 v1.0.2 (2014.12.14), v1.0.3 (2014.12.15) - 스터디 그룹 추가 - 하드 모드 잠금 기능 강화 - 허용 앱 16개로 확대 - 각종 버그 해결 v0.7.0 (2014.06.21) - 신규 기능 추가와 함께 전반적인 UI가 변경되었습니다. - 히스토리 수정이 가능해졌습니다. - D-day 기능이 추가됐습니다. - 위젯이 추가되었습니다. - 메인 사진을 마음대로 바꿀 수 있습니다. v0.6.1 (2014.05.26) - 완전 잠금 모드에서 실수가 없도록 팝업으로 한 번 더 물어봅니다. v0.6.0 (2014.05.22) - 기기 완전 잠금 모드가 추가되었습니다. 시간 측정 화면 상단의 자물쇠 버튼을 눌러보세요. - 일부 기기에서 공부 중 앱이 종료되는 버그가 수정되었습니다. v0.5.7, v0.5.8 (2014.5.14) - 시간 저장이 두 번 되는 문제를 해결했습니다. 해당 문제로 잘못 저장된 데이터가 수정되었습니다. - 버그가 발생하면 메뉴 목록의 '개발자에게 제보하기'를 통해 말씀해 주세요. v0.5.6 (2014.5.12) - 반복되는 버그로 불편을 겪게 한 점 죄송합니다. 이런 일이 재발하지 않도록 노력하겠습니다. - 설태영, 이준형, 유차영 올림 v0.5.5 (2014.5.12) - 실행하자마자 꺼지는 문제를 해결했습니다. v0.5.4 (2014.5.12) - 주간 통계에서 주차가 잘못 표기되던 문제를 해결했습니다. - 일부 기록에 날짜 변경 시각이 적용되지 않던 문제를 해결했습니다. v0.5.3 (2014.5.10) - 허용 앱을 실행하면 앱이 종료되던 문제를 해결했습니다. - 앱이 강제 종료되며 실제보다 더 많은 시간이 저장되던 문제를 해결했습니다. v0.5.2 (2014.5.9) - 시간 측정 중 기기가 꺼지면 그 직전까지의 기록을 저장합니다. - 공부 시작후 일정 시간이 지나면, 화면이 꺼집니다. - 각종 버그가 수정되었습니다. v0.5.0, v0.5.1 (2014.4.2) - 통계 1차 업데이트가 완료되었습니다. - 좌측 드로워에서 일간/주간/월간 통계로 바로 이동이 가능합니다. - 메모리 부족으로 인한 오류 문제가 개선되었습니다. - 일부 기기에서 히스토리 메모 작성시 키보드에 완료 버튼이 뜨지 않던 문제를 해결했습니다. - 일부 기기에서 명언 노출시 꺼지던 문제를 해결했습니다. - 목표를 지웠을 때 통계에 바로 적용이 되지 않던 문제를 해결했습니다. - 메뉴에서 통계로 들어가면 앱이 중지되는 문제를 해결했습니다. v0.4.0 (2014.3.14) - description: This version contains no ads This app allows you to browse reddit with pictures. You can easily browse through the images posted in any subreddit. You can enter a subreddit or choose from one of the default one.
release_text: UI improvements Fixed images sometimes not loading Fixed Gifs sometimes not animating Added score and subreddit heading Added title in full image view Added Top Today Added button to open the post in the browser or reddit app

description: Say hello to Flappy Birds vs Running Kitty cute tap game. Running Zola is one of the best free games. It is a platform runner about a cat that has to escape a weird dream world. Runnning Zola containes 3 worlds with funny games. This fun story is part of games for kids. The cat can jump, duck and shoot mice at enemies. Zola, the cat encounters dogs, spiders, snails, turtles and hedgehogs, making this platformer belong to games for girls and games for boys. Instead of completing levels in this runner, you can choose to do an infinite fun run - how far can you run? All our applications are games for free. Runner games like this one are great for passing time in a fun way. Running Zola contains 3 chapters: - Cemetery Zola - Zola Underground - Zola in the Village You have 2 game modes: - Story Mode : Finish 3 beautifull adventures - Endurange Mode : Stay alive as long as you can Zola is a cute cat that can: - Jump over obstacles like snails or turtles - Duck under obstacles like snakes and cheese wheels - Shoot with the mouse at dogs and bats - Collect mice, fish and other items - Save the world from evil - Be adorable This is the best runner from the cat games category or kids games free. Try this awesome platformer game now and tell us what you think!
release_text: Running Zola contains 3 chapters: - Cemetery Zola - Zola Underground - Zola in the Village You have 2 game modes: - Story Mode : Finish 3 beautifull adventures - Endurange Mode : Stay alive as long as you can

description: With this app you accompany your Team on the road to the european championship 2016 in France. It provides all necessary information of the EC qualification: - Match Schedule - Live Results - Live Table - Countdown As soon as all participating teams are set, this App will be updated to be the fastest goal alert in Europe.
release_text: - Match schedules qualifiers 2016 - Live results - Live table

description: What happens when you're the coolest robot in the world? … Everyone wants to be you. In this cool, arcade, action, shooter, game, the Cast Iron Robot, the fastest, strongest, coolest robot in the known universe, had won every Robot War the world had ever seen, without a problem … until he was cloned! Now Cast Iron Robot has to fight himself! For the first time ever, he needs help. Will you help the original Cast Iron Robot to defeat the hordes of robot clones? ~ EASY GAMEPLAY ~ * Move Cast Iron Robot by touching the left side of the screen * Shoot by tapping or holding down on the right side of the screen * Avoid all flying debris * Collect coins to upgrade character Can you help the real Cast Iron Robot fight off the most clones and collect the most coins?
release_text: null

description: The Carp Rig Guide will show you how to tie some of the most successful carp fishing rigs ever, in both step by step stages and high quality video footage. Making it easier to tie even the most tricky carp fishing rigs - wherever you are!
release_text: Fixed bug found in Android v4.

description: Promotion as $9.99 (50% off of the regular price: $19.99) !! Want to play 3D PC games on your tablet? Now, with the "Best of CES 2012" award-winning Splashtop Remote PC Gaming, you CAN! Skyrim, Civilization 5, Wow, Diablo, Portal, PES2012, and even more with CUSTOMIZABLE on-screen maneuver and tablet gestures! See more demo videos: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cHj2A97QPDs http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zdTULDTLs7A http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eIiRfQZl6sU http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NB3GXbputxo Notice: #.If you have upgraded Splashtop Streamer on your PC to v2, please check out http://support-remote.splashtop.com/entries/21658867 for settings. Splashtop Remote PC Gaming is the ONLY remote desktop app that streams smooth, high-res video and audio from your PC or Mac, allowing you to play games on your tablet. you can also use it to access all other applications, and files. ★★★★★ Best of CES 2012 Award – Best Mobile App ★★★★★ "Both a breakthrough and a bargain." -- The New York Times ★★★★★ "Splashtop -- Meet the most popular app." -- USA Today ★★★★★ "Splashtop Remote is... extremely easy to setup" -- Pixelatedgeek.com With Splashtop Remote PC Gaming, you can * Play graphic-intensive games on your tablet with optimized gesture (see notice 1) * Play Flash games on your browser * Listen to music on your computer in any format * Access your full computer browser (IE, Firefox, Chrome, Safari) including your bookmarks, favorite plug-ins, and extensions (Flash, Java, etc.) See it in action here: http://youtu.be/PBnmYeyAMf4 Fast and Easy Setup (see notice 2): * One-click access to your computer desktop with minimal setup * Install the free Splashtop Streamer on your computer - supports Windows 7, Vista, and XP (including Home Premium), as well as Mac OS X 10.6+ (Snow Leopard or Lion is required for Mac users). * Application automatically finds your local computers -- sign in to your Gmail account on the app and Streamer to find your computers across the Internet * A computer with dual-core CPU on remote PC strongly recommended for best performance Notice: 1.To enjoy 3D games such as Skyrim, you need to have a powerful PC, ideally with NVIDIA GeForce graphics, and a good Wi-Fi signal and performance(ideally a 802.11n Wi-Fi router). 2.Splashtop Remote PC Gaming for tablets running Android 4.x. 3.If you are willing to play with XBox 360 controller from your Android tablet, you need to do some special setting on your computer, please refer to this FAQ page: https://support-splashtoppersonal.splashtop.com/entries/25600766

description: This is the unlock key for Synker, The Sync Widget. You must have Synker version 1.1.9 or greater installed before purchasing this key. Synker will automatically discover this key and transition to the ad-free mode. NOTE: The unlock key will be unable to successfully validate if ‘lucky patcher’, a known piracy application, is installed on the target device. -- Removes Synker Advertisements -- Removes Advertisement Blocker Nag Screen -- Removes Global Nag Screen -- Allow usage of themes not signed by afterhoursdevelopers.com -- Unlocks Accounts and Sync Inspector -- Unlocks Account Auto-sync Settings Tasker/Locale plug-in -- More unlocked features… coming soon Check out the Synker FAQ. http://goo.gl/1s2YZ Our YouTube channel with videos including Tasker and Synker as a plug-in. http://goo.gl/3GxMT Join the Synker beta tester community, for the latest and greatest! http://goo.gl/qunzZ

description: Lots of fun stories to read and laugh about. Perfect if you have a funny story to pull at a party. The stories are divided into different categories such as Animal jokes", "Blond jokes", "Doctor jokes", "Lightbulb jokes", "Naughty jokes" and others. Support for stories in English and Swedish
release_text: - 1.4.1 - Fix problem with AdMob using some CPU power during app pause - 1.4.0 - Added support for fun stories in english - 1.3.0 - Auto scrolls to beginning after update Improved faulthandling if lost internet connection Fixed bug for uploaded stories - 1.2.2 - Added rotating refresh icon. Automatically changes textsize for large screens Added menu with support for uploading fun story - 1.1.2 - Graphical improvements

description: Copter Classic is the android version of popular game called Copter. Pilot your helicopter through cave, avoiding obstacles in your way. Simply tap to fly up, and release to let gravity take the copter down. HOW TO PLAY 1.Touch the screen and hold to rise the helicopter. 2.Release to lower the helicopter. 3.Avoid blocks by flying around them. 4.Drive the copter for as long as you can without crashing 4. Share your best time with rest of the world Features Pause and Resume Mute Sound

description: Coin in Phone is a magic trick you can perform with a phone, a coin and a marker. A coin is marked by a spectator, and appears to go below the phone glass. Initially the coin is stuck, but then it can be dragged under the glass, and then visually slides out of the phone. Selected feedback from users: ♦ I have been a member of the Magic Castle for over 20 years and this is as good as it gets. ♦ Awesome effect. Very clever convincers. Clear instructions and customizable settings. I am so glad I found this. ♦ Top Banana ! Can't stop playing with this app. Very clever idea. I love doing magic and this has blown me away. Supports many coins from many countries. We add more when requested. To check if your country and coin are supported, look at this list: http://goo.gl/ZV7iTl Note: When installed, the app name is "CiP" and the icon looks like a sketch of a coin on a sketch of a phone. This is so that if others see this app name or icon, they do not suspect that it is about coin magic.

description: Your ratings are important to us. If you like the app please rate it - preferably with 5 stars ;) New York made easy... for you You live in a big, loud, wonderful city where lots of incredible things are happening all the time. So many things, in fact, that you can easily miss brilliant events and great nights out in the excitement. That’s where the Time Out New York app comes in. It’s got all the great stuff in New York (the concerts, bars, restaurants, clubs, film openings and more) in one place – your phone. The Time Out New York app is easy to browse and you can tailor your search to where you are and what you’re doing. Just met friends and want to impress them with a brilliant undiscovered bar? No problem: check the app. Come out of a movie and need a great late-night place to eat nearby? Easy: check the app. The Time Out New York app is constantly updated with new events, giving you hundreds of options throughout the day. No matter how busy you are, you need never miss out. And there was one other thing… ah yes: it’s free. Features: Geo-location – we pinpoint where you are, and show you all the recommended activities nearby on a map, complete with event previews. Easy browsing – whether you’re looking for a great gig or a top-notch restaurant, you can browse by type of activity, area, even the kind of food you want to eat. Up-to-date listings – event listings and previews are updated daily so you can access information on all the latest goings-on in New York.

description: Do you want to see the future? Look old without the aging! Lots of fun with this hi-tech app that makes you look old. Take better care of your health, knowing how you might look. A new visualization app that adds the effects of aging to any frontal photo. The app employs automatic face recognition to detect the eyes, mouth, and chin, and advanced image processing to simulate how that face would appear if a person would be 70-100 years old. Photos may be taken from the Gallery or camera, and shared using Facebook, Twitter, eMail, or MMS (from the picture gallery, once it's saved). The app includes both automatic and manual controls, and works with any Android. Feature Highlights: ✔ See what someone would look like if they were old ✔ Hi-tech image processing of actual photos produces realistic results ✔ Works on any Android device. ✔ Automatic and manual controls ✔ Share results from within the app using Facebook, Twitter, eMail, or MMS (from the picture gallery, once it's saved). Whether the subject finds it horrifying or hilarious, Age Kiosk © HD gives pranksters the ability to automatically add the effects of age to any frontal photo. For best results the developers recommend the use of good quality photos, taken in close-up, at a full-frontal angle. It is also helpful if the subject's head is not tilted, and they should be smiling. With these conditions met, the automatic facial recognition of the app locates the position and dimensions of the eyes, mouth, and chin. Users can create custom effects using the manual controls to outline the photo's reference points. Be ready to look your appearance. Look below at the samples!
