description: What's it worth on eBay? That's what you want to know before selling your stuff on eBay or anywhere else. The eValuator app determines a realistic average price from items successfully sold in the past weeks. Perfect to find out what you can earn selling something, or to check if a promising bargain really is one. The ideal app for any powerseller, sales agent, ambitioned eBayer and for use on flea markets, yard sales and more ... Experience with eBay website (completed listings) is advised to fully take advantage of this app! Features: ===================== * Ad-free version * Supports ebay.at, ebay.ca, ebay.com, ebay.co.uk, ebay.com.au, ebay.ch, ebay.de, ebay.fr, ebay.ie, ebay.it, ebay.nl, ebay.es * Shows estimated price, shipping, price range and net profit at a glance * Statistics show price by day of week and price distribution graph * Search by condition (new, used, ...) and in subcategories * Browse the completed listings found for your search * Adjustable filter: Ignore items containing certain words (eg, defective) Copyright: =================== eBay (R) is a registered trademark of eBay Inc. This app is a private project and is in no way related to eBay Inc., Important: =================== Since April 2010 search in completed items is possible without an eBay account on most country sites. This might change again in the future, in which case the app will inform you. Until then the login only gives you advantages calculating the shipping to your personal location. Of course your account data remains on your device exclusively and is never sent to me, or to other third parties! It is only used to securely login to the eBay website via HTTPS/SSL. Just use the app without login, if you still have concerns! This app is under active development! Suggestions and bug reports are welcome! Reviews of course too ;-) Please note that due to technical reasons this app may be updated quite often! Do not install if this is a problem for you.

description: Minor Emergencies gives you the practical guidance you need to handle a wide range of non-life-threatening medical crises with speed and expertise. Completely updated with the latest equipment, devices, dosages, and techniques, this compact and portable medical reference book delivers fast, efficient guidance just when you need it. With Minor Emergencies on hand, you'll always be prepared wherever you are! You don't need the Internet or cellular data to view the app. Once you have purchased the app, the full content is downloaded onto your device so that everything from viewing images and videos to searching is lightning fast. This app is optimized for whatever size device you are using, either phone or tablet. This app is easy to navigate, allowing you to browse the contents or search for key words and phrases. The search tool will find text, figures and videos with one single fast search. The search tool shows you suggested words as you type so it is quick and helps with spelling issues. The text search results show the most relevant results at the top of the text search. This app lets you create bookmarks and notes, allowing you to customize the content to fit your needs. You can also change the text size for easier reading. This app also includes 38 narrated videos of various procedures to enhance your learning. Disclaimer: This app is intended for the education of healthcare professionals and not as a diagnostic and treatment reference for the general population. This interactive app is based on the full content of Minor Emergencies, 3rd Edition by Elsevier. Authors: Philip Buttaravoli, MD FACEP Fellow of the American College of Emergency Physicians Adjunct Assistant Professor in the Department of Emergency Medicine Fletcher Allen Health Care Burlington, Vermont Stephen M. Leffler, MD FACEP Fellow of the American College of Emergency Physicians Professor of Emergency Medicine University of Vermont College of Medicine Fletcher Allen Health Care Burlington, Vermont Based on the Elsevier text: Minor Emergencies, 3rd edition, 2012 Developed by Usatine Media, LLC Richard P. Usatine, MD, Co-President, Professor of Family Medicine, Professor of Dermatology, University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio Peter Erickson, Co-President, Lead Software Developer

description: Really smart bowling game! Top 3D graphics, realistic physics and double player option! Nice lane themes and many ball colors. The ball motion, rotation and controlling is amazing. If you love bowling, you would love this addictive game. Put your name in world ranking! How To Play smart bowling: 1. Drag the ball to left or right to position it. 2. Put finger on the ball and flip to the pins to throw. 3. Gesture curve on the screen to rotate the ball. The speed and angle of flipping determine the motion of the ball. Play it. Love it! 10-PIN BOWLING GAME RULES: A game is divided into 10 frames, each frame has 10 pins. The player is given 2 opportunities to knock down all 10 pins in a frame. STRIKE - a strike is awarded when all ten pins are knocked down with the first ball. The player is awarded ten points, plus a bonus of whatever is scored with the next 'two' balls. SPARE - a spare" is awarded when a player uses both balls of a frame to clear all 10 pins. The player is awarded ten points, plus a bonus of whatever is scored with the next ball. A player can score maximum of 300 points. See Wikipedia for more details. We welcome your rating and comments.

description: Have you sent a parcel and would like to know whether it has been delivered? App functionalities : - Postcodes – Validate addresses and postcodes - Deliveries – Track your parcels and mail in real time and request SIGA service for an undeliverable item. - CTT sales points– Information on CTT post offices and agencies closer to you and the services available. - SIGA request – Re-forward your mail to another address or CTT sales point. - Tolls – Check the tolls amounts in debt and request the MB references to pay.

developer: GiggleUp Kids Apps And Educational Games
description: Puzzle games are an early learning favorite for educators and children alike! By matching the shapes to complete the picture, kids will have a ball while developing important skills such as problem solving and shape, pattern and color recognition. This game is intuitive and fun, with beautifully illustrated graphics, voice narration and more! More than a shape puzzle game, Awesome Shape Puzzle 123 is also a picture dictionary featuring more than 150 sight words. Choose from 12 different categories of everyday words, as well as numbers and letters. When a puzzle is completed, the word is read aloud and spelled out. This is a great, gentle way to reinforce previously learnt words for preschool aged children, or to introduce reading to the younger kids. Accompanied by a friendly voice-over, children are encouraged to match the shapes to complete the puzzle at their own pace. Different playing modes allow the youngest mind to creatively play and explore with shapes and colors, while older kids are given more challenging puzzles to master. This is a versatile educational app that is suitable for children with special needs. KEY FEATURES - Kid-friendly interface with no complicated menus - More than 150 pictures and sight words for children to learn - 12 puzzle categories: shapes, numbers, dinosaurs, fruits, vegetables, toys, vehicles, ocean creatures, musical instruments, farm animals, playground equipment, and the alphabet - Clear and pleasant voice guide spoken by native speakers - Available in 15 languages: English, French, Spanish, Japanese, German, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Russian, Dutch, Portuguese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese and Italian. - Adjustable game modes to suit different age groups for kids - Multiple difficulty levels to train your puzzle skills - Pleasant music track that can be easily switched on or off - Parental lock for safe playing Awesome Shape Puzzles 123 is the latest all new educational app to join the much-loved Jigsaw Puzzles 123 which has been among the best-selling kids games all over the world. -------------- Connect with us! Visit us: http://www.GiggleUp.com Like us: facebook.com/GiggleUpApps Follow us: twitter.com/GiggleUpApps Email us: Support@GiggleUp.com Brought to you by GiggleUp, creators of the award-winning Interactive Telling Time and other educational apps and games for kids. Our goal is to promote learning through play with the purpose of helping children develop useful learning skills. Our apps are enjoyed by children, at home or in the classroom, all around the world!

description: Nida Harb 2 Rogue generals are roaming the lands destroying everyone in their paths, take command of your own base and destroy your enemies in Nida Harb 2. Prove your might by fortifying your base with deadly towers, ranging from high caliber machine gun towers that mow your enemies down to high-tech laser towers that incinerate flesh and armor alike. Unleash your power by commanding your mighty troops in battle, rain death on your enemies using the advanced Venom aircraft, obliterate the enemy defenses using the Fearless mechanical warriors known as Hercules, employ many more troops in a mix of strategy to dominate your opponent. Customize your troops using hundreds of equipment’s designed for each class, equip your soldiers with AK-47’s to increase their attack power, enhance your tanks defense by installing advanced energy shields, the choice is yours. Employ generals under your command to lead forth your troops in battle from his advanced MagLev tank or Rail tank. The general increases the powers of your units in battle and insures victory against your foes. Create an alliance with your friends, send and receive reinforcements to bolster your offensive and defensive capabilities in battle, rally your alliance to dominate the charts and win gold in alliance tournaments. For the lone wolves out there, participate in the championship tournament where all of the players face off in one versus one battles to prove who the supreme commander is, and the title displayed proudly for all to see in addition to a multitude of rewards. War is coming commander, are you prepared?

description: Just like jewels star and ice crush, it's a fast-paced hypnotic match three game that challenges your combination of speed and strategy. Get the new high scores and battle with your friends! How to play: The objective of the game is to swap one gem with an adjacent gem to form a horizontal or vertical chain of three or more gems. Click the first gem and then click the gem you want to swap it with. If the movement is correct, they will swap and the chained gems will disappear. Bonus points are given when more than three identical gems are formed. Sometimes chain reactions, called cascades, are triggered, where chains are formed by the falling gems. Cascades are awarded with bonus points.

description: Experience a Marvel of modern engineering in this V22 Osprey Flight Simulator. A multi-mission, tilt rotor aircraft with both vertical takeoff and landing (VTOL), and short takeoff and landing (STOL) abilities. In a program that costed the United States government 35 billion dollars, and spanned over 15 years, the V22 Osprey was inducted into the United States Marine Corps in 2007, followed by a United States Air Force in 2009. The V22 Osprey has seen combat in Iraq, Afghanistan, Sudan and Libya. Part Aircraft, part Helicopter, it brings the best of two worlds into one machine- vertical landing and takeoff abilities of a Helicopter and the cruise speed of an Aircraft. Given its unique capabilities, it posed a challenge for flight training. Since induction, the Osprey had 3 crashes involving 6 fatalities. This Flight Simulator by TeaPOT Games, is extremely physics accurate, and offers the primary flight controls and functions of the osprey such as Engine power, Nacelle tilt, roll, pitch, yaw, landing gear, and brakes. It doesn't emulate the secondary and tertiary flight controls, given the input limitations of mobile devices. Set in the Callagher islands, 12 missions take the player through the flight controls of V22 Osprey and complicated objectives. A free fly mode offers the player to land anywhere he/she wants and play with the Osprey. Unlike most Flight Simulator games, V22 Osprey Flight Simulator doesn't stop simulation upon coming into contact with a crash point, it continues into a post crash simulation, with parts coming off of the Osprey. The dynamic crash simulation extend even for the landing gear and the engine propellers. Settings screen enables features that provide more Flight simulation options from realistic nacelle tilt speed to landing gear strength and many more. Hope you enjoy our V22 Osprey Flight Simulator. If you have any feedback or issues about our game, or the fidelity of simulation it offers, write to us support@teapotgames.in This Flight Simulator is neither endorsed nor supported by the United States Army, or Bell Helicopter, or the Boeing RotorCraft Systems. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/teapotgames Twitter: https://twitter.com/TeaPOTGames

description: The first made-for-tablet story that challenges the conventions of the tablet reading experience The Last Hunt features: – Smooth, intuitive scrolling that provides a seamless storytelling experience – A compelling narrative about family and tradition – Beautiful images by Montreal photographer Alexi Hobbs – Text overlaid with parallaxing interactive animation Offering a new kind of interactive reading experience, The Last Hunt explores the strength of family bonds and the spirituality implicit in the act of hunting, delving deeply into the motivations that led Montreal photographer Alexi Hobbs to document his grandfather’s last hunting expedition. To follow the story, which stretches from the present moment back to the Second World War, app users scroll vertically through text overlaid with delicate, parallaxing interactive animation that challenges the conventions of the tablet reading experience. Produced by the National Film Board of Canada Created by the NFB Digital Studio Story and Photography by Alexi Hobbs

description: WifiDroid is a lightweight webserver-service with a small footprint that enables wireless transfer of files between your android device and your computer, connected to it on the same WiFi network. WifiDroid lets you stream your music and videos from your android device to your PC browser.View photos and files in a tabular form, upload and download files/folders without any restrictions, wirelessly. All this at no cost whatsoever. Features include: 1.Simple to use web-interface to manage and view files. 2.Being lightweight, delivers results quickly. 3.Stream music,videos and media like camera shots and pictures through the browser. 4.Image Preview:mouse-over on any kind of image to generate a preview without clicking on the picture. 5.Click on any jpeg-image to start the image gallery. 6.Ability to queue multiple uploads. 7.Security being paramount,provision to secure-access with a password. 8.Change port settings,if port is already taken by some other device. 9.Optional vibration on service start/stop. 10.Service runs in the background to ease multitasking. 11.Thumbnails and album art for media types.. 12.Designed to be easy to use and manage files effectively. 13.Wifi File Transfer, Wifi File Explorer & Wireless File Manager all rolled into one. 14.Links to view media like photos,videos and music. 15.Now includes a media player and audio player in the app to view your media in the same window. 16.Media player uses html5 with a flash fallback to support incompatible browsers. 17.Find any document,file/folder on your android device using the search feature. 18.Added a media rescan feature which updates the database when new files are added/uploaded to the sdcard. 19.Tested on IE(8 and above),Safari,Firefox and Chrome. 20.File filters to view only the media you need.Search by artist,album,image-type or video type. 21.Sort by date,file-size and file name for files and artist,album and album name for media . 22.Pagination to control the number of entries displayed in the table per page. 23.Drag and Drop File upload. 24.Works with hotspot mode enabled. 25.Encrypt your connection using SSL/TLS on public networks. Many more features in the pipleine. Any queries, feature requests or to report bugs, drop us a line at wifidroid2012@gmail.com PS:If the app does not work in your case please drop us a line mentioning the handset/tablet model at wifidroid2012@gmail.com.The app displays ads which serve as some kind of incentive for the dev to update the application. Thank you for understanding. Tags: Free Wifi File Transfer , Explorer, Manager, Wireless

description: (Note: you also need Paul Laughton's BASIC! on your Android device (available on Google Play), and the BASIC! Launcher PC Package on your computer.) BASIC! is a simple yet powerful dialect of Dartmouth Basic that allows you to write and run programs directly on your Android device. While BASIC! includes a built-in editor, many users expressed the need to write their program on their own computer, and be able to test it on Android with a simple press of a key. BASIC! Launcher offers you that: you get the comfort of a keyboard + big screen as well as a rich code editor and by pressing F5 your program is instantly transfered over the air and launched on your Android device for immediate testing. After download, run the BASIC! Launcher (WiFi) on your Android device and hit the Home key to send it to the background. The app will intercept transfers from your computer and launch the incoming program. No additional configuration needed; as long as computer and phone are on the same LAN they autodetect each other. You will need in addition to this app: - BASIC! (on your Android) https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rfo.basic - BASIC! Launcher PC Package (on your computer) http://mougino.free.fr/basiclauncher.html NB1: the transfer of the file can also be done by cable with the Android device plugged to your computer (USB-debugging option needs to be activated). In this case you don't need the BASIC! WiFi Launcher of course, but you still need BASIC! and the BASIC! Launcher PC Package. See details at http://mougino.free.fr/basiclauncher.html NB2: after developing and testing your BASIC! program, you could be interested to build it into an APK and distribute it (for example on Google Play) then have a look at my other software RFO-BASIC! App Builder at http://mougino.free.fr/appbuilder.html BASIC! Launcher (WiFi) was written in BASIC! for Android and compiled with RFO-BASIC! App Builder. Its source code is under GNU GPL license and available at http://mougino.free.fr/basiclauncher_sourcecode.html
release_text: v0.8 - Added a Code Finder dialog listing functions and labels: press F2 (configurable) in SciTE or Notepad++ to jump quickly to other parts of your program - Updated the keyword list with RFO-BASIC! v01.86 - Updated Notepad++ to v6.7.7 and Scite to v3.5.5 Don't forget to update PC version to v0.8 at http://mougino.free.fr/basiclauncher.html

description: As a powerful emulator of HP 15C Scientific Calculator, Vicinno 15C Scientific Calculator provides all functions of the world-renowned HP 15C RPN high-end scientific programmable calculator for Android. It uses the identical mathematics and calculations with the original to give you the same precision and accuracy. It can perform numerical integration and solve the roots of equations in addition to supporting complex numbers and matrix calculations. **** Cool Tip: click the upper right logo to see the settings page for more options. **** **** Please be noted: the f (i) in our app works a little differently from the real calculator: instead of hold and release, just click the f (i), the display will show the imaginary part for a second, then switch to real part automatically. ***** ★ Features include: • Root finder • Numeric integration • Complex numbers • Matrix operations • Hyperbolic and inverse hyperbolic trig functions • Probability (combinations and permutations) • Factorial, % change, and absolute value • Random number generator • RPN entry • Programmable • enable/disable key click sound • Comma as decimal point option • Automatically save/restore settings • Touch logo to see all settings • Direct access to support forum from app • Support Android Tablet • More ★ Support: Feel free to contact us at support@vicinno.com . ★ Stay tuned: Like us: www.facebook.com/vicinno Follow us: www.twitter.com/vicinno

description: Download our new retro Zombie game, Zombie Rundown, and try to run over as many zombies as you can in your camouflage truck - redneck style! Many achievements to try for! - Go for a top speed. - Try to squash as many zombies as you can! - Kill multiple zombies in a row for a more difficult achievement. description: Kamus Besar Bahasa Indonesia (KBBI) Pusat Bahasa adalah kamus ekabahasa resmi bahasa Indonesia yang disusun oleh Tim Penyusun Kamus Pusat Bahasa dan diterbitkan oleh Balai Pustaka. Kamus ini menjadi acuan tertinggi bahasa Indonesia yang baku, karena kamus ini merupakan kamus bahasa Indonesia terlengkap dan yang paling akurat yang pernah diterbitkan oleh penerbit yang memiliki hak paten dari pemerintah Republik Indonesia. Kamus laring (offline) ini tidak memerlukan koneksi internet untuk pencarian, indeks pencarian diurutkan berdasarkan kata dasar, penjelasan dan turunan dari kata dasar tidak menjadi bagian indeks pencarian agar pencarian dapat lebih cepat dilakukan. Data disarikan dari Kamus Besar Bahasa Indonesia. Sumber data: http://pusatbahasa.kemdiknas.go.id/kbbi Big Indonesian Dictionary (KBBI) Language Center is the official Indonesian monolingual dictionary compiled by the Center for Language Dictionary Drafting Team and published by Balai Pustaka. This dictionary Indonesian became the highest reference standard, because this dictionary is a complete dictionary and Indonesian are the most accurate ever published by a publisher who has the patent rights from the Indonesian government. Dictionary larynx (offline) it does not require an internet connection to search, index search sorted by word basis, and the explanation derived from the word does not become part of the search index so that the search can be expedited. Data abstracted from the Dictionary of Indonesian. Data source: http://pusatbahasa.kemdiknas.go.id/kbbi

description: TrackerSavvy is a cool Android app that will help you organize and manage your day to day life. It offers a weight, water, expenses and time tracker specially designed to be very easy to use and time saver and yet a very powerful and flexible tool. Weight Tracker • Logs your weight records • Built-in BMI calculator (Body Mass Index) • Excellent tool while on a diet or weight-loss program • Weight Chart / Graph to visualize your progress Water Tracker • Monitors your daily water intake with a very intuitive interface (by tapping cups to drink them) • Set reminders to help you remember to drink water through the day at customisable intervals • Keeps track of all your past records • Excellent tool for workouts, exercises and diets Expenses Tracker • Logs your expenses using different categories so that you can easily see where your money is going! • Calculates your current balance • Bill reminder section - allows you to add upcoming payments notifications Time Tracker • Logs the time you spend doing different tasks • Easily lets you see where you have been spending most of your time Profile • Set weight & water goals • Displays the current state of your trackers (current weight, water today, current balance & last task) and displays a preview of your trackers • Add your height to use the built-in BMI calculator SD Card backup and restore. USER REVIEWS: • "Amazing app!! The interface is easy to use and elegant, it alerts me to drink water and I'm able to keep tract of my finances & weight!" • "Excellent app! I use it to manage my weight and pair it with myfitnesspal to count the daily calories" • "Does exactly what I need it to do. I use it to keep track of my weight loss and diet. Very user friendly." • "Brilliantly simple and intuitive. I look forward to the upgrade version with graphs charts etc. Hopefully not before too long" • "Everything I need to track in one place" • "Brilliant app! The water notifications are very cool and the finances tracker is much needed. 5*" • "Helps me know how much water I'm drinking" ** Upgrade to the Pro vesion to get access to all features and to remove the ads. ** Settings water reminders: - Go to the water tracker section - Tap the button on the top right corner - Select "Reminder" - On the new popup choose the hours you want to be reminded by editing "From" and "To" options - Press "Save" to start getting notified! App's settings: - Press "Menu" from its main screen - Select "Preferences" Please Note: The App2SD card is intentionally deactivated because it would affect the way the water reminders and bill reminders work. This app can also be used in combination with apps like Noom ,Calorie Counter and/or Calorific (especially if following a diet) Please e-mail us instead of just leaving a comment, so we can investigate and fix issues. Thank you! • Full Twitter integration You can now follow the app's news and updates by following it on Twitter @TrackerSavvy! • We are also on Facebook - just search for "TrackerSavvy" • If you are a "Diet Assistant" user, your weight records will be used this app. Note: You can also use the expenses / finances tracker to record items purchased online by PayPal, Google Checkout, eBay, Amazon and others; just add a custom category called PayPal, etc. keywords: trackers, savvy, savy, weight, weigh, diet, diets,weight-loss, time recording, task recorder, timesheet,expenses tracking, save money, bill reminder, financial planner, times, shopsavvy, finance manager, home, finances, bank statements, utilities, utility, account, counter, budget planner, drinking water, water cup, glass, drink, journal, recorder,time clock, worktime, overtime

description: “All my assistants started by playing this awesome game” Indiana J. “This tapping game is great! Digging has never been this fun!” Dyno Daily Times + Have fun digging and exploring the lost world of dinosaurs Children will all enjoy the various game modes. The most appealing of all is definitely digging. Like a true explorer, look for all the bones hidden underground to build the dinosaur skeleton. The children who tried it could not stop digging. They will learn about dinosaurs with puzzles and sound effects and can color the characters using a magic brush. The game graphics are carefully designed and full of color. Animations were created for the youngest players and the game is packed with information on dinosaurs. Plenty of fun for your children and yourself. * Dig for all the dinosaur bones * Assembles the dinosaur skeleton with the bones you have found * Play and learn with puzzles, animations and sound effects * Color all the dinosaurs with a magic brush * Read about all the dinosaurs in the game Try it now, you will not be disappointed. Your children will have plenty of fun. * NOTE on title "Archaeologist": we would like to point out that the science that studies dinosaurs is Paleontology. However, the protagonists of the saga of the archaeologist will not take care only of dinosaurs. Joe is an explorer, he likes to dig, find hidden objects; his wife, Bonnie, is a paleontologist and soon, there will be other characters and new adventures, looking for other mysterious objects. description: Constance, Billie and Sergeant Block are back in this follow-up to the award-winning Couch-to-5K® training app (2012 Appy Award for best Healthcare & Fitness app). Designed to continue the training experience for people who finish the Couch-to-5K plan, or for those who are already 5K-ready, this app uses motivating virtual coaches to get you ready to run a 10K (6.2-mile) race in 9 weeks. Spend just 25 to 70 minutes, three times a week, for nine weeks, and you’ll be 10K-ready! ------------------------------------------------ APP FEATURES ------------------------------------------------ • Choose from 4 different virtual coaches—Constance, Billie, Sergeant Block and a NEW coach, Pumpkin the Poodle—who give you motivation and support in every workout • Hear real-human audio cues to guide you through each workout • Listen to your favorite playlists with in-app music player • Calculate your distance & pace and map your routes with FREE GPS support (built-in GPS hardware required) • Gradually challenge yourself with progressively faster paces • Log your workouts and share your progress on Facebook Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. THIS APP AND ANY INFORMATION GIVEN BY IT OR THE ACTIVE NETWORK INC. ARE FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY. THEY ARE NOT INTENDED NORIMPLIED TO BE A SUBSTITUTE FOR PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL ADVICE. YOU SHOULD ALWAYS CONSULT YOUR HEALTHCARE PROVIDER BEFORE BEGINNING ANY FITNESS PROGRAM. IN PARTICULAR, THE ACTIVITIES AND EXERCISES DESCRIBED IN TRAINING PROGRAMS AND ARTICLES ON ACTIVE CAN BE DANGEROUS AND MAY RESULT IN INJURY OR DEATH. YOU MUST CONSULT WITH A LICENSED PHYSICIAN BEFORE PARTICIPATING IN ANY OF THE ACTIVITIES DESCRIBED IN THE APPLICATION.

description: Keep track of your weight - calculate and monitor your body mass index (BMI) and waist to height ratio (WHtR). Track your weight state on charts, compare it with other family members, easily edit archived entries. The body mass index (BMI), or Quetelet index, is a measure for human body shape based on an individual's mass and height. It is defined as the individual's body mass divided by the square of their height. The waist-to-height ratio (WHtR) of a person is defined as the person's waist circumference, divided by the person's height. The WHtR is a measure of the distribution of body fat. Supported units: - height/length: cm, inch, ft - weight: kg, lb. Application contains one standard banner ad. Permissions: - ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, INTERNET - ads. - WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - backup/restore history.

description: ★━どこトレNews━━━━━━━ 　使いやすさを追求し一新！ 　待望の大幅リニューアル！！ ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━★ 通勤・通学の移動中やちょっとした待ち時間に どこでもトレーニング！ 宅地建物取引主任者資格試験に合格するなら！大好評どこトレシリーズの『どこトレ 宅建 無料版』 宅建の過去問（直近1回分）を解説付きで収録！！不動産業や不動産証券化事業の方、金融機関や独立開業、店舗出店する方にも！ ∞---- アプリ7つの★ポイント ----∞ 1. 学習しやすい「○×形式」の問題 2. わかりやすい「独自の解説」 3. 効率的に勉強できる「複数学習モード」 4. 有料版は合格を目指すのに十分な「問題数」 5. 最新の「法改正に対応」 6. 教材や機能を随時「アップデート」 7. 購入者からの「合格」報告多数！！ 　*有料版は「予想問題」と、「直近4回分の過去問題」が追加 ■5つの学習メニュー 【1.トレーニング】 ランダム出題、間違えた問題などから学習状況にあった学習をしよう！ 【2.実力テスト】 各回の過去問題や分野別のカスタマイズ問題で色々な角度から実力を試そう！ 【3.成績】 学習状況、進捗度合いをみながら自分の得意分野、不得意分野を確認しよう！ 【4.ブックマーク】 復習に便利なブックマークモード。試験前に見直したい問題はチェックしておこう！ 【5.設定】 文字のサイズ変更や自動ブックマーク（解除）機能設定で効率的に学習しよう！ その他アプリ内電卓機能やブックマーク・成績データクリアなど便利機能満載！ ∞--------おわりに--------∞ ■どこでもトレーニング ＝ 『どこトレ』って？ ★『どこトレ シリーズ』は、その分野を深く熟知したメンバーが、常に「シンプルで軽快な操作感」、「試験のツボを押さえた教材質」、「安定したアプリ質」を意識し、通勤・通学の移動中やちょっとした待ち時間に効率良くサクサク学習できるように心がけ作り上げてます。これからも『どこトレ』をよろしくお願いします。

description: Simplify and organize all your gift shopping, fast! • Quickly list people by typing or clicking names from contacts. • Add gifts for each person by typing or scanning barcodes. (Barcodes require your device to have a rear-facing camera.) • Assign gifts to any occasion of the year • View complete shopping list where items can be checked off and sorted. • Password protection • Store info about people, such as clothing sizes • Budget by entering prices • Email or text your shopping list or wish list • Customize the app to be as feature-rich or simple as you like Privacy: The read contacts permission is used to get a list of names for you to copy into the list of gift recipients so you won't have to type them. The contacts information is not stored or sent anywhere. The Internet permission is used exclusively to send barcode numbers to Google to retrieve product names. Note: It is not possible to sync contact birthdays, because Android doesn't have a standard method for storing them. Each phone manufacturer has a unique storage format.
release_text: • Fixed barcode scanning by switching to a new UPC database provider. Sorry for the downtime! The previous provider took their site down unexpectedly.

description: Deze app bevat 100% betrouwbare informatie en praktische tips voor ouders/opvoeders met een baby. De app is gekoppeld met het Centrum voor Jeugd en Gezin (CJG) in jouw gemeente en bevat daarmee ook relevante lokale informatie waaronder lokaal nieuws, activiteiten en de contact gegevens van het CJG in jouw gemeente. Maandelijks zal met aansprekende videoproducties of podcasts verslag worden gedaan van ‘trending topics’ over gezond opgroeien en opvoeden. Op deze manier ben je altijd op de hoogte op basis van de best beschikbare, niet commerciële, informatie. Gezonde Baby is een app uit de serie Gezond Opgroeien. Andere apps uit deze serie zijn: Kinderwens, Gezond Zwangeren, Gezonde Peuter, Gezond Basisschoolkind, Gezonde Puber, Gezond Jong Volwassen. This app contains 100% reliable information and practical tips for parents / carers with a baby. The app is associated with the Centre for Youth and Children (CFC) in your municipality and therefore contains relevant local information including local news, activities and contact details of the CFC in your congregation. Monthly basis with compelling video productions or podcasts to report on 'trending topics' on healthy parenting and growing up. This way you are always informed by the best available, non-commercial, information. Healthy Baby is an app from the series Growing Up Healthy. Other apps in this series are: Children, Pregnant Healthy, Healthy Preschool, Elementary Healthy Child, Adolescent Healthy, Healthy Young Adult.

description: ***"A Parents' Choice Recommended Award Winner! ***"Apps for Literacy and Learning, Special Education" - Apple. Freefall Money is a fun educational app for kids to learn how to count money. The app supports practicing with either US or Euro coins. Kids will keep coming back to this learning tool to fill their fish tank with new fish. The more time they spend learning about coins and the math of coins the more fish they will earn. *** Freefall Money continues the #1 ranked Freefall series, including Freefall Spelling *** *** Practice in US or Euro coins *** Three modes of coin math practice: 1. Fill the piggy bank (Scatter Mode) 2. Enter the amount (Type Mode) 3. Add up groups of coins (Cluster Mode) ***TIP*** In the Scatter and Type Modes coins can be stacked on top of one another. Move coins around to be sure you haven't missed one. *Sophisticated fish tank reward system - Earn Fish - Feed Fish - Clean the tank Also, see our award winning app series, ClickySticky™ Follow us on twitter @MergeMobileInc for news and updates.

description: But YES the Hippopotamus! A shy hippopotamus is hesitant to join in the fun that the other animals are having. But little by little, the hippo finds her courage. A fine and funny classic, with over two million copies in print, But Not the Hippopotamus is a favorite anytime book for little readers and their parents. But Not the Hippopotamus is the fifth instalment in the multiple award-winning Boynton Moo Media app series. App Features: • Touch, tap and tilt to bring the story to life! • Boynton has redrawn and recolored the original work, and added all new animations • Includes an all new original instrumental soundtrack by Mike Ford • Realistic page turning interactions just like the original board book • “Meghan Reads it” with word highlighting to improve reading skills • Or “I want to read it myself” and hear individual words pronounced with the tap of a finger Also now available, The Boynton Bundle Collection which includes “The Going to Bed Book”, “Moo, Baa, La La La!”, “Blue Hat, Green Hat”, and “Barnyard Dance!”, for a great discounted price!

description: Tamalaki presents to you: Hidden Object Winter Wonders! The latest installment on our amazing "Wonders" Hidden Object series, let us take you explore mysterious yet gorgeous Winter locations! Game Features: - Play through 100 exciting levels in ARCADE mode! That's more than 4 hours of fun Hidden Objects search! - More than 10 distinct Game Modes: offering you truly different experience through the game! - Player Profile: Create up to 5 profiles so everyone can play! - More than 10 gorgeous scenes, each featuring wondrous winter landscapes. - Match 3 Minigame: When you want to take a quick break from searching for Hidden Objects, play the exciting Match 3 mini game! - Zoom feature: Helps you look for smaller items! - Bonus Game Tips: So you can learn interesting app tips as you play the game! - RELAXED MODE: Play Arcade mode without Timer! (Some game modes are not affected by this setting) - Extras: 4 exciting Game Modes are available under Extras menu when you just want a quick session! Notes: - Some scenes may look a bit darker and harder to find items. It is advised to adjust your device's brightness when this happens. - There are known issues with devices that are overloaded with apps. - Over time, your device's performance may degrade. To ensure maximum performance, try restarting your device prior to playing our game. - If you have problem installing the game, please reach us for help.

description: Fiber Puzzle is a free easy-to-use puzzle game with HD graphics .The goal in Fiber Puzzle is to connect the two terminals along the borders of the board with the optical fiber to make a link between two terminals so that the light can pass through. You can do this by rotating the scattered fiber pieces to form a sing fiber optic link. There are 3 different difficulty levels easy, medium, and hard. Every board is randomly generated. If you cannot figure out the solution you can press menu-> solve and the game will solve the board for you. In fact, every board on this screen can be solved by this way.

description: ★ ★ ★ [WordHero] was a Featured app in Google Play (August 2012) ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Featured in Google Play "Indies" feature repeatedly ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Featured in Google Play "Word Games" feature repeatedly ★ ★ ★ Top multiplayer word search game with realtime leaderboard ranking and online competition. For phones and tablets. We actually answer support emails: sven.wordhero@gmail.com Free, fun and highly addictive for friends who like puzzles and word finding games with letters on infinite levels. === GAME FACTS === ★ Everyone plays the same high quality puzzle at the same time. ★ Each game is only 3 minutes. Perfect for standing in line waiting! ★ At the end, see your rank against everyone else FOR THAT PUZZLE. ★ Compete against 10's of thousands of players. ★ Increase your skill in game Leagues. ★ See your ranking in Leaderboards for last hour, today, this week and month. ★ Friends list - add your friends from Twitter or Facebook by search for email address. ★ Learn new English words - sorry, no Spanish, French, German, Italian, Dutch, Russian & Portuguese support! ★ Profile saved to Cloud (Google App Engine), so you can play on phone and tablet. === GAME PLAY === ★ Similar to Boggle (TM) - spell words on a 4x4 grid of letters (see disclaimer at end) ★ We guarantee EVERY game tile can be used in at least TWO words (bonus points for doing so!) ★ Over 100 words on every puzzle board! ★ Every game is a different challenge, with Theme boards, Digraph games and superboards ★ At the end of a level, see all possible words and your personal statistics ★ Improve your brain (we get emails thanking us from elderly folks!) ★ Enjoy increasing your Vocabulary by learning new words! ★ Can you be the king of the leaderboard and crush your enemies ? === Other features === ★ Add custom text below your name in leaderboards to chat or taunt frenemies. ★ Customize all game colors and choose from multiple background patterns. ★ Have fun and track your spelling skill while learning new dictionary words. ★ Multiple player profiles - your children of all ages can practice spelling. ★ Sounds can be individually muted. ★ No Achievements yet (coming soon). ★ This app is compatible with almost all android mobile phones and tablets including Samsung ,HTC, Motorola, Asus, Sony and others... Disclaimer: Boggle(TM) is a registered trademark of Hasbro, with whom this app is in no way affiliated. WordHero offers a variant of the traditional Boggle, with different rules of game play and board distribution. If you are looking to play traditional Boggle, please visit www.hasbro.com.

description: The Memory-Map app turns your phone or tablet into an outdoor GPS and allows you to navigate with Ordnance Survey Topo maps, 4WD maps or Marine charts, without the need for maintaining a phone signal. How it works Maps are downloaded on-the-fly or uploaded from your PC in advance. Once the app and maps are loaded to the phone or tablet, cellular network coverage or internet connection is not required for real time GPS navigation. Although the Memory-Map app is designed to be used as a standalone GPS navigator, best results are achieved when used in conjunction with Memory-Map on your PC (free download) for planning, printing and loading up maps, waypoints and routes to the phone/tablet Memory-Map includes free access to 1:250,000 scale topographic maps and many other free maps around the world. More detailed maps are available for download and purchase with a free try before you buy, time limited demo option. Available maps include Ordnace Survey, Hema, USGS quads, NOAA, and DeLorme. All maps, including the ones supplied on DVD can be used on your PC and phone. See the help page for details on loading maps to the device from the PC. Features include: Access a vast range of Worldwide maps and charts. Automatically downloads a free map of your current location Create and edit marks and routes. Import and export marks, routes and tracks in the open GPX format Display; Position, Course, Speed, Heading, Altitude and averages Position coordinates include Lat/Long, UTM and GB Grid Units displayed in Statute, Nautical or Metric Support for GPS and Compass sensors, where available. Placename index, Moving map, lock GPS position and automatically scroll the map Records breadcrumb trail / tracklogs. Share position marks or tracklogs as GPX files Proximity Alarm Full marine instrumentation features, with AIS, DSC and Anchor alarm NMEA data interface via WiFi or Bluetooth AIS collision alarm, with adjustable thresholds for Class A and Class B targets Display Alarm notifications and Nav data on Android Wear watch "Verdict: The Memory-Map App is a truly excellent, competent product, representing real value for money. It's straightforward to use, with just enough preference settings and options to describe it as customizable. Route-creation and route-following are ridiculously easy to set up, yet provide a tremendous range of route data. You can also import and export GPX files (via email). A really strong product at this price point." Andrew Knight, Yacht Arabella blog "After buying about 6 navigational applications for my tablet I finally got one that really works the way it should. I now have a handheld version of my sailboat's navigation system. I am very happy with this app and would recommend it to any avid sailor" "I've tried all the mapping/tracking applications I can find and I rate this best. The 1:25k scale is essential for walkers and the ability to create a route at home or to log it (recording your time & distance etc) as you go along is superb. I like the direction indicator to show where you are heading on the map, the ability to save, describe and name tracks is neat. It's easy to slide the map about from your current position to see where you are heading next, the zooming in and out facility is good. I found it reasonably easy to learn how to use." "This is not a cheap navigation program, it is a professional tool for viewing raster maps. And for this purpose, it is excellent. For viewing topo maps, this is the best software and hardware combination for the job, this alone was my reason to get an Android tablet, and it was the right decision." "This is by far the best mapping/GPS app and I've got them all. It's simple to use but has many more user options for points of interest, tracking, routes and maps. "Love this app. Have wanted a chance to use my Memory-Map maps on my Android phone for ages - less devices to carry, and better maps than on my handheld GPS. Easy to use once you get the hang of it too"

Added Intel x86 native compatibility

description: • Four educational games that help kids (ages 6-8) develop reading comprehension • Fill in the blank with the word that makes sense in the sentence • Automatically adjusts difficulty level • Colorful graphics and lively music make this game fun to play • Kid-safe: No third party ads or tracking • Try it for FREE and get access to all sentence groups via in-app purchasing Let the BrainTrain Kids games help develop your child's reading comprehension skills. Children, ages 6 to 8, will go to the farm as they have fun playing and learning. All BrainTrain Kids games are specially created to help children practice cognitive abilities important in school and life. Games automatically increment to the next sentence group after the child has mastered the current group twice. Children will work on thinking speed as they are directed to respond faster and faster. Additionally, you retain control and can adjust the sentence groups yourself. Check out our other products to further train your kid’s brain: • BrainTrain Kids Group It! • BrainTrain Kids ABC Games • BrainTrain Kids Numbers Rock! • BrainTrain Kids Word Right! • BrainTrain Kids Recall It!

description: Vous hésitez à acheter un DVD / Blu-Ray car vous ne savez plus si vous l’avez déjà ? Vous recherchez dans quel film que vous avez déjà vu tel acteur joue ? Vous ne savez pas quoi regarder ce soir parmi vos films ou quoi aller voir au cinéma ? Cette application est faite pour vous !! Inscrivez-vous gratuitement depuis l’application ou le site web ( http://ma-filmotheque.fr ) et commencez à créer votre filmothèque personnelle grâce aux données fournies par Allociné ! REMARQUE : Un média n’est pas trouvé sur Allociné ? Pas de problème : Rendez-vous sur le site web ( http://ma-filmotheque.fr ), connectez-vous, cliquez sur « Ajouter un média », puis sur « Ne pas rechercher sur Allociné », et créez vous-même votre fiche ! Répétez autant de fois que nécessaire l’opération, puis actualisez votre liste de médias sur votre périphérique Android pour voir vos nouvelles fiches ! CARACTÉRISTIQUES : • Affichage personnalisé via des thèmes préenregistrés • L’application vous alerte si vous ajoutez un média déjà présent dans votre liste • Données complètement consultables hors ligne, la connexion n’est nécessaire que pour l’ajout ou l’édition d’un média, et pour l’actualisation de votre liste • Accédez rapidement au média souhaité en utilisant la recherche qui filtre sur vos médias en temps réel • Liste synchronisée avec le site web, ne perdez plus de temps à refaire votre liste sur tous vos périphériques : Connectez-vous et actualisez, c’est tout  • Connectez plusieurs comptes sur le même périphérique et switchez entre chaque facilement ! • Activez / Désactivez la réception de notifications FAQ : • Le bouton d’actualisation a disparu, comment faire maintenant ? Cette nouvelle version utilise le « pull to refresh » : Il vous suffit sur l’écran principal de tirer pour rafraichir, c’est-à-dire d’effectuer un mouvement de haut vers le bas avec un doigt. • Le "fast scroll" (défilement rapide par lettre) a disparu sur la liste de médias, pourquoi ? Cette nouvelle version utilise le composant Android "RecyclerView" au lieu de "ListView" pour plus de performances (et parce que c'est l'évolution du développement Android). Ce composant n'implémente tout simplement pas cette fonctionnalité. Vous pouvez en revanche utiliser le filtre en temps réel sur votre liste en cliquant sur l'icône de loupe pour activer la recherche. • Le bouton d’ajout de média disparait de temps en temps, est-ce normal ? Tout à fait ! Il disparait lorsque vous faites défiler votre liste vers le bas pour ne pas vous cacher des informations. Pour le retrouver, il vous suffit de faire défiler légèrement votre liste vers le haut, et il remontra aussi ! • Mes affiches ne sont plus affichées, pourquoi ? Pour des raisons de propriété intellectuelle, Ma Filmotheque est proposée par défaut sans l’affichage des affiches. C’est à l’utilisateur de prendre la responsabilité de les afficher sur son périphérique en cochant la case correspondante dans les paramètres. • Comment je fais pour voir le film que j’ai ajouté ? Ma Filmotheque est un outil de gestion de VOS médias, il n’est donc pas possible de voir un film / une série depuis ce dernier. • J’ai une question / remarque qui ne figure pas ici, comment je trouve ma réponse ? Vous pouvez me contacter via le menu de l’application, ou via http://ma-filmotheque.fr/contact You hesitate to buy a DVD / Blu-Ray because you do not know if you have already? Looking in what movie you've already seen that actor playing? You do not know what to watch tonight from your movies or whatever go to the movies? This application is for you !! Register for free from the app or the website ( http://ma-filmotheque.fr ) and start creating your own film library using data provided by Allociné! NOTE: Media is not found on Allociné? Not a problem: Visit the website ( http://ma-filmotheque.fr ), sign in, click "Add Media" and then "Do not search on Allociné" and create your own profile! Repeat as many times as necessary operation and refresh your media list on your Android device to see your new cards! FEATURES: • Customized display via pre-recorded themes • The application will alert you if you add a media already present in your list • Fully searchable offline data, the connection is only needed for adding or editing a media, and updating your list • Quickly access the desired media using the search that filters your media in real time • List synchronized with the web site, do not waste time repeating your list on all your devices: Log and update, that's all  • Connect multiple accounts on the same device and between each switchez easily! • Enable / disable receiving notifications FAQ: • The refresh button is gone, how do now? This new version uses the "pull to refresh" Just on the main screen to pull to refresh, that is to say, to make a top downward motion with a finger. • The "fast scroll" (fast change by letter) disappeared on the media list, why? This new version uses the Android component "RecyclerView" instead of "ListView" for performance (and because it is the evolution of the Android development). This component simply do not implement this feature. However, you can use the filter in real time on your list by clicking on the magnifying glass icon to start the search. • The media add button disappears from time to time, is this normal? Very much so! It disappears when you scroll through your list down to not hide information. To find it, simply scroll through your list slightly upward, and he remonstrated too! • My posters are not displayed, why? For reasons of intellectual property, My Filmotheque is proposed by default without displaying posters. It is the user to take responsibility for display on the device by checking the box in the settings. • How do I see the movie that I added? My Filmotheque is YOUR media management tool, so it is not possible to see a movie / series from there. • I have a question / comment that is not listed here, how do I find my answer? You can contact me via the application menu, or via http://ma-filmotheque.fr/contact

description: ********PLEASE READ********** This skin requires the latest UCCW application, this is not a standalone apk. You can get the UCCW app from here: http://goo.gl/1HxY2 Instructions: 1. Install the apk 2. Select to add a widget 3. Find UCCW Widgets 4. Select to add a 3x3 Widget 5. Select to add Battery Clock 6. Resize to your liking Troubleshooting: If for whatever reason the skin does not show up try these procedures. Rooted: 1. Open titanium backup and preform a back up on Battery Clock 2. Unistall Battery Clock via Titanium Backup 3. Then restore via TiBu, App Only 4. Then re-attempt the Instructions. Non-Rooted: Follow the same instructions as root users, except use the application Carbon to back up the application. If you need anymore help please send me an Email, I'll be more than happy to help you!

description: It is the best 4WD simulator game on Google Play! Tear through the mud, blast through the sand and take on the dirt in a rip-roaring 4WD adventure. Extreme Off-Road Rush is an addictive game and full of excitement with a unique driving experience and gorgeous 3d graphics. 4WD enthusiasts will be sucked into this addictive game!!! Extreme Off-Road Rush is a 4WD simulator with realistic controls and great dynamic gameplay.This game is exactly precision driving simulator. Your goal in this game is to park in the designated locations while avoiding obstacles. There is a time limit to keep you on your toes! Your precision driving skills will be tested and pushed to the limit! However be careful not to crush or the game is over. Can you navigate the turns while managing the trailer’s weight? Game Features: • FREE download – and completely free-to-play • Beautiful 4x4 to drive - feel the handling and style! • Various locations and difficulty levels • precision driving simulator • Realistic 3D graphics. • Multiple driving missions with alternate objectives - prove your driving skills! • Adjustable cameras give the perfect view. • Easy of use • Challenging Levels • Realistic Driving Mechanism It is a fun game suitable for both children and adults to play! Extreme Off-Road Rally gives you the ultimate drive ‘n’ park experience. Easy to play but slightly tricky to master. This game sharpens your navigation, precision and reflexes as you park your car while avoiding obstacles. The realistic driving physics and virtual steering wheel can challenge even the most adept gamers. Get the FREE Extreme Off-Road Rush now and find out! This game is also filled with challenging levels and epic cars to keep you entertained for hours! Here are some tips for parking in a lot. • Try to park your car as centered and straight as possible in the space. • If another car is parked at an angle, try to avoid parking beside it. Look for another space if you can. • Be aware of “one way” instructions on the ground or on signs. • Watch for other drivers who may be rushing to get a spot, and not see you pulling out. • Never, ever speed in a parking lot or parking garage, and always slow down at turns. • Make sure your car is pulled all the way into a space so the back isn’t sticking out. • Try not to park at the end of an aisle, where other cars are making lots of turns. Have a lot of fun with this new and unique parking game.

description: Meet the lovely Crash Dummy CID in this excellent platform adventure. The lovable crash impact dummy Cid is getting bored: day in day out he is subjected to the same old safety tests. However, when one fateful day professor Advisor’s daughter is kidnapped by his arch-nemesis D-Troit, Cid finally gets his opportunity to live the life of adventure and become a hero. Take control of Cid and help him rescue M.I.A. trough 16 challenging levels, including 6 Giant Bosses. Whether it’s in sewers, swamps, ice or lava Cid has to fight, run, climb, shoot, and sneak his way past many different brainy puzzles, traps and challenges. Features: - Bringing a classic gaming brand to Android - 16 Challenging levels Including 6 end level bosses. - High quality cartoons and video sequences tell the story. - Different abilities including sneaking, climbing, running and sliding. - Various weapons including bazookas, ice lasers and flamethrowers. - 25 different enemy types. POCKETFULLOFAPPS.COM: "The game graphics and music are great. There is also a very extensive story in the game which I really like. I enjoy playing a game that has a story you have to follow. To quote my son “The game is awesome, I really wish it did not crash“.

description: 대한민국 미생이라면 누구나! 아틀란과 함께 봄을~~ *기간: 2015. 4. 27(월)-5.10(일) *당첨발표: 5.13(수) *참여방법: 이벤트 1, 2 중복 참여 가능 Step1. 구글 플레이에 아틀란3D클라우드 추천 리뷰를 남겨주시고, Step2. 메일( atlan3d@naver.com )또는 페이스북 메시지(www.facebook.com/atlanmap)로 리뷰날짜, 닉네임 발송하면 –끝- 이벤트 경품: GS 주유권 5만원권 20명 샤오미 보조배터리 50명 Step1. 아틀란3D 클라우드 다운로드 후 Step2. 사용 캡쳐와 함께 추천 이유를 아틀란 공식 페이스북 댓글로 남겨 주세요. 이벤트 경품: 헬리캠(드론) 3명 스타벅스 카페라떼 교환권 100명 당첨 Tip- 구체적인 추천 리뷰&댓글을 남길수록 당첨 선정 확률은 UP! UP! *아틀란 추천하고 싶은 ‘친구 소환’, 아틀란 공식페이스북 ‘좋아요’도 많이 눌러주세요! 유의사항: 당첨자 발표 후 당첨정보가 확인되지 않을 경우, 당첨이 취소되오니 유의 바랍니다. 헬리캠(드론) 당첨자의 경우 제세공과금(22% )은 본인부담이며, 개별 연락을 드립니다. ★ 국내 최초로 클라우드 내비게이션을 선보인 아틀란이 ‘아틀란 3D : 빠른 리얼 3D 내비’로 또 한번 스마트폰 내비게이션의 새로운 경험을 제공합니다. ★ ★ 차량전용 내비게이션과 스마트폰 내비게이션 간에 상호 연동되는 커넥티드카 서비스가 도입되었습니다. (일부 차량전용 내비게이션에 한해 제공 예정) ★ [‘아틀란 3D : 빠른 리얼 3D 내비’ 소개] ‘아틀란 3D : 빠른 리얼 3D 내비’는 ㈜맵퍼스에서 제공하는 스마트폰용 내비게이션(네비게이션) 앱입니다. 약 38M 정도의 앱을 다운로드 후 설치하시면 별도의 지도 설치 과정 없이 고품질의 지도(랜드마크 등의 빌딩 모델링 데이터 제공, 다양한 패턴교차로 및 상세교차로 제공, 횡단보도까지 확인 가능한 상세 3D 지도 제공)로 바로 길안내를 제공합니다. ‘아틀란 3D : 빠른 리얼 3D 내비 ‘는 최소한의 데이터만 앱에 포함하고, 사용자의 길안내에 필요한 데이터(네트웍 데이타, 상세 지도 등)는 네트웍을 통해 실시간으로 제공 및 저장/관리됩니다. 국내 최초로 제공되는 클라우드 내비게이션(네비게이션)을 선보인 ‘아틀란3D : 빠른 리얼3D 내비’를 지금 무료로 경험하세요. [서비스 이용가능 고객] 현재 이용중인 통신사(SKT, KT, LGU+) 및 데이터 요금제에 상관없이 무료로 이용 가능하며, 별도의 3G/LTE 인증 절차를 필요로 하지 않습니다. [공식 지원 단말] * 삼성 : 갤럭시S4, 갤럭시노트2, 갤럭시S3 LTE, 갤럭시S3, 갤럭시M 스타일, 갤럭시S2 HD, 갤럭시S2 LTE, 갤럭시S2, 갤럭시노트, 갤럭시S/K/U * LG : 옵티머스 G PRO, 옵티머스 G, 옵티머스 LTE2, 옵티머스 뷰, 옵티머스 LTE, 옵티머스 빅 * 팬택 : 베가 NO.6, 베가레이서2(SKT향), 베가 LTE M, 베가 LTE 공식 지원 단말은 ㈜맵퍼스의 테스트를 통해 사용 검증이 완료된 단말을 의미합니다. (공식 지원 단말 리스트에 포함되지 않은 비공식 단말의 경우, 폰 기능이 포함된 단말이라면 다운로드/설치 및 사용 상에 별도의 제약은 없지만, 정식 테스트를 통해 사용 검증이 완료되지 않아, 예기치 않은 오류가 발생할 수 있으니 참고하시기 바랍니다.) [‘아틀란 3D 클라우드 내비게이션(네비게이션)’의 주요 서비스] 1. 앞선 클라우드 기술로 (사용자의 별도 업데이트 과정 없이) 언제나 최신 3D 지도 제공 2. 항상 실시간 교통정보가 반영된 경로탐색결과 및 최신 교통정보가 자동으로 반영되는 빠른 길안내 제공 3. 다른 사용자와 함께 나누는 즐거움이 있는 소셜스팟 서비스 4. 사용자가 제공하고 함께 공유하는 교통정보, 나는리포터다 서비스 5. 지금 뜨는 곳이 어디인지 궁금하다면? 실시간 검색어랭킹 서비스 6. 막히는 시간을 피해서 출발하고 싶다면? 출발시간추천 서비스 7. 아파트 동까지 찾아주는 편리한 부속검색 서비스 8. 작은 화면의 스마트폰 길안내 화면도 편리하게 만드는 스마트 내비 UI 9. 앞선 클라우드 기술로 스마트폰용 내비에서도 정밀하고 예쁜 고품질 3D 지도 제공 10. 정말 사용하기 편리한 지도 제스처 UI 적용 11. 혼합검색(예. 청담동 미용실) 및 초성검색(예. Nㅅㅇㅌㅇ)까지 지원하는 통합검색 서비스 12. 보다 편리해진 UI와 다양한 정보로 차원이 달라진 검색결과의 상세정보 13. 검색결과의 상세정보에 3가지의 주소(구주소(법정동/행정동)와 새주소)를 동시 표기하여, 서로 다른 주소 표기 방식에서 오는 혼란 해소!!! 14. 복수개의 단말에서 동일한 즐겨찾기가 제공되고, 단말 교체 시에도 기존 정보가 유지되는 너무 편리해진 즐겨찾기 서비스 15. 이젠 내 친구와도 보다 쉽게 목적지를 공유하는 목적지공유 서비스 16. 국내 최초로 차량전용 내비게이션과 스마트폰 내비게이션 간에 상호 연동되는 커넥티드카 서비스 제공 [‘아틀란 3D 클라우드 내비게이션(네비게이션)’의 커넥티드카 서비스] 1. 즐겨찾기 연동 : 내 ‘아틀란 3D 클라우드’ 앱에서 저장한 즐겨찾기 정보를 내 차량전용내비에서도 바로 확인할 수 있는 서비스 2. 길안내정보 공유 : 내 ‘아틀란 3D 클라우드’ 앱의 경로요약정보 화면에서 ‘차량전용내비와 길안내정보’ 옵션에 체크된 상태로 길안내를 받을 경우 내 차량전용내비에서 바로 해당 목적지로 길안내를 받을 수 있는 서비스 3. 내주차위치 : 내 차량전용내비에서 전송된 주차위치정보를 내 ‘아틀란 3D 클라우드’ 앱에서 바로 확인할 수 있는 서비스 [커넥티드카 서비스가 제공되는 차량전용내비 단말] * 파인드라이브 : IQ7000, IQ9000, iQ3D 5000, iQ3D 5000v, iQ3D 5000 Black, BF300, iQ3D HD300, iQ3D 3000 - 상기 단말은 추후 S/W 업그레이드를 통해 기능이 추가될 예정입니다. (제공일 : 미정) 커텍티드카 서비스는 모바일 네트웍에 연결된 상태에서 이용 가능합니다. 파인드라이브 단말은 ‘리얼타임3D 모드 > 클라우드’ 메뉴를 통해 확인하실 수 있습니다. [고객 문의] 1. 앱 사용안내 및 앱 오류제보 : 아틀란 공식 홈페이지(www.atlan.co.kr)의 ‘아틀란소개 > 스마트폰용 아틀란 > 사용안내’를 이용해주세요. description: Ringtone Maker Ringtone Maker is one of the best ringtone app in play store.It helps you make ringtones from your songs on your phone. What makes our ringtone app different from from other ringtone maker apps in play store is our extremely easy to use user interface.In a matter of seconds you have your ringtones from your favourite songs ready. Ever wanted a versatile, simple, free ringtone maker to get a part of a song as your ringtone? Never knew how to find that “perfect spot” where to cut it off? Worry no more: with this MP3 ringtone maker, you can use your device to chop songs – directly at your fingertips. Creating ringtones has never been this much fun! With over 800+,5 Star reviews we are leading the ringtone maker app category for the past one and a half years.The ringtones created by Ringtone Maker can be used also as your alarms,or you can assign this ringtones to any particular contact.The possibilities of this app are endless.Ringtone Maker has no any hidden costs which require you buy a premium version of the app ie we are never ever going to create a Ringtone Maker Pro . How To Use Ringtone Maker -Open The Ringtone Maker App And Select The Option Ringtone Editor -Now search for the song from which you want to make your ringtone and select it. -In the new screen that appears you should see two sliders.One is for start time and other is end time. -Play The song using the play button and once you reach a point from which you want your ringtone to begin pause the song and then drag the slider to that position. -Now play the song again.The song should begin from where you set the start time of your ringtone.As the song plays and reaches the point where your ringtone should stop pause the song by using the pause button and then drag the end time slider to that position -Now click the play button and verify that your ringtone is made perfectly. -Once you are finished click on the save button[a rectangle type icon near the music controls at bottom of screen] and from the box that appears select save as ringtone. -You can also set this ringtone as default ringtone or assign it to a specific contact from within the app. -You can also click history tab to access the created ringtones. Features Of Ringtone Maker - Zoom in and out of your sound file with precision, to find that exact moment where the tune fades out. With just a few taps, your song will get 'chopped' off perfectly! - Make your own ringtones – at no cost- and set them as alarms, notifications, or contact-specific overrides! - Convert MP3 to ringtones, and search any file by Album, Artist, or Title! - Supports standard ID3 tags -Supports various file formates including MP3, WAV, AAC, MP4 or AMR - Update Album editor, Album Art,Music Title and Artist - All chopped songs can be accessed quickly via History tab - It's totally free Support For Ringtone Maker We always want the users of our app to be happy.If you face any problems while installing Ringtone Maker or getting Ringtone Maker app to work you can always contact us.We have a dedicated team available 24/7 to provide support for Ringtone Maker. You can add us on skype: bewyn.daniel You can mail us at: redfoxmedia8@gmail.com This $0 ringtone creator lets you enjoy the luxury of being able to edit songs on-the-go. Freshen up your phone while you're waiting on the bus... or make one when the commercial is on TV and you don't feel like flipping a channel. Annoy your sister with that new song that she hates. Or... you know... just do it because you love good music! If you need a feature that is not already in Ringtone Maker you could just drop us a mail and we will implement it in just 1 week time.We already have a number of new features lined up for this year. Permission For Ringtone Maker This app requires permission to access your contacts in order to set contact specific ringtones. Have a nice time creating ringtones with our Ringtone Maker .

description: Fast, intuitive, and smart offline transit app for the King County and Seattle region. Contains complete King County bus and Link light rail schedules including route and stop time info. NextTransit features instant access to stops saving you precious time looking it up online. NextTransit core features requires absolutely no data or WIFI to run! Features: ☆ Quick search: Search stops by stop code or street name. Fetches the upcoming buses and their times under a second (literally!) ☆ Route search: Search buses by route number or destination. View a list of stops and select on any of them to view upcoming stop times. ☆ Maps: Quickly view all the bus stops on a map and find the one you're looking for. Click on the map icon under the routes view to view the route on a map. ☆ Reminders: Receive recurring notifications of what upcoming buses there are for a particular stop ☆ Flexibility: Navigate between weekday, Saturday, or Sunday/Holiday schedules or pick the time you want to leave a given stop by selecting on the clock icon after you've looked up a stop. ☆ Favorites: Store any stop or route for quick access by selecting the 'plus' icon near the bottom at any time. ☆ Nearby stops:Find nearby stops without using internet/data! NextTransit calculates the distance to and orientation you should point your phone to get to each stop! Please note: Once unpacked, NextTransit will require approx. 45 MB of space on your phone memory. NextTransit may take up to a few minutes (depending on the device) on first launch to build the database on your phone. Fine Print This app is ad-supported. We are not affiliated with King County Metro. Coded with care on the UBC Vancouver campus.
release_text: Version 2.0 - New fluid layout and design - Updated schedules - Set reminders to get automatic bus schedules notifications

description: A top quality Russia flag live wallpaper! A perfect live wallpaper for celebrating Russia independence day or national day! Feel proud of your country? Let this Russia flag fly high in your phone! APP HIGHLIGHTS ============== ✔ Real OpenGL 3D animation! Not a video loop or animated gif! ✔ Fully interactive! Shake phone, blow wind or touch screen to let the Russia flag fly! ✔ Play Russia national anthem! ✔ Floating cloud, thunderstorm, snowing, starry night etc animated background effect! ✔ Lighting control! ✔ Use own photo as background! ✔ Use own audio file as national anthem! ✔ Optimize for both tablet and phone, portrait and landscape mode! ✔ Set as live wallpaper or run as standalone app! IMPORTANT HINTS =============== * Tap screen twice to start/stop wind! * Visit http://3dFlag.wordpress.com for other countries flags! PERMISSION =============== * Internet permission is used for Google Ad. DISCLAIMER =============== * This is a free preview version. Some screenshots and features listed here only available in full version. Feel proud of your country, let this Russia flag live wallpaper always flying high in your home screen! We hope that these 3D national flag apps are of use to anyone wanting to learn more about the nations of the world. We truly believe that knowledge of other nations and cultures will help lead to further peace and understanding in the world, and learning about other national flags and anthems is a good beginning.
release_text: Fix bug to save battery power.

description: The #1 German English Dictionary for Android Phones & Tablets ✦ Comprehensive Offline Dictionary ✦ Phrasebook ✦ Verb Conjugator ✦ Phrase Translator ✦ Audio Pronunciation ✦ Vocabulary Quizzes ★★★★★ Great English German dictionary!! Best I've tried so far. ★★★★★ Excellent. I wish I could give this 1 more star! ★★★★★ This is the best translation app I have ever used. ★★★★★ Super dictionary. Very helpfull and free!! This app transforms your Android phone or tablet into an advanced language interpreter, always ready to help. It includes everything you need in one free app and features you won’t find anywhere else such as adding words, notes and images to the dictionary. Premium versions make VidaLingua the most comprehensive German English Dictionary for Android. FEATURES ✓ Dictionary with over 628.000 offline entries (premium), over 78.000 for free. ✓ Phrasebook with 20 categories such as Conversation, Asking Directions and Making Friends. ✓ Conjugations of 6.648 verbs (premium), 1.682 for free. ✓ Online Phrase Translator (premium), free alternative in settings. ✓ Single index search for fast lookups. ✓ Enhancements for tablets. ✓ Multiple-choice vocabulary quizzes. ✓ Lookup History. ✓ Email dictionary translations. ✓ Dictionary entries include translations, usage examples, part of speech & gender for German nouns. ✓ Updated regularly by our team of linguists. ✓ Online lookup for additional words (premium). ✓ Text-to-speech pronunciation. ✓ Language is living. Only VidaLingua allows you to add words, notes and images to the dictionary! Comments & questions are welcome. info@vidalingua.com VidaLingua, bringing language apps to life! © http://vidalingua.com

description: This is common card game "Solitaire (Klondike)". Rule -Some upturned cards are dealt on the left of the playing area, and six downturned cards are dealt on the below.On top of the downturned cards, an upturned card is dealt on the left-most downturned pile, and downturned cards on the rest until all piles have an upturned card. -The tableau piles can be built down by alternate colors, and partial or complete piles can be moved if they are built down by alternate colors also. -Any empty piles can be filled with a King or a pile of cards with a King. -The four foundations (rectangles in the upper left of the figure) are built up by suit from Ace to King. This game has world ranking. Players compete with number of chips! Also, several records are kept on storage, and player can see the records anytime.

description: The free offline German dictionary application explains the meaning of German words! Definitions are based on German Wiktionary . This is a monolingual German dictionary: words must be entered in German language. Features: ♦ More than 77000 words and large number of inflected forms ♦ Fast as it works offline, internet is used only when a word is not found in the offline dictionary ♦ You can leaf through words using your finger! ♦ Easy and functional user interface, optimized also for tablets ♦ Bookmarks and history with option to backup your bookmarks ♦ Crossword help: the symbol ? can be used in place of unknown letter ♦ Random search button (shuffle), useful to learn new words ♦ Compatible with Moon+ Reader and FBReader ♦ Themes with user defined text colors You can post your suggestions on http://goo.gl/Xkk6d ♦ Question & Answers: http://goo.gl/UnU7V ♦ No voice output? In case Moon+ Reader does not list my dictionary: open pop-up "Customize dictionary" and select "Open dictionary directly when Long-Tap on a word" ⚠ An offline dictionary needs memory. In case your device has low memory, please consider to use the online dictionary: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=livio.dictionary Information for application developers: ✔ This application provides Dictionary API for 3rd party developers, please read further details: http://thesaurus.altervista.org/dictionary-android This application requires the following permissions: INTERNET - to retrieve the definition of unknown words WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (aka Photos/Media/Files) - to backup configuration and bookmarks

description: Locals' Guide to North Shore Rides Vancouver’s North Shore trails are technically challenging, but there are those days when it all comes together and the results are magic. This inherent ongoing challenge fuels our passion and makes it our favourite place to ride. The present Shore is very different from the original days. Organizations like the North Shore Mountain Bike Association (NSMBA) and local governments such as the District of North Vancouver and Metro Vancouver, work together to formalize, maintain and grow the existing trail network. The current challenge is to expand the mountain bike trail diversity to provide more accessible trails that will attract riders of all abilities. If it’s one thing the ‘Shore’ is lacking, it is easier trails, but everybody will find something fun to ride. This guide gives you two locals’ perspective on the North Shore trail network, and we have made an effort to describe a wide range of trails that can accommodate all skill levels. Rides are presented in a graduated skill and time/length format. We also encourage you to explore on your own, and find your best routes! App Features Include: -See your location on the maps -Trail descriptions, ratings, and lengths -Zoom-to trail from list -Recommended ride descriptions, profiles, and route overlays -Overview map of the North Shore which includes hiking trails
release_text: - bug fix: Location icon was slightly off at different zoom levels.

description: Turn your smartphone into a real hair trimmer / clipper / razor now! This is one of the most realistic apps of its kind, perfect for jokes and entertaining children simulating a real hair trimmer, clipper or shaver. Features: - High quality sounds that change when moving the device near someone's head.(Recorded from a real hair trimmer) - Vibration to imitate a real clipper . - Proximity sensor for a more realistic experience . How to use it: 1) Turn on the hair trimmer by tapping on it , it will start to vibrate and make noise (if it doesn't sound , try turning up the volume of the device) . 2)Get the device screen close to the head of the victim and the sound will change, creating the illusion that you are actually cutting hair . 3) When you want to stop the hair trimmer , just touch the screen again and the haircut will be over (The image of the clipper will change to show you that now it's off). Whether you want to play a prank on your friends or if you just want to have a good time , Real Hair Trimmer will provide you loads of fun and a whole new experience using the newest features of your device.. This app is so real that you might get bald! This application will be updated on a regular basis to bring users the most realistic and satisfying experience possible. Any questions or suggestions will be answered as soon as possible.
release_text: - Code improvements - Better App icon - Blades have been sharpened

description: Your kids will love singing along with these games: • Old MacDonald Had A Farm • Five Little Ducks • Five Little Speckled Frogs • Mary Had A Little Lamb *Note: This Free version gives you full access to Old MacDonald Had A Farm and previews to the other three games. If you enjoy this app, please support the developers by purchasing the full version. Designed for ages 2 and up, these games help your children learn popular songs while interacting in a fun and creative way. ***Old MacDonald Had A Farm*** Play with 18 animals, including typical farm animals such as a cow, horse, pig and sheep, and non-typical farm animals such as an alligator, frog, lion and snake. Choose an animal for each verse, and interact with the farm! ***Five Little Ducks*** This counting song has five cute ducklings that love to play! As the song progresses, the ducklings get fewer and fewer in number until there are none left and mama duck has to go find them. Watch and interact with the ducks as they fly around and play in the water. See if you can tap the butterfly! ***Five Little Speckled Frogs*** A counting song that features five unique frogs that love to eat bugs - and there is an endless supply of bugs! As the song progresses, the frogs jump in the water until there are none left. Tap on the bugs to eat them, move the frogs around, touch the sailboats, and more! ***Mary Had A Little Lamb*** A classic song that is often a first for children. This song features Mary, her lamb, four verses and a world that builds as the song progresses. Make it snow and make it green, ring the school bell, play with the school children, pick apples, and more!

This informative guide is written for the intermediate level crocheter. You should already be familiar with the basic stitches: slip stitch, single crochet, half double crochet, double crochet, treble crochet, and double treble crochet. For additional help, the app also contains a link to my website with free how-to-crochet videos.

description: Yu-Gi-Oh! BAM Trading Card Game Enter the Yu-Gi-Oh! universe with the fast and fun spin-off Yu-Gi-Oh! BAM. This online Trading Card Game (TCG) features intuitive rules and an addictive gameplay, making it easy to progress through levels., Beware - it will take strategy, skill, and luck to become a true BAM master! Explore an exclusive storyline where you can challenge your friends, customize a Deck from over 500 specially adapted Cards, collect rewards, and Duel Opponents of all abilities. Whether you have two minutes or two hours to play, just hit BAM! The heart of the Cards is now on your mobile device! Summon your courage and prepare for battle in Yu-Gi-Oh! BAM Pocket! This Trading Card Game has it all—create your own unique deck and develop unbeatable strategies, play against your friends, or even compete against Duelists from all around the world. Can you dominate the Duel Arena? EXPERIENCE THE POWER OF THE CARDS Become the ultimate Duel Master by building your own unique deck from a selection of over 500 original and legendary Yu-Gi-Oh! Cards. Enhance your Deck by combining unused Cards to create stronger and rarer Cards. Challenge your friends and rivals and dominate the Duel Arena with your skills and unrivaled expertise! KEY FEATURES • Train and compete against your favorite Yu-Gi-Oh! characters in an exclusive storyline. • Construct your own unique Deck from a selection of over 500 Yu-Gi-Oh! Cards. • Build a powerful Deck and compete against your friends and rivals in the Duel Arena. • Exchange special Gifts and tips with your friends! • Explore the world of Yu-Gi-Oh! and unlock new Challenges and maps! • Collect Rare and Legendary Cards to Boost your Deck's strength! • Use Recipes to create stronger Cards through the Card Crafting system.

description: SRS-Airbag Code Encyclopedia (Automotive) (An Automotive SRS-Airbag Repair APP) This APP has taken years of research to compile and thousands of field work hours to prove. This APP is based on similar software and book products by the same author. It cover the vast majority of SRS-supplemental restraint systems diagnostic fault codes. There are thousands of codes available both OBD-2 and OBD-1, or the so called blink codes. These blink codes are still used by many manufacturers. You also get "How to access SRS codes" in most cases without a scan tool. A good portion of vehicles do not need a scan tool to access airbag codes. Often time these procedures are no easy to find, for obvious reasons. The idea is to be able to diagnose your SRS-Airbag system without a scanner. If you can fix one issue with a car, this APP pays for itself a thousand times over. Here's the coverage that you get: Domestic coverage for General Motors, FORD/Lincoln/Mercury and All Chrysler/Dodge group vehicles (including Chrysler Imports). Asian coverage for Acura/Honda, Isuzu/Mazda/Subaru, Infinity/Nissan, Kia/Hyundai/Mitsubishi and Lexus/Toyota. By Mandy Concepcion Note: This APP run fine on Android Phones and Tablets with larger screen.
