Features include: - Android 4.x support - Notifications about incoming / unread messages (SMS, MMS, e-mail/Gmail) - Gmail support with full-length message preview allows fast respond without the need to leave your current activity - Saves your time with full Gmail two-way synchronization - Multi account support (including possibility to have different notification for each account) - Shows number of unread messages in notification bar (only on Android 2.x) - Adjustable level of privacy - Customizable sound, vibration and LED notifications - Option to vibrate only in a vibration profile - Customizable notification icon - Customizable on-screen preview of new messages (popup) - Quick reply, delete, mark as read for all incoming messages - Reminder (sound, vibration, display) - Quiet hours feature Additional Premium Content (in-app) purchase: - Disabled advertisements (Ads) And much more is planned for future releases! In case of any feature suggestion or a bug report, please, contact us on our e-mail. Easy Notifier requires Android 2.3 and higher, but Android 4.x is highly recommended. All the screenshots are taken from Android 4.2 device.

description: OBD-2 Code Encyclopedia (Automotive) An Automotive Repair and Diagnostic Application. This APP is loaded with thousands of automotive OBD-2 DTC or diagnostic trouble code definitions and code-setting-criteria. These DTCs are retrieved now days using inexpensive code readers. Then the process of interpreting and analyzing these automotive faulty codes starts. In this software you get all the Generic Automotive OBD-2 or OBD II codes from code P0001 to P0399-U0xxx, which are late model codes. OBD-2 has been updates a couple of times. This APP shows all the changes. PLUS.... You also get the factory specific DTCs, which are P1xxx. Here are the manufacturers DTCs covered: Generic OBD-2, BMW, Dodge-Chrysler, Ford Cars, Ford Trucks, General Motors, GM Trucks, Honda-Acura, Hyundai, Isuzu, Jaguar, Kia, Land Rover, Mazda, Mercedes Benz, Mitsubishi, Nissan-Infinity, Saab, Subaru, Toyota, Volvo, VW-Audi PLUS... You get more... Besides getting the DTCs Definitions for the manufacturers above, you also get the "Code Setting Criteria". Not mentioned brands have the CSC, but most do in this APP. These are the specific circumstances needed for a DTC to set in your vehicle's memory. In other words, "How the Code was Set?". This App is based on our book publication and years of research and diagnosing today's vehicles. Hope it is useful to you. Authored by: Mandy Concepcion Note: This APP runs fine on phones and tablets with large displays.
release_text: null

description: Maths Bee for Kids is a simple and educational game for children aged 3 to 12. It includes learning numbers and basic math skills. The words and numbers in the game are all recorded by native speakers in three widely spoken languages: English, Mandarin and Cantonese (Hong Kong). Young children can learn Basic Maths Skill in a fun way. ★★★★★ An awesome Maths app for your child! ★★★★★ SPECIAL FEATURES : ★ User-friendly interface with simple menus ★ Learn to read numbers from 0 to 20 in English, Mandarin and Cantonese(Hong Kong) During learning, fruits will fall down from sky. The fruits can be moved and counted by kids with fun. ★ Counting exercises: Random questions for counting with high quality graphics ★ Learning largest and smallest number: With training exercises for kids to choose the largest or smallest number ranging from 1 to 100. ★ Multiplication Table : from 1x1 to 9x9 ★ Fraction Number ★ Calculation exercises with colorful graphics: kids will soon master basic math skills of addition, subtraction, multiplication and division through exercises ★ Math World Champion: In this mode you race online against other students from around the world. The total score is summed up by your highest score in each level. The app has a total of 25 levels of difficulty. ★ Math Challenge – Competition among 2 to 4 players with so much excitement and fun. ★ Family Math Challenge– The game allow 2 to 4 family members to enter into competitions. Adults will have more difficult questions when playing with their kids. It’s fun for both adult and kids. Parents can play with their kids or kids compete among themselves. Enjoy your precious time with your kids while playing and learning at the same time. You will be amazed by your kids’ improvement over calculation speed and accuracy! The game is powered by EveryKidsApps, we specialize in educational games for kids. Please rate! If you like the app, please leave a rating! If you have any comment, do drop us an email - everykidsapps@gmail.com- so that we can have a conversation with you and see how to get your issue resolved!

app_name: 神魔之塔模擬器(轉珠戰鬥練習、圖鑑、關卡資料)「非官方版」
description: FB粉絲團： https://www.facebook.com/TOSGameSimulator FB社團： https://www.facebook.com/groups/359992240845340 問題意見回報： http://goo.gl/forms/SmimWQnXR0 不需ROOT即可使用 簡介： 玩轉珠遊戲不知道如何組隊?卡關?打半天到王前爆發失敗?地獄關卡永遠都在鍵盤思考? 新卡組隊配置?神魔模擬器為您解決所有問題，可以使用所有卡片組隊，挑戰任何關卡直接模 擬關卡與隊伍，直接模擬關卡與隊伍挑戰地獄副本。神魔最後一次爆發前也可直接用手機拍 照然後選相同的關卡相同的層數，直接模擬版面測試轉珠。轉到最好的版面直接在神魔顯示 路徑。輕鬆過關不再是夢想。 詳細功能： ● 圖鑑 神魔模擬器收錄所有卡片怪物資料。 ● 關卡 目前收錄所有神魔地獄關卡，關卡資料持續更新中，即時更新隔天關卡資料。 ● 模擬戰鬥 ✭.模擬隊伍 最多可以設定10組隊伍。隊伍包含隊伍空間、隊伍需要等級、攻擊力、生命力、回復力等...。 ✭.模擬關卡 可以自行選擇所有最新關卡，並進入關卡中並實際模擬對戰，於面板上方顯示所有隊員傷害，以及總計總傷害，可於上方功能設定落珠、時間限制、轉珠路徑、可以設定各種顏色符石。 ✭.模擬輔助 於模擬關卡上方的燈泡按鈕，啟用後可以開啟模擬神魔的浮動輔助紐，於轉珠遊戲上使用手機 自動捷圖，系統自動分析圖片後把模擬關卡的各色珠排列完成，讓玩家練習轉珠。 ✭.模擬抽卡 在首頁的地方可以使用此功能，與轉珠遊戲限定可用魔法石抽的卡片相同。快來試試看你的手氣吧! ✭.轉珠訓練 設定各種特殊的怪物做練習，讓你實戰的時候轉珠不再失敗 聲明：神魔之塔素材均由Mad Head Limited所擁有，本軟體使用素材製作模擬器做為研究隊伍與破關方法的平台，讓大家可以從神魔的遊戲中獲得更多樂趣減少挫折感，尤其是新手玩家可以更快上手轉珠遊戲，有任何問題歡迎討論。
release_text: 更新資料： 2015/4/18 1.優化轉珠效果 2.加入母的遺憾雙周關卡 3.加入新的敵人技能 4.加入卡片所羅門王與大壞蛋彼德 5.光暗狂魔组合技能 6.修正部分卡片與心珠回復異常的bug 7.修正閃退問題

description: Calendar Droid is a calendar application that works with all the calendars on your device (such as Google Calendar, Exchange, Facebook, Birthdays, etc.) The philosophy behind this app is a calendar that is easy to use, clean, intuitive, and highly customizable. This is the paid version of Calendar Droid. There is a free version that will remain free and without ads. Please consider supporting the development by buying this. FEATURES ONLY IN PAID VERSION: • Advanced recurrence/repeating rules like bi-weekly (choose 'Weekly' to show more options), etc. • Copy/paste of events • Preview on color settings • (**Android 3+ only**) Agenda widget (**Android 3+ only**) • Select which calendars to show • Change default reminder time FEATURES: • Month View / Week View / Day View / Agenda View / Weeks View • View events • Add/edit events • Settings to customize (many options for customization) • Action Bar on all versions of Android FUTURE FEATURES IN PAID VERSION ONLY: **** THESE ARE NOT IN THE VERSION YET! • Localization (more languages) • Change calendar colors • Search events • Color themes • More widgets Remember: You have to synchronize the calendars to your device for them to show up. PERMISSIONS: • READ CONTACT DATA If you have any guests (or attendees) on an event and you have that person in your contacts the app will read information from that contact and show it when viewing an event. The contact picture will show up and then clicked will take you to the default "contact clicked" scenario. I know this permission looks bad together with internet access but I do not store nor send any contact info. Only contacts that are guests to viewed events are read by the program. • READ CALENDAR EVENTS This should be obvious. Read the description again and see if you can spot what this is used for ;) • ADD OR MODIFY CALENDAR EVENTS AND SEND EMAIL TO GUESTS Again, this should be obvious. Calendar Droid needs to change your calendar events. Sending emails to guests is done when putting email addresses in the "guest" box when creating an event. • WAKE LOCK Used by the widget. This actually saves battery since the widget does not wake up the phone when it has the screen off. The wake lock is only used to keep the phone alive during updates. The update interval is controller by "alarms". • READ SYNC SETTINGS Use to read which calendars that are synchronized to the device. • GET ACCOUNTS Used to find accounts with calendars so they can be selected to be synchronized. • MANAGE ACCOUNTS Used to manage the synchronize settings for calendars under a account.
release_text: 1.6.6 - Bug fix release • Fix: The widget is now updating events and header • Fix: Rare start-up crash • Fix: Agenda view updating when new events are created • Fix: Events being on the wrong times when deleting a really early event • Fix: The add button will now select a more appropiate time if no time is selected manually

description: The iAustria app provides the Best of Austria, information by which you can inform yourself about your holiday destination beforehand and plan your trip. iAustria is the information source for your holiday in Austria right on your smartphone. News about the weather, lake temperatures and top events as well as open lifts or hiking routes and mountainbike trails make the choice of your holiday region a delight. iAustria offers a unique service for climbing and water enthusiasts when it comes to severe weather with the new mountain weather forecast. The iAustria radar feature informs you about the highlights in your area via notifications. Additionally you can collect PINs on your hiking trip or biking tour. Information about your holiday destination Even for a spontaneous trip iAustria offers helpful descriptions about golf courses, sport shops as well as accommodations. Thanks to the Alpine association hut finder, which contains over 500 huts in Austria, every hiker can find the perfect gastronomy and the desired refuge in the mountains. In order to easily find your favourite destination, you can create your own list including your favourite routes, sights and resorts. The iAustria Trophy The "Pinning" Challenge offers a further incentive to join and use the app. After checking-in at special places all over Austria the user receives PINs and automatically takes part in a monthly raffle, where great prizes can be won such as a holidays for two somewhere in beautiful Austria. Content: - Region description with filter according to interests - Weather stations with live weather - Detailed weather forecast with temperature - Photos and videos - Summer lifts - Recommendations of Austria Tourism - Route tips - Accommodations, culinary, wine,... - Lakes - Livecams - Daily tip - Arrival information, distance incl. Route planning iA:Tip Scanner: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
release_text: # Find all information about your Austria trip now even easier # New practical information like guest cards and time tables # With the search feature you can now look for the desired information Discover Austria and win great prizes! The iA:Trophy starts soon. Start your challenge, compare yourself with your buddies, pin&win!

description: Network Counter. The easiest way to monitoring of wireless network traffic. Keep a track on your monthly network data usage. Now with Android 4.x support and widgets! Features include: - Android 2.2, 2.3 and 4.x support - Data traffic usage statistics for Wi-Fi and mobile networks - Alarm for Wi-Fi and mobile data traffic usage - Network statistics for currently active (running) applications - Ability to backup and restore of data traffic usage database Additional Premium Content (in-app purchase): - Disabled advertisements (Ads) - Widgets (incl. lock screen) for monitoring of data usage And much more is planned for future releases! Data stats gathering is done via our background service which has been designed for a low power consumption and supports device reboots (not including hard resets or direct battery pulls) and network disconnects. Note, A2SD (SD card support) functionality is not possible due to necessary background service. However, if it's your preference, there is no limitation to use A2SD+ (ext partition). Requires: - Mobile / Cell or Wi-Fi HW module in your phone / tablet - Android's TrafficStats API supported via your phone's ROM In case of any feature suggestion or a bug report, please, contact us on our e-mail. Network Counter requires Android 2.2 and higher, but Android 4.x is highly recommended. All the screenshots are taken from Android 4.2 device.
release_text: Version 1.4.2 & 1.4.1: - Alarm tab is now refreshing automatically - Bug fixes Version 1.4.0: - Added support for Android 4.0, 4.1 and 4.2 - Added in-app purchase for additional functionality incl. widgets - Application screen now displays the most traffic-heavy apps on the first positions - Fixed startup code upon device restart - Fixed stats for large data transfers - Various other fixes and improvements

description: If your car breaks down or you’re involved in an car accident in Belgium or abroad, you obviously want to receive assistance as quickly as possible. To ensure this happens, KBC Insurance has developed a free App called KBC Assistance. Just one push of the button and you can contact a roadside assistance provider day or night wherever mobile phone coverage is available. At the same time, the provider also has all the information necessary (who you are, where you’re at, etc.) to assist you as quickly and efficiently as possible. The way in which you are assisted depends on the cover afforded by your assistance insurance policy. For optimal performance in Belgium, you should permit geolocation and enable your Internet connection. For optimal performance abroad, you should activate data roaming as well. Remember this may involve additional charges! KBC has developed this App especially for customer who have taken out fully comprehensive insurance or assistance cover. To get going, the only thing you have to do is download the App and install it… More info at www.kbc.be/kbcassistance

description: ‘Mechanical Drawing Interpretation Capacity Improvement Service’ is a product designed to improve the basic learning level of designers and manufacturers in the machinery industry. Through the use of augmented reality technology, it provides live 3D diagrams as well as theory learning and training sessions for step-by-step learning. This is a new form of educational service in the machinery industry and each and every user of this service will be highly satisfied with its effectiveness. 1. The First Training Education Service for the Machinery Industry in Korea The first training education service for the machinery industry in Korea using the most up-todate technology. Has Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced level courses based on the curriculum. Provides network service on various N-Screen based digital information devices such as mobile (smart phone, tablet), PC, etc. 2. Augmented Reality-Based 3D Diagram Recognition Training Service Viewing projection drawing-based 3D diagram. Viewing 3D diagram (6 types of projection drawings, size adjustment, rotation) Expressing 3D diagram (solid, animation, hidden line) Finding a correct isometric drawing corresponding to the projection drawing 3. Training-Based Mechanical Drawing Learning Contents Offers 10 types of training method with 14 training sessions. Creates students’ interest in mechanical drawing to improve their understanding of and engagement with mechanical drawing. Offers various forms of mechanical drawing training. Training that you can get anytime, anywhere using mobile devices. 4. Theory-Based Mechanical Drawing Flash Contents Offers basic theory learning of mechanical drawing. Interactive e-Learning contents. Learning contents based on the curriculum.

description: Socialize for Android brings you Socialize for Facebook Messenger. This application allows you to connect with your friends on Facebook and chat just like you would through your Facebook account except you can do it with style. Socialize for Facebook Messenger has all black backgrounds with white and pink text as well as custom HD images. Please Rate and Comment Socialize For Facebook Messenger Features -Send and Receive messages through your Facebook account -Push notifications -Ability to text message friends if they are not on Facebook -Ability to Have Group Conversations -Individual controls for each conversations -Add Pictures to Messages -Add Location to Messages -Plus lots more.... Check out my apps by searching Socialize for Android or clicking at bottom where it says more by this developer. Blue Socialize for Facebook Black Socialize for Facebook Red Socialize for Facebbook Pink Socialize for Facebook Green Socialize for Facebook Purple Socialize for Facebook Gold Socialize for Facebook Orange Socialize for Facebook Blue Socialize for Twitter Red Socialize for Twitter Pink Socialize for Twitter Pink Socialize for Facebook Messenger Green Socialize for Facebook Messenger Purple Socialize for Facebook Messenger Gold Socialize for Facebook Messenger Red Socialize for Facebook Messenger Blue Socialzie for Facebook Messenger Red GoSocial for Go Launcher EX Pink GoSocial for go Launcher EX Purple GoSocial for Go Launcher EX Blue GoSocial for Go Launcher EX This is a ONE time Purchase therefore you will never be asked to pay for a subscription There are absolutely NO Ads whatsoever in any Socialize product nor with there ever be If you are having any problem at all please email me first and ask for help before leaving a negative comment. I will try to do my best to answer you as quick as possible and get the problem fixed. I can not respond to the comments left here or any other application that is out unless you email me. If having issues seeing pictures or connecting to your Facebook account please try the suggestions first before emailing me... 1. Restart Phone 2. Connect to a WiFi network 3. Check to make sure your user name and password are correct. Only one account can be connected at a time. 4. Uninstall and re-install to see if it fixes the problem. Sometimes the market messes up the download of the application and it does'nt work. If you do email please include the following to better speed up the process of fixing the Issue 1. Name of Phone and Service Provider 2. Version of Android on Phone (Can be found in settings/about phone) 3. Specific problem (IE: Don't just say does'nt work) 4. Be patient as I do this as a hobby and not out of an office so Im not always at a desk to help right away. Socialize for Android, Socialize for Facebook, and Socialize for Facebook Messenger are in no way affiliated with Facebook.com or Facebook as a Whole. Please do not email them with questions about this application because they will have no idea what you are talking about. Socialize for Facebook Messenger was built using open source software that can be found with in a link in the about section of the menu in this application. In favorites screen, you can only update amount by going to calculator screen. Pro version with nice charts and no advertisement is available. This application for the people who travel to know the prices in different currencies (euro dollar exchange rates, pounds to dollars, dollars to pounds, japanese yen, ...). The traveller will be able to use the calculator to do easy and simple calculations and get simultaneously the price in other currency. The traveller can use graphs to see the trends of exchange rates of world currencies, their percentage changes in an easy way. This finance application is very useful in many occasions of life (travel, remmittance of money abroad, bank account operations) and is user friendly.

description: France GuideWithMe is an offline travel guide, which recommends detailed articles around the country in relation to your current location. Developed by travelers and for travelers, GuideWithMe is a rich source of general travel info as well as off the beaten track advice. Get around guides, phrase lists, warnings how to stay safe and healthy, restaurants and hotel recommendations, local costs and taxes, road rules and a variety of other info are carefully stored in one app. Essentially complete articles with multiple hotel and restaurant listings are suggested for Lyon, Paris and other travel destinations. ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ • USE OFFLINE. Save money on roaming fees and refer to the articles even if you are offline and cellular data is not available. • DISCOVER ARTICLES RELATIVE TO YOUR LOCATION. Switch between country, region, city, travel topic articles recommended for your travel destination and current location. France travel guide contains around 470 articles covering the whole country. • GET RELIABLE INFO. All info comes from wikivoyage project, which is constantly updated by adventurous travelers and aspiring writers. Articles are vividly illustrated with more than 580 well­chosen pictures and images. • VIEW ON THE MAP. GuideWithMe is based on map data, provided by MAPS.ME, offline maps app. An option to view the place on offline map is offered. ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­ We are waiting for any advice and feedback about GuideWithMe app. This will help to suit GuideWithMe app to your expectations and tastes. Your reviews and ratings are always welcome. Send them to android@guidewithme.com or leave a feedback in Google Play review section. Check out our travel guides: http://guidewithme.com/ Follow us! Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/guidewithme Google +: http://plus.google.com/+Guidewithme/ Twitter: @GuideWithMe Enjoy your travels! IMPORTANT: currently the app is available only in the English language.

description: SPECIAL PRICE 50% OFF (USD 7.99 -> USD 3.99)!!! Fight as the Valkyrie Reginleiv in a fantasy RPG where you can collect, train, and transform a fully customizable army of powerful monsters! In a world devastated by the events of Ragnarok, two unlikely champions will rise to oppose the forces of evil. Huginn, familiar to the fallen god Odin, seeks to resurrect his master. To do so he frees Reginleiv, an infamous and powerful Valkyrie imprisoned for heinous crimes against Asgard. Together, they will battle to bring order and peace to a broken land. With beautiful, smooth animations, addicting, deep strategy, and a myriad of monsters to collect, Valkyria Soul is an innovative RPG that will keep you coming back for more! What really happened during Ragnarok? What dark forces stir in this ravaged land? Will you be able to unravel the intricate web of lies and mystery and discover the truth? Story Ragnarok, the apocalypse, has come and gone. The war between the hosts of Asgard and their monstrous foes ended in a hellish sea of flames, devastating the Nine Worlds and leaving naught but a nightmarish ruin in its wake. Now, dark spirits haunt the wreckage of the realms, and survivors eke out a meager existence among the settled ashes and death. The few left in Asgard fight a hopeless battle against an overwhelming foe, struggling desperately to restore order to the broken world. Seeking new allies, Huginn, familiar to the dead god Odin, breaks the seal on an ancient prison. A prison that holds the criminal Valkyrie, Reginleiv, one of Asgard's legendary Maidens of Battle. Gifted with the power to save the souls of those she defeats, or to use them to increase her own power, she might just be enough to turn the tide of battle. If, of course, she can be trusted. Collect, Enhance, and Transform Fylgja! A Valkyrie's strength comes from her power to manipulate the souls, or spirits, of others. By taking a soul and binding it to a soulless physical vessel (or Fylgja), they can create loyal minions and command them against the forces of darkness. Earn new Fylgja through combat, turning your enemies into your friends! Fylgja gain levels, and can even be combined with other Fylgja to make them stronger, or even to transform them into new, powerful forms! Soulbinding Each Soul that you will find has its own unique personality, abilities, and skills. Attaching it to a Fylgja will affect not just how that Fylgja behaves in combat, but its stats and abilities as well! Each Soul can have a maximum of three active skills and three items equipped at any given time. In addition to the Soul's skills, each Fylgja has a unique skill that it can use in combat. Souls can learn these Fylgja skills, allowing any Fylgja Soul bound with it to make use of these powerful techniques. Find the best combinations of Soul and Fylgja to become the strongest Valkyrie of all! *This game features some in-app-purchase content. While in-app-purchase content requires additional fees, it is not necessary for finishing the game. *The actual price might differ depending on the region. [Supported OS] - 2.3 to 5.0 [Supported Screens] - HVGA(320x480) and up [Xperia(TM) PLAY] - Not optimized [SD Card Storage] - Enabled [Languages] - English, Japanese [Non-Supported Devices] This app has generally been tested to work on any mobile device released in Japan. We cannot guarantee support on other devices. __________________________________________ Your use of the application constitutes your acceptance of the following EULA: http://kemco.jp/eula/eula_EN.html __________________________________________ Get the latest information! [Newsletter] http://kemcogame.com/c8QM [Facebook page] http://www.facebook.com/kemco.global (C)2014 KEMCO/Hit-Point

description: Can not fully enjoy the fresh air because of the insects? Want to get rid of mosquitoes? Try android sonic repellent against mosquitoes. No more mosquitoes! 1) best anti mosquito repellent 2) timer 3) run in background 4) installed to SD-card 6) totally free 7) tips how to get rid of mosquitoes 8) ++++ Some phone speakers are of poor quality. They could not produce ultrasonic waves to repel mosquitoes. ++++ 9) no more mosquito bites 10) total mosquito control 11) best mosquito sound 12) animal sounds 13) sounds of the game 14) sounds of the season Ultrasonic devices (sonic mosquito repellent) operate by emitting short wavelength, high frequency sound waves too high in pitch to be heard by the human ear (mosquito sound). This is due to limitations in human hearing. Humans can not hear ultrasound (mosquito sound) because the eardrum does not vibrate fast enough, but some animals such as dogs, bats and rodents can hear well into the ultrasonic range. Some insects, such as grasshoppers and locusts can detect frequencies from 50,000 Hz to 100,000 Hz, and moths and lacewings can detect ultrasound as high as 240,000 Hz produced by insect-hunting bats. Insects detect sound by special hairs or sensilla located on the antennae (mosquitoes) or genitalia (cockroaches), or by more complicated tympanal organs (grasshoppers, locusts, moths and butterflies). Electronic pest (mosquito repellent) control is the name given to the use of any of the several types of electrically powered devices designed to repel or eliminate pests, usually rodents or insects. Numerous electronic pest control devices (mosquito repellant) are readily available throughout the world. Hardware stores and garden centers usually stock some sort of electronic device advertised to repel a variety of pests and one can also find them on the internet. Although these devices (mosquito ringtones) have been around for at least 20 years, they have only recently become popular and widely advertised, probably due to their environmentally friendly claims. There is a wide range of opinion about these devices. Some people claim that they work for them, while others claim they are not effective at all. There are basically two types of electronic pest control devices widely available, these are Ultrasonic mosquito repellent (mosquito netting) and Electromagnetic mosquito repellent. An insect repellent is a substance applied to skin, clothing, or other surfaces which discourages insects (and arthropods in general) from landing or climbing on that surface. There are also insect repellent products available based on sound production, particularly ultrasound (inaudibly high frequency sounds). These electronic devices have been shown to have no effect as a mosquito repellent by studies done by the EPA and many universities. Insect repellents help prevent and control the outbreak of insect-borne diseases such as malaria, Lyme disease, dengue fever, bubonic plague, and West Nile fever. Pest animals commonly serving as vectors for disease include the insects flea, fly, and mosquito; and the arachnid tick. Tags: mosquito hawk, mosquito eater, mosquito ringtone, mosquito magnet, mosquito bites, mosquito squad, mosquito fish, mosquito sound

description: Long-forgotten memories bubble to the surface when the past invades the present in the Collector's Edition of Lake House: Children of Silence! Located at the edge of a gloomy lake and shrouded in fog, the house at the center of this story has stood empty for 15 years. All that's left of the family that once lived there are their discarded belongings and home movies that reveal a terrible secret. Beckoned by what appears to be a ghost, a woman who lived there as a child and her fiancé return to the house to solve a mystery that begins with an old photograph and ends in a secret room. Guide the fiancé as he explores locations blanketed in mist and tries to rescue his bride-to-be from the grip of a masked stranger. Find hidden objects, solve puzzles and prepare yourself for an ending that will take you to a place darker than you can imagine! GAME FEATURES: • 32 mini-games • 18 hidden object scenes • 50 atmospheric locations • Strategy guide

description: --NOTE-- This app is no longer under active development, mainly because of the fact that Google is rumored to be moving Google Voice into Hangouts soon. There have been reports that this app also isn't working on Android 4.4 Kit Kat. This is also unsupported. Tired of using the stock Google Voice app? This app will be perfect to help simplify your phone experience. Using a tablet or phone without a texting plan? This app will allow you to text through your Google number on that device! Send free text messages via Google Voice and use your carrier’s SMS capabilities in the modified stock messaging app. Why this app? • Integrates all of your SMS and MMS messages into one app • Sends Google Voice messages over Mobile Data/WiFi • Quick Reply notifications • Simple / minimal setup required • Uses the stock messaging database for easy backup The same Messaging app you are used to has been rebuilt to include Google Voice support with the help of the Google Voice app. You can send and receive Google Voice texts as well as carrier messages all in the same app! The Google Voice app still needs to be installed on your device. If you are getting double notifications, first try to go into Android's settings, tap Apps, and find Google Voice. Right below the "Force Stop" button should be a checkbox to "Show notifications". Uncheck that. If there is no checkbox, try going into the settings of the Google Voice app and disable text notifications from there. This app grabs the incoming notifications. If you are still receiving texts from a random number, then your messages are still going through your carrier. You can enable/disable Google Voice support in the settings of the app. Make sure to email me with any bugs you encounter after you check the help at the website! KEYWORDS: SMS, GV, Google Voice, Integration, Messaging, Extension, App, SMS Notifications, Stock SMS

description: On the distant Ice-moon "Arktia" an outpost is to be erected far from civilisation. Players must try to place their futuristic habitation and science modules - called moogloos - in such a way that they dominate as much of the ice continent as possible. But be warned! Moogloos which are separated from the main group of the same colour cannot survive in this hostile climate and will be removed. During the course of the game the climate starts warming, which puts limits on the expansion of the settlement: Players who have already placed all their moogloos can start to melt (remove) ice tiles. At the end of the game, players count their points which they receive for each - ice tile they control - opponent moogloo they removed - ice tile they melted The one who survives these arctic challenges by the smartest placement of his moogloos will score the most points and win the game!

description: ** The easiest way to keep your New Year's Resolution ** Now with optional GPS feature! Train for a 10K with Ease into 10K app. This training program is designed for someone who has done some running and wants to increase the distance to 10K. Please note: If you've never run before, please consider starting with our C25K app since it is designed for beginners. This app gives you audio prompts every time you need to change from running to walking according to the Ease into 10K running plan. You can listen to your music and enjoy your workout without constantly looking at your stopwatch. If you are training for the 10K this is the app to have! ----------------------------------------------- Ease into 10K plan ----------------------------------------------- * Alternates between walking and running * Takes 10 weeks to complete * Workout 3 days per week * Each workout session is from 30-70 minutes long ------------------------------------------------ APP FEATURES ------------------------------------------------ * NEW: Add GPS support with a one time $0.99 in-app purchase. The GPS feature is optional and requires a device with GPS capabilities. With GPS feature enabled the app will automatically calculate your pace and distance and show you workout route on a map. * NEW: Improved Journal feature. description: You have made your sweet tooth? We try to prepare this recipe , which is part of the Games Cooking , come together to prepare a tasty cake . To escape everything by the book must follow a cake recipe to have the most tasty delicious cake . We pick ingredients carefully. Take eggs and break them to separate whites from yolks , then put them in a red bowl . We break the 4 eggs , then we add white sugar or brown depending on your preference , fresh milk , and vanilla , then use the spatula to homogenize them . We use powdered sugar , nutmeg powder , cinnamon , baking soda and some purpose flor . After I mixed all the ingredients we use spatula to homogenize them . We take a little pineapple, carrots, walnuts , raisins , and chocolate liquid , after which we will mix and with spatgula . Put the mixture into a baking pan , then bring it to the oven , and we set the cooking time . Pay attention to cooking time not to leave too much in the oven because you risk a burn . After the cake has finished baking , put it on a cake platter and pour it over the chocolate liquid, ornam look good, and our cake is ready to eat. description: 3G Watchdog Pro monitors your Mobile and WiFi Internet data usage: * Mobile (4G/3G/Edge/GPRS...), roaming & WiFi usage counting * Advanced data usage prediction * Billing rules (counts in blocks, ignores uploads, exclude apps, exclude time periods, do not count 2G or 4G) * Usage history with graph & CSV export * Usage by application (Android 2.2+, unavailable on Dell Streak) * Real Time traffic graphs (local, roaming and WiFi) * Alerts & optional auto-disable of mobile network * Data usage widget (2 sizes / 5 styles). Mobile network enable/disable widget (Android 2.3 - 4.4). * Backup/restore with optional auto-backup * "Holo" user interface * Account per SIM with auto switch (requires a phone with a SIM - WARNING! may not work well with dual-SIM phones). * Import settings & data from 3GW free (don't uninstall 3GW free before importing!) Translated in over 20 languages. KNOWN PROBLEMS: * Doesn't count properly usage on Samsung Galaxy S5 LTE-A (SM-G906S and SM-G901F) with Android 5.0 Lollipop. Please contact us for a refund, or if you want to help us to fix this problem. * On Android 5.0+ the "Disable mobile network" function does not work (the mobile data switch widget and the auto-disable feature are both affected). This is because on Lollipop the enable/disable function is no longer accessible to third-party apps. * Doesn't count properly global usage on Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 and 8.9 - this problem affects other data counting applications as well and is caused by a bug on the tablet itself. You may try to check the "Calculate global usage from usage by app" advanced option as a possible workaround (feedback welcome). * Doesn't count properly global mobile usage on Samsung Galaxy R / Z (i9103) and possibly Galaxy Y. Problems were also reported with the Captivate Glide. Same workaround as for the Galaxy Tab (see above). OTHER PROBLEMS: If you run into problems and wish to help to solve the problem while giving the community a chance to get a better 3GW Pro, please send a mail to contact-pro@3gwatchdog.fr with details. -> See the FAQ at http://www.3gwatchdog.fr/en/faq
release_text: 1.26.8-12: Android 5.0 Lollipop support for various devices. 1.26.7: * Optional fix (ROOTED devices only) to get mobile network disabling to work again on Lollipop+ after Google made the function inaccessible to 3rd party apps - please report at contact-pro@3gwatchdog.fr if it doesn't work for you! * New option (in Settings / Alerts) to hide 3GW notifications on Lollipop secure lock screens. * Stability fixes. ==> See: http://3gwatchdog.fr/the-dogs-blog/230-pro-1-26-1

description: Quickly capture what’s on your mind and get a reminder later at the right place or time. Speak a voice memo on the go and have it automatically transcribed. Record a voice memo and Keep will transcribe it so you can find it later. Share ideas with friends and family • Easily plan that surprise party by sharing your Keep notes with others and collaborating on them in real time. Find what you need, fast • Color and add labels to code notes to quickly organize and get on with your life. If you need to find something you saved, a simple search will turn it up. Always within reach • Keep works on your phone, tablet, computer and Android wearables. Everything you add syncs across all of your devices so your thoughts are always with you. The right note at the right time • Need to remember to pick up some groceries? Set a location-based reminder to pull up your grocery list right when you get to the store. Available everywhere • Try Google Keep on the web at http://keep.google.com and find it in the Chrome Web Store at http://g.co/keepinchrome .

description: SoundWire lets you send any music or audio ("what you hear now") from your Windows or Linux PC to your Android mobile devices. Use it as: - A remote speaker or wireless headphones - A way to listen to music and movies from your computer anywhere in your house or out on your deck. - A wireless extension of live audio from your PC-based music system The full version of SoundWire enables unlimited Opus audio compression, can handle up to 10 connections at the same time, and has no ads or interruptions. It also has a special Pro Mode to set and display buffer latency precisely in milliseconds. You can use any music player on your PC or laptop like Spotify, Grooveshark, YouTube, or iTunes and feed the live sound directly to your Android device. SoundWire lets you listen to the free versions of Grooveshark and Spotify on your phone. SoundWire has low latency (audio delay), which means it can even be used to listen to the soundtrack of a movie or YouTube video while you watch (**Note you must adjust the buffer size in app settings for low latency). There are other uses too... SoundWire can work as a baby monitor or listening device with a computer such as a netbook that has a built-in microphone. Hook up turntables to your computer's line input and stream a live DJ set to another part of the house over WiFi, or anywhere else over 3G/4G. Features - Live audio capture and streaming to multiple clients - Excellent sound quality (44.1 / 48 kHz stereo 16-bit, PCM or Opus compression) - True low latency (unlike AirPlay, Airfoil) - Easy to use - Compression option greatly reduces network usage - Can work over Bluetooth by enabling tethering - Stream music from PC to PC running x86 virtualized app (Linux/Windows) - Save everything you hear to a file (MP3 or WAV) Before using SoundWire on your Android device you must install and run the SoundWire Server application on the Windows/Linux PC or laptop which is your source of music, web audio streaming, or other sounds. Raspberry Pi is also supported. Download the server at http://georgielabs.net For more information see the getting started guide at http://georgielabs.net/SoundWireHelp.html If you have any problems please see the troubleshooting tips at the above link. For example if you get choppy audio try restarting your wireless router, then try the other troubleshooting suggestions in the guide. If you get a message saying the app is not licensed and this message is incorrect then please check your internet connection and try again. You may want to use a remote control app together with SoundWire. Some good choices include: Grooveshark Remote, Spotimote (Spotify remote), Remote for iTunes, Android VNC, Unified Remote. Please rate the app and comment on Google Play to let us know what you think of SoundWire. If you have a question or bug report send email to soundwire@georgielabs.net . If reporting a problem please give your phone's Android version and make/model. Permissions - Network communication: Communicates with the server program on your PC. - Phone calls: Mutes audio when you receive or make a call. Without this permission music would continue to play, interfering with your call. - Prevent phone from sleeping: Keeps app running while connected (playing music) or attempting to connect. May be disabled in settings.
release_text: -Fixed fc on connect in Android versions before 4.0.3 for some Pro Mode buffer sizes Version 2.1: -Added support for native audio (OpenSL ES) on Android 2.3+ devices, including low-latency audio support for Android 4.2+ devices which support it. -Low buffer sizes (8k/40ms) now possible on every Android 2.3+ phone. -Now automatically reconnects if needed on settings changes (with settings option to disable).

description: AutoCAD the flagship product of Autodesk is considered to be the world's best 2D Software. Although there are millions of websites sites, teaching how to learn AutoCAD, but little work is done in enabling the learning experience on a Smart Phone. This app is ideally suited for those users who are continuously wanting to learn beginner, intermediate and advanced articles, tips, news and much more. The app is designed to update when a blog post happens on www.2DProfessor.com. Yes, although you might have subscribed to RSS feeds, they only reach your inbox. But this app helps you get those articles immediately delivered to your phone by an update. Please note: The update time to get a post delivered to your phone is 2 Hours. Ideally you will get the article delivered to your smartphone within 2 hours after posting on the blog www.2DProfessor.com Incase you don't have a smart phone, just visit the site and subscribe to the RSS feeds. We have analytics in place now to improve our article and tutorial distribution.

description: ► Apps based on the bestselling "Laura's Star" series by Klaus Baumgart ► Over 7.5 million books in the series sold worldwide ► Recommended by the German magazine "ELTERN family" With the interactive features of this app, kids can experience "Laura's Journey to the Stars" in a whole new way, diving directly into the story. Children can play Pairs with socks or Whac-An-Alien and locate playfully the cardinal directions. Numerous animations and funny sound effects enrich the experience. FEATURES -------------------------------------------------------------------------- - More than 80 animated scenes, funny sound effects, and exciting interactive options for children - Lovingly drawn illustrations by the popular children’s book illustrator Klaus Baumgart - Read-aloud function included: Captivating story-telling by native speakers - Appropriate for children: No in-app purchases - Intuitive, child-friendly controls - Language options: German, English, and Chinese (Mandarin) CONTENTS -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Ever since the day on which a star that had fallen out of the sky became Laura´s much-loved friend, Laura knows one thing for sure: Everyone has their own special star that watches over them. But what about the toy-dog who belongs to Laura´s little brother Tommy - does he have his own special star, too? In order to answer this question, Laura and Tommy decide to build a rocket and fly up to the stars. Join them on this magical journey and discover what surprises Laura´s star has in store for Laura and Tommy. Other children's apps from Bastei Entertainment: -------------------------------------------------------------------------- - Laura's Star - Laura's Secret - Laura's Christmas Star Additional books in the "Laura's Star" series are in development! SUPPORT -------------------------------------------------------------------------- "Laura's Journey to the Stars" has been extensively and meticulously tested on various devices. If you experience any technical difficulties, we would be happy to assist you. Please send an email to our support team at app.support@luebbe.de so that we can promptly address your concerns. Please note that we cannot provide immediate support when problems are posted as comments; for a quick response, please use the email address provided. We are always happy to receive general feedback and suggestions for improvements to the app! The Bastei Entertainment team hopes that you enjoy "Laura's Journey to the Stars"!

description: Drop breakfast items from the top of the screen. Get 3 or more identical breakfast food items to touch each other to create a match, then they'll vanish. If your pile builds up too tall and reaches the top or bottom of the playing board then the game is over. If you drop your piece into an empty column then it will just land in the middle of the column. Some random breakfast food items will come up from the bottom of the screen. You'll have no control over these, they're just there to annoy you. Special non-food pieces: FORK: lifts up a column by one notch LIGHTNING: clears an entire column PAN: destroys all occurrences of the item it gets dropped on ROLLING PIN: bumps a column down by one notch SUN: turns into whatever item it gets dropped onto Programmer: William Robinson Artist: Lisa Trujillo Please email us with any comments or suggestions.

description: Piano Tiles + is an addictive arcade game, mini step in white tiles and black tiles. It looks very easy, but you must be careful, don't tap the white tiles. Color Mode is coming, now you can play in the color mode or select the color theme you like, your world is no long only white tiles and black tiles any more. How to Play: 1.Don't tap the white tile. 2.Step in the black tile and run as long as you can. 3.Don't step the red bomb tile in the bomb mode. Feature: 1.Classic mode: just step 50 tiles and enjoy the piano music. 2.Arcade mode: keep you in the tiles when speed is more fast. 3.Zen mode: how many steps will you run in 30 seconds. 4.Relay mode: get extra time when step 50 tiles in 10 seconds. 5.New mode: Rush, Bomb and Color. 6.Now you can turn on/off sound and choose your favor theme. 7.Enjoy the classic piano music. We will keep the game simple and small, we like it and hope you like too. Download it free and enjoy it.

description: This is a powerful tool! Use at own risk! Nobody is perfect and Android neither. Apps you have already deleted, sometimes leave data behind. The system constantly creates logs, crash reports and debug files you don't really need. Your SD-card is collecting files and directories you don't recognize. Lets not go on here... Why not get a maid to clean it all up? SD Maid will help you keep your device neat, clean and tidy :-)! Give it a try, you won't find a more thorough cleaning tool! Choose a tab, press start and then either click a single item to delete or press the clean all button. It's just that easy. There are various features available: * Explorer is a full fledged filemanager, use it to crawl through your Androids files. * You can use the Searcher if you know what file you are looking for. * The CorpseFinder searches your device for orphaned items and compares those to the list of installed applications. * AppControl lets you freeze, reset and remove applications (even system apps). * The SystemCleaner scans your device and filters directories which contain unnecessary files. You an even create your own filters! * You can optimize and shrink bloated databases to speed up access and free space. * View your biggest files and find out what is hogging all the space. * Find files that have been modified in the last X minutes. And more... A few additional features as well as comfort and convenience functions can be unlocked by buying and installing the unlocker (SD Maid Pro). SD Maid is constantly being developed and designed very carefully. Due to the vast amount of Android devices SD Maid might not work perfectly on your device, in that case I would appreciate it if you give me a chance to fix it by contacting me. If you have questions or concerns send me a mail ( support@darken.eu ). I usually respond quite quickly and will happily help you out. Obtaining SD Maid from unofficial sources puts your device at risk. A big thanks goes out to all the beta testers @ http://sdmaid.darken.eu/beta who helped me improve SD Maid v3. I would also like to thank all the volunteers @ http://sdmaid.darken.eu/translation that made SD Maid accessible to non english speaking users by translating it. An unfinished help document is avaiable here: http://sdmaid.darken.eu/help
release_text: v3.1.3.0 (367) - Few hotfixes v3.1.2.8 (365) & v3.1.2.9 (366): - Language & clutterDB updates. - Minor internal code changes. v3.1.2.7 (364): - Updated clutterDB and translations. - Added /data/log_other_mode to SystemCleaner. - UI fixes for QuickAccess and Overview. - Replaced self-made analytics with Piwik. - Updated http://sdmaid.darken.eu/privacy. - Fixed CorpseFinder issue on Huawei devices. - Improved logging for certain 5.0 sdcard issues. Changelog: http://goo.gl/QQ5guU

description: Driver Guard is an easy to use driver assistance application that helps the driver to avoid accidents. It uses the smart phone’s camera to monitor the scene in front of the driver, detect preceding cars, estimates the distance to all preceding cars, and fires an alarm when the driver approaches any car dangerously. The application also shows the driver’s current speed using GPS and distance to the nearest car in front of the driver. The app requires that the device to be put on a mobile holder attached to the windshield parallel to the road plane. Minimum Requirements: • Android 2.3.3 or higher • 5 Mega pixels backside camera. • GPS • Single Core CPU 1Ghz

description: “Chainsaw Warrior is a brutally awesome good time.” 148apps (Editors Choice) “…everything you want in a digitised version of the Games Workshop classic…” Gamercast.net “...an absolute classic…very true to the original…” Digiboard Games Reviews "Perfectly judged, brutally demanding and almost impossible to put down..." The Guardian Updated! New equipment cards added such as Combat Shotgun and options to play in classic mode without extra equipment! Chainsaw Warrior from Games Workshop is the classic nail-biting game for one strong-nerved player: It's the year 2032 and spatial warping has opened a hole into another dimension in the midst of the old municipal buildings at the heart of Manhattan. Bizarre and dangerous creatures are flooding into our dimension, intent on destruction. Behind their actions is a controlling intelligence known as 'Darkness', who intends to drag New York back into the warp – destroying it utterly! Air strikes, ground assaults and WMDs have all failed to stop the swarming forces from beyond. All that remains is a single hope: a shadowy ex-special forces soldier, enhanced for combat and known only as 'Chainsaw Warrior'. Equipped with all the latest high-tech armaments, he must battle his way through to the trans-dimensional ground-zero and defeat Darkness. Not only are there swarms of zombies, mutants, traps, Chaos Agents and other twisted denizens between him and Darkness, time is the enemy too! Only an hour remains to save New York before it is torn from our world forever. First published as a solo boardgame in 1987, it has been updated, translated and re-engineered for the digital generation. In Chainsaw Warrior it's just you against both the clock and a tide of evil! Can you prevail where all others have failed? You only have 60 minutes to save New York!

description: You know what they say: “You are what you eat,” and “Your foods influence your health.” As it turns out, those sayings are true. Whether you want to lose fat or put on some muscle, Calories! acts as your personal health coach to help you reach your goals. Calories! offers these great features: Food: ★ Offline database with more than 1,800 foods, plus the option to upgrade with over 14,600 additional foods (in-app purchases) ★ Serving sizes for almost all foods and dishes with user-defined serving sizes for all foods to make things fast and simple ★ Traffic lights for foods according to their energy density ★ Calculation of recipes Nutrition: ★ Nutrition Diary with optional use for meals ★ Diet assistant for losing or gaining weight ★ Carb unit calculator for diabetics ★ WW point calculator for Flex, Pro and Plus ★ Adjustable daily recommendations for all nutrition values Fitness and Exercise: ★ Exercise Diary with more than 370 sports that automatically compensates for calories burned ★ Weight Diary that calculates your BMI and presents diagrams User Interface: ★ Instant overview using the dashboard ★ Detailed analysis for any time span, including vitamins and minerals ★ Search by text, categories, favourites, and recently-used foods ★ Convenient copy of consumptions, exercises, foods, sports ★ Straightforward adding of new foods and sports ...And much, much more! What Makes Calories! better than all the Other Apps Out There: ★ Almost complete nutrition values for all foods: Available only here! ★ Everything is accessible offline, so you don't have to worry during your holiday! ★ Straightforward and simple user interface ★ No enforced registration with Facebook or any other website ★ Recipe calculation: Available only here! ★ Easily add new foods ★ Option to remove advertisements (in-app purchase) ★ Personal and fast support: We have great customer reviews and are always interested in hearing your feedback! ★ All purchases are one-time only (no subscription!) and aren't bound to a single device ★ Exchange experiences in our Google+ community: https://plus.google.com/communities/108408446955672301868 So if you’re looking for a fun, fast, and easy way to burn fat, build muscle, or just improve your overall health, download Calories! now and see why our users love it so much! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/digitalcure Twitter: @digitalcure Privacy Policy: http://www.digitalcure.org/projects/calories_privacy.html Permissions: • WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: backup of your data, • INTERNET, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: advertising, crash reports, in-app billing, • BILLING, GET_ACCOUNTS: in-app billing, • READ_LOGS: crash reports. description: A free team-based multiplayer 3D online tank battle game for mobile devices. Select your tank from many World War II and Modern Era armored machines and upgrade its destructive powers! Join the armored force of tens of thousands of real players and drive into ferocious team deathmatch and special CTF mode battles! MAIN FEATURES * Choose from over 40 real-world tanks and armored vehicles. * Improve its parameters with multiple upgrades. * Fight in legendary World War 2 vehicles such as the T-34, Tiger or Sherman. * Drive famous Modern Era tanks like Merkava, T-90MS Tagil or the mighty M1A2 Abrams. * Join epic 6-on-6 clashes on a variety of battlegrounds with different landscapes and scenarios (desert, ruins, city and others). * Experience thrilling gameplay and realistic chassis & environmental physics. * Enjoy the high-resolution graphics, historically accurate vehicle models and spectacular particle effects. PLEASE NOTE: Armored Aces is a free-to-play game. Players have the possibility of progressing quicker by purchasing in-game currency for real money, but if any players do not want to use that feature, it can be disabled by enabling password protection for purchases in Google Play app store settings.
release_text: T28 U.S. WWII top experimental tank added. Panther Ausf D is now historically accurate.

description: The official app for Fantasy Premier League 2014/15 is now available for you to download. As the official fantasy football game of the Premier League, the game has over 3 million players and is the biggest fantasy football game in the world. Managers that have already registered a team for Fantasy Premier League 2014/15 need only download the app before signing in to enjoy managing their team using the app. Alternatively, download and register a team via the app. FEATURES: Pick your team Select your starting XI, nominate your captain, select a vice-captain and change the order of your substitutes. Latest points Review your team’s performance each Gameweek via either the pitch or data view and watch the live points update during Barclays Premier League matches. Transfers Research and make transfers each Gameweek with helpful filters to narrow your options to valid transfers only. Player profiles View player profiles and review each of their points histories throughout the season. Fixtures A full breakdown of key points scorers are provided by Gameweek for every one of the 380 Barclays Premier League matches during the season. Leagues Keep track of your progress within each of the mini-leagues you’ve joined. NEW The Scout Both of the weekly Scout articles are now available within the app. NEW Push notifications Receive alerts when points have been updated, fixtures have moved Gameweeks, when a Gameweek deadline is approaching and when The Scout is available. PRIZES: 1st Prize The overall winner of Fantasy Premier League 2014/15 and his/her guest will be treated to a 7-night break in the United Kingdom and will experience VIP hospitality at TWO Barclays Premier League matches, visit a selection of major UK tourist attractions such as the Tower of London and Madame Tussauds or experience the spectacular Brecon Beacons countryside in Wales. Transfers to and from the UK and 7 nights’ accommodation is also included in the prize. Quarterly Prizes The season will be divided into four quarters: Q1 (GW 1-9), Q2 (GW 10-19), Q3 (GW 20-29) Q4 (GW 30-38). The person that finishes top of each quarterly leaderboard will receive a VIP trip to watch a Barclays Premier League team of their choice with pre-match meal, two nights’ accommodation and transfers included. Monthly Prizes The person that finishes top of the monthly leaderboard will be declared Manager of the Month and will receive a tablet device, a Nike Ordem match ball and EA SPORTS FIFA 15 game. For full terms & conditions and to register a Fantasy Premier League 2014/15 team, please visit http://fantasy.premierleague.com

description: Tired of searching the Internet for Zooper widgets (also called skins or themes)? Well search no more because Zooper Widget Gallery brings the widgets to you! Currently you can browse over 1100 (more added frequently!) separate widgets with download links that take you straight to the site it came from. Free Features: * Browse widgets by name, popularity, date, and Zooper attributes * Filter widgets so you only view widgets that meet your requirements (all Zooper attributes are filterable) * Hide widgets you don't ever want to see Premium License Features: * Ad Free * Install widgets directly from the app (XDA only) * Delete widgets in-app (after downloading) * View all currently installed widgets * Sale Notifications * Much more to come! After downloading a widget using the pro license, drop a Zooper Widget on your screen, click on it, and then select 'SD Card' to view your downloaded themes. *NOTE* Some widgets (usually the older ones) show as 'corrupted' in Zooper Pro after download, this is a known Zooper Pro bug but the widgets still work (if you get stuck on the loading dialog, just hit the back arrow) WARNING: The downloaded widgets WILL NOT WORK without the Zooper Widget Pro app!! **This app is not affiliated with the official Zooper app.** Explanation of permissions android.permission.INTERNET - Required for AdMob android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - Required for AdMob android.permission.PERMISSIONBILLING - Required for In-App Billing (for Premium License) android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Required to download direct to SD card (Premium) android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED android.permission.WAKE_LOCK - Required for sale notifications (Premium) android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Required to download direct to SD card (Pro feature) android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS" android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS"/> android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS" - Required for database sync

description: Shoot the pool ball at the matching balls to make sets of 3 and move on to the next level! Fun Bubble Shooter Game with Billiards Balls as the Bubbles. The bubbles all look like Pool Balls. Shoot the Bubbles to move on to the next level. Aim your bubble shooter by sliding your finger over the shooter then shoot your ball by tapping above the line. Get 3 or more balls together to knock them down before you get squashed by the crusher! This game incorporates Pool Balls, Penguins, and Shooting all in one. So if you like Shooting Pool, Penguins, Balloon Pop, Bubble Pop, or Bubble Shooter you will enjoy Ball Buster! Game Play Tip: You can aim the shooter at a wall to bounce the Pool Ball off at an angle. This Bubble Shooter game is really hard to put down once you start playing it. Ball Buster is derived from the classic open source Bubble Shooter Game called Frozen Bubble. If you like Bubble Shooter - Ball Buster please leave a favorable comment for us. Thanks for playing! We hope that you find this to be one of the best Bubble Shooter games on the android platform. The bubble shooter game is often referred to as "Bubble Pop Game", "Balloon Pop Game", "Balloon Shooter Game", "Bubble Shooter Game", "Ball Shooter Game", "Ball Pop Game". No matter what you call it "Ball Buster Bubble Shooter" is going to be fun! I would like to thank the developer who originally created Frozen Bubble the Bubble Shooter game from which Ball Buster Bubble Shooter is derived for freely sharing the source code to your Bubble Shooter game. The Ball Buster Bubble Shooter source code has remain unchanged from the original Frozen Bubble bubble shooter source code. If you are a developer who is interested in creating your own bubble shooter or balloon pop game I would like to recommend the Frozen Bubble, Bubble Shooter source code that can be found at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_free_and_open-source_Android_applications#Games . The only changes that I have made to the original Frozen Bubble, Bubble Shooter game were to the graphics included with the distribution file. This game is fun and somewhat addictive to play and the sound effects that came with the game have worked very well with the Pool Ball theme. In future versions I intend to replace the penguin and other graphics that are not related to the pool hall theme with those more appropriate to the theme of this Bubble Shooter game.
release_text: This is what's new in version 1.0.1 of Bubble Shooter - Ball Buster Changed all the bubbles to be Billiards balls. Bubbles, Bubbles everywhere, you must knock them all down.

description: Ally Bank's mobile app puts everyday banking tasks at your fingertips. It's fast, it's secure and it's free. All you need is your online banking username and password. What you can do • Deposit checks with Ally eCheck Deposit℠ • Transfer money between your Ally and non-Ally accounts • Make payments to payees you’ve already set up in Online Banking, see scheduled payments and review your payment history • Use Popmoney® to pay anyone with a U.S. bank account • Find nearby ATMs • View your balances and search transaction history How to get started • Our mobile banking app is free. Your mobile carrier’s message and data rates may apply • Compatible with Android we say Android 3.0 or higher How you’re protected • We never store personal or account information on your phone • All transactions are encrypted with the same secure technology as Online Banking • Our Online & Mobile Security Guarantee covers fraudulent transactions in Mobile Banking too Ally Bank Member FDIC For FAQs about Ally Mobile Banking, visit the Ally Help Center. To find out more about the benefits of online and mobile banking, visit www.allybank.com. © 2012-2015 Ally Bank

description: Nos gusta dar alegrías: más de 700.000 personas encontraron trabajo en 2014 gracias a InfoJobs. Tú también puedes ser una de ellas. Con la App de InfoJobs puedes buscar ofertas de empleo, inscribirte en los trabajos que más te gusten, y seguir tus candidaturas desde tu móvil en todo momento. No dejes escapar tus oportunidades laborales, miles de ofertas de empleo te esperan en la App de InfoJobs. Las mejoras siempre son importantes y hemos hecho un rediseño de la App: ahora es más rápida y fácil de usar. ¿Qué dicen los usuarios de la App de InfoJobs? ★★★★★ "Muchas ofertas y muy fácil inscribirse en ellas, para mí la mejor aplicación de búsqueda de empleo." ★★★★★ "Ideal para buscar trabajo." ★★★★★ "Así no enciendo el ordenador y lo hago desde el móvil." Buscar trabajo nunca ha sido tan fácil como con la App de InfoJobs. Las mejores empresas españolas y extranjeras publican sus ofertas de trabajo en InfoJobs. description: smartChord Tuner is a precise chromatic tuner, which picks up the tones of your instrument by the microphone of your smartphone and then analyses and visualises them in different ways. On the display you can see: - the recognized note inclusive her octave, - the frequency of the played note in Hertz, as well as the target frequency of the note. - a scale with colours, showing to what extent the right tone is striked. - the audio signal itself, to see, what is coming in by the microphone. Besides the visualization you can let your smartphone vibrate, as soon as the the recognized frequency is corresponding with the aspired frequency. ======== PLEASE NOTE ========= smartChords Tuner is a plugin for the app 'smart Chords & Tools' (V2.13 or later). It can't run alone! You need to install 'smart Chords & Tools' from the Google Play store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.smartchord.droid smartChords provides a lot of other useful tools for musicians like the ultimate chord reference and scales. Furthermore there is a chromatic tuner, a metronome, an ear training quiz, and a lot of other cool stuff. smart Chords provides a lot of instruments like guitar, ukulele, mandolin or the bass and a lot of different tunings. ==============================

description: **Won the T store awards in the Language/Education category** **Selected as the best app in Mobile Awards** **Patent registered app** All the essential sentences for conversations in a foreign language have been collected and stored in one app!! ★With the RightNow Thai Conversation app, you can communicate with people in other countries, anywhere in the world. ★ Key Features *Interactive translation for conversations in a foreign language, including a native speaker's pronunciation reference - Unlike TTS, you can hear high-quality pronunciations from native speakers *A total of 30,000 phrases in 12 categories - As this app contains various categories and context-specific sentences, you can communicate with people in other countries by taking full advantage of this app without additional material (phrase books, dictionaries, etc.). *Word conversion - You can easily change a word in a sentence. *Interpretation function - Interpretation available immediately through voice recognition *Today’s expression widget - You can add the widget on the home screen to study expressions whenever you want. *Notifications of today’s expression - You are notified with conversation sentences every day at the time you set. *Recent sentences & Favorite sentences - When traveling abroad or studying, you can save a sentence to Favorite sentences and use it whenever you want. *Question and answer list - You can make a list of what you have learned in the Q&A form. *Dialog screen - You can communicate with people in other countries by exchanging questions and answers. *Only available for a question sentence where the answer is provided. *Phonetic transcription for Korean, Chinese and Japanese - You can learn word or expression while checking its pronunciation. *Voice playback sensor - Show the screen to the person you are talking. The app automatically plays a native speaker's voice using the gyro sensor. *Sending an e-mail or text message - You can easily send or share a simple message in a foreign language via text message, e-mail or other instant messaging programs! *Voice search - If you need to speak quickly, just say a word! You can find any sentence you want! Now it’s time to get away from the outdated conversation books and enjoy RightNow Conversation that guarantees your best travel experience yet!

description: Falk Maps bietet als verlässlicher Begleiter für Autofahrer, Fußgänger und Fahrradfahrer funktionale Online-Karten mit Routenplanung sowie mehrere Millionen touristische Sonderziele wie Restaurants, Hotels, Shopping, Sehenswürdigkeiten und vieles mehr. Features: Karten - Online-Karten für jeden Anlass (Straßenkarte, OpenStreetMap, Radfahrerkarte, Geländekarte, öffentliche Verkehrsmittelkarte, etc.) - Weltweite Luft-/Satellitenbilder - Wetterkarte - Fotokarte mit Sehenswürdigkeiten Routen - Routenplanung mit Drag´n Drop-Funktionalität - Echtzeit-Verkehrsinformationen - Karte folgt im „Follow-Modus“ dem aktuellen Standort - Routenoptionen: Auto-, Fahrrad- oder Fußgängerroute, Autobahnen vermeiden, Mautstraßen vermeiden POIs - Über 5 Millionen Points of Interest aus den Kategorien Essen & Trinken, Ausgehen & Kultur, Sehenswertes, Hotels, Shopping, Freizeit & Sport und Auto & Verkehr - Kategorienauswahl und Freitextsuche - POIs können direkt angerufen und geteilt werden (z.B. per Twitter) Bitte beachten: - Während der Nutzung von Falk Maps ist eine Internetverbindung erforderlich (die App enthält keine Offline-Karten und belegt somit kaum Gerätespeicherplatz. Nur die tatsächlich erforderlichen Kartenkacheln werden geladen). Bitte achten Sie auf Ihr Datenvolumen, wenn Sie keine Internet-Flatrate nutzen oder sich im Ausland befinden. - Falk Maps bietet keine Turn-by-turn-Navigation. Wir wünschen Ihnen viel Freude mit Falk Maps! Lob? Kritik? Verbesserungsvorschläge? Schreiben Sie uns bitte eine E-Mail an hilfe@falk.de mit dem Betreff "Falk Maps Android" und Angabe Ihres Gerätes + Android-Version. Wir antworten gerne und kümmern uns um Ihr Anliegen. Da Falk Maps webbasiert ist, kann der Start der App je nach Internetverbindung ein paar Sekunden dauern. Sie können Falk Maps auch direkt im mobilen Browser aufrufen: m.falk.de Das Internetportal zur App: www.falk.de Falk Maps as a reliable companion for motorists, pedestrians and bicyclists provides functional online maps with route planning as well as several million tourist POIs such as restaurants, hotels, shopping, attractions and more. Features: Maps - Online cards for every occasion (road map, OpenStreetMap, cyclists map, terrain map, public transportation card, etc.) - Worldwide Luft-/Satellitenbilder - Weather map - Photo Map Local Attractions Routes - Route planning with Drag'n Drop functionality - Real-time traffic information - Map follows in "Follow mode" the current location Avoid car, bike or pedestrian route, highways, avoid toll roads: Route Options - POIs - Over 5 million points of interest from the categories Eating & Drinking, Nightlife & Culture, Attractions, Hotels, Shopping, Recreation & Sports and Cars & Transportation - Category selection and free text search - POIs can be directly called and shared (eg via Twitter) Please note: - While the use of Falk Maps an Internet connection is required (the app does not include offline maps and thus has little device memory space only the actually required map tiles are loaded.). Please ensure that your data if you do not use Internet-Flatrate or are abroad. - Falk Maps does not provide turn-by-turn navigation. We wish you much joy with Falk Maps! Praise? Criticism? Improvement? Please write us an e-mail to hilfe@falk.de with the subject "Falk Maps Android" and stating your device + Android version. We are happy to respond and take care of your concerns. As Falk Maps is web based, the launch of the app may take a few seconds depending on your internet connection. You can call Falk Maps directly in the mobile browser: m.falk.de The Internet portal to the app: www.falk.de

description: This is the new version of MapBook. The old version has been removed by Google without any warning for "violation of the intellectual property" because the word "Facebook" was included in the title. We worked on the graphics to publish the application again so that over 100.000 people who downloaded it can still enjoy this application. Help us to get back the success this application deserved. Thanks! With MapBook v4 it's even easier to be notified on the current location changes of your friends! You can receive a notification each time a friend does a check-in with Facebook or MapBook. ★★★★★ Find your friends' positions on a map quickly with a single 'tap'! ★★★★★ ☆ MapBook lets you locate and view in Google Maps® your Facebook® friends' positions. ☆ The best way to exploit Facebook checkin is to localize on a map checked friends' positions. This is why MapBook lets you register your own checkin with the possibility to choose the nearest place to you. ☆ MapBook is similar to Google Latitude for its behavior, but it's based on Facebook accounts. ☆ The main features are: -Visualization and localisation in Google Maps of cities in which friends currently live by means of the string "current location" of Facebook -Visualization and localization of all Facebook friends' checkins in last n days -Visualization and possibility of locating last status update with the position of every Facebook friend -Fast visualization of every Facebook status that's attached with a position -Possibility of register and share on Facebook checkins with a status update attached directly from MapBook -Visit a friend's profile by means of a Button which appears together with the status directly on the map -Quickly find a friend on the map with the search button -Features that natively exist in Google Maps which make them the best maps on a smartphone or tablet When you pick "Current Home City" please note that Facebook doesn't give the exact address so the position has an approximation that gives you information just about the city where that person lives. Warning: MapBook isn't a spy - application, it lets you localize on the map the exact position voluntarily registered by a friend whereby posts, checkins, actual position and facilities provided by Facebook. Instructions: 1) Login to Facebook with the blue button on the top-right of the screen 2) Accept to give permissions which MapBook will ask for 3) Now you can choose the location mode you prefer 4) If you want you can check in with a tap on the check in button 5) The refresh button is useful if nothing appears on the map (due to internet connection errors) or simply to refresh the position of your friends. 6) The checkin time-span can be changed with the settings button on the bottom. 7) The search button works exactly as you expect, please note that it searches only for friends which have already been localised on the map. So, if there aren't, press refresh button. Settings explanation: with "Draw location updates" you can choose to activate the drawing option on the map: after every location update made with the app button, a line will connect your old location updates to each other to track visited places. Contacts: Gmail: samuele8@gmail.com Twitter: @c0rtexx Keywords: Facebook, maps, map, friends, finder, locator, location, locate, localize, localization, localisation, find, download.
release_text: ★★★★★ For updates Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/FriendsFinderForAndroid Follow me: @c0rtexx (http://twitter.com/c0rtexx)

description: 18 perfect deer calls in your pocket always with you. Deer call is a handy app with a variety of high quality and most popular and effective deer call sound. Use it to train your own hunting call or test your skill to bring in deer. You can also set your favorite call to your ringtone. Now added Solunar Weekly rating for best hunting days. To extend the range, connect the GPhone to an external speaker. Included calls: Adult Buck Grunt Buck Bawl Buck Grunt Buck Raging Grunt Buck Alert Wheeze Buck Snort Wheeze Buck Sparring Buck Social Grunt Deer Pawning Deer Rattling Deer Tending Grunt Deer Wheeze Doe Grunt Estrus Bleat Mild Estrus Bleat Fawn Distress Fawn Grunt Young Buck Grunt Additional Features: .Moon phase for any date in weekly view .Solunar day ratings for any date in weeklu view .Set the sound as your ringtone The Solunar day ratings (1 - 6, where 6 deers is when the deers are most active) helps you choose the days that are most likely to be productive. Comments from hunter mom: Works! I downloaded this app and went hunting that evening. I used the doe distress call & 5 deer walked out.

description: Enjoy the Words boggler game experience for free on your android smartphone and tablet. The rules of Words Boggler: Put your word skills to test and seek words using alphabets placed up/down, left/right or diagonal to each other. Find as many words as you can within a time frame and learn new words each time you play this game. This game can be played alone or with friends of all ages. Words Boggler has improved the user's experience by enhancing the words finder algorithm and making the app bug free. This app is compatible with all android mobile phones and tablets including Samsung ,HTC, Motorola, Asus, Sony and others... Words Boggler Features: - Now supports multiple languages. You can seek words using our in built french and english dictionary. - The game supports more than 50 languages - A puzzle game Suitable for all age groups - Flexible time limits to choose from. - Displays all possible words that could be created at the end of each game. - Best Score Saving! - Newly added Sound, Music and Volume control Disclaimer: Boggle(TM) is a registered trademark of Hasbro, with whom this app is in no way affiliated. Words Boggler offers a variant of the traditional Boggle, with different rules of game play and board distribution. If you are looking to play traditional Boggle, please visit www.hasbro.com.
