description: Deze digitale natuurgids Tuinvogels van Nederland maakt deel uit van een serie mobiele informatiesystemen voor het herkennen van soorten in de natuur. Ze zijn ontwikkeld in het kader van het EU KeyToNature project dat beoogt flora- en fauna-informatie snel en makkelijk toegankelijk te maken. Deze e-guide bevat: - Informatie over bijna 100 soorten vogels die in steden en dorpen worden gezien - Ruim 350 foto's en tekeningen - De geluiden van vrijwel alle soorten - Een determinatiesleutel voor het identificeren van soorten - Een alfabetische soortenlijst met een zoekfunctie E-guides voor orchideeën, vlinders, roofvogels, vissen, reptielen en amfibieën zijn reeds beschikbaar; andere titels zijn in voorbereiding. Deze titel is een aangepaste heruitgave van de CD-ROM Vogels van Europa (ISBN 90-215-3009-0), gepubliceerd door ETI. Behalve Tuinvogels van Nederland is er een e-flora en een serie e-fauna's (vogels van Europa, vlinders, reptielen en amfibieën en zoetwatervissen). Andere titels zijn in voorbereiding. Colofon: Samenstelling: Tekla Boersma, Huub Veldhuijzen van Zanten en Paul Klinkenberg Programmering: Dennis Seijts, Stefano Martellos en Edwin van Spronsen Initiatief: ETI BioInformatics Identificatiesleutel: Ronald Sluys, Gideon Gijswijt en Huub Veldhuijzen van Zanten Tekeningen: F.J. Maas, Joh. Reydon en P. van der Wolf Geluiden: C. Hazevoet en L. Svensson Foto's: De volgende natuurfotografen zijn wij zeer erkentelijk voor hun bereidwillige medewerking: Han Bouwmeester (www.hanbouwmeester.nl), Jankees Schwiebbe (www.birdphoto.nl), Pieter Dol (www.pieterdol.com), Richard Diepstraten (www.pbase.com/richard2051), Toy Jansen (www.globalbirding.com), Edwin van Spronsen en Stichting Saxifraga (Piet Munsterman, Luc Hoogenstein en Jan C. van der Straaten). ETI BioInformatics is in 1990 opgericht door de Nederlandse overheid en UNESCO om brede toegang tot informatie op het gebied van de taxonomie en biodiversiteit te faciliteren. Zie www.eti.uva.nl This digital naturalist Garden Birds Netherlands is part of a series of mobile systems for identifying species in nature. They are developed in the framework of the EU project that aims KeyToNature flora and fauna information quickly and easily accessible. This app includes: - Information on nearly 100 species of birds that are seen in towns and villages - More than 350 photos and drawings - The sounds of almost all kinds - An identification key for the identification of species - An alphabetical list of species with a search function E-Guides for orchids, butterflies, birds of prey, fish, reptiles and amphibians are already available, other titles are in preparation. This title is a modified version of the CD-ROM Birds of Europe (ISBN 90-215-3009-0), published by ETI. Except Garden Birds Netherlands is an e-flora and a series of e-faunas (birds of Europe, butterflies, reptiles and amphibians and freshwater fish). Other titles are in preparation. Imprint: Composition: Tekla Boersma, Veldhuijzen Huub van Zanten and Paul Klinkenberg Programming: Dennis Seijts, Stefano Martellos and Edwin van Spronsen Initiative: ETI BioInformatics Identification Key: Ronald Sluys, and Gideon Gijswijt Veldhuijzen Huub van Zanten Drawings: FJ Maas, John. Reydon and P. van der Wolf Sounds: C. Hazevoet and L. Svensson Photos: The following photographers we are very grateful for their generous support: Han Bouwmeester (www.hanbouwmeester.nl), Jankees Schwiebbe (www.birdphoto.nl), Pieter Dol (www.pieterdol.com), Richard Diepstraten (www.pbase .com/richard2051), Toy Jansen (www.globalbirding.com), Edwin van Spronsen and Saxifraga Foundation (Piet Munsterman, Luc Hoogenstein and Jan C. van der Straaten). ETI BioInformatics was founded in 1990 by the Dutch government and UNESCO to facilitate. Broad access to information in the field of taxonomy and biodiversity See www.eti.uva.nl

description: It is a game that trains your melody memory, and also a colorful keyboard that can simulate a lot of instruments. The gameplay is simple: listen to the melody and then repeat it if you can. There is also a multiplayer mode where you can play with your friends on the same device. (Currently, up to 4 players is supported.) In the improvise mode, you can create and play your own melody / music simply by dancing your fingers on the Melody Squares. The Melody Squares can simulate a lot of instruments in different keys, octaves, and scales. Currently 13 instruments are supported: - Acoustic Grand Piano - Acoustic Guitar (nylon) - Overdriven Guitar - Violin - Church Organ - Soprano Sax - French Horn - Music Box - Taiko Drum - Percussive Organ - Harmonica - Trumpet (The online leaderboard is currently not working because the original service provider OpenFeint has shut down its service in December of 2012. A new online leaderboard system will be implemented and used in the next version.) Have fun!

description: Life is short but running makes it seem longer! The addictive Stickman Run is now available on the market, for free! All your friends are playing it - can you beat their high scores?! Stickman wants to escape from the world created by his designer and you have to help him through all his struggles. Test your reflexes as you race along the bridges. Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid obstacles, collect coins and see how far you can run! You will have to run like hell to escape from this virtual office temple! All your abilities will be required to dodge all the office tools on your path. Run, skip and evade a great amount of staplers, paperclips, scotch tape, pencils like spears, pens, erasers, highlighters, markers, scissors, rulers and many more, to give our brave hero at least the illusion of freedom. Every collision can bring him a step closer to his confinement or even death. 3, 2, 1 go! We challenge you! Show us what you can and do your best! If you cannot save our reckless super crazy character from his prison, he will probably need some surgery to get back on his feet and be ready for a new escaping attempt. Features: ★ Easy touch control ★ Original 3D-run function combines jumping, turning, and sliding. ★ Colorful graphics and smooth animations ★ The coolest Stickman ever to play with! ★ The never-ending mega game ★ Time change like: Night, day, sun rise, sun set and moon rise / set ★ Special abilities: ✔ Thunderbolt / Lightning: Makes you run much faster (at a nearly uncontrollable speed) ✔ Chronometer: Resets your speed to normal (slows you down) ✔ Shield: Makes you invincible for 10 seconds (The only thing you have to remember is to turn at every corner) Advise: Catch the chronometer during your rush through the city to slow down the speed and increase the possibility of getting farther. Warning: Avoid the thunderbolt power up, as it will give you a turbo boost that makes you incredibly fast, but you will probably quickly lose control of Stickman. The only way to stop the high speed is to take a chronometer. If you like racing, stunts, sprint, doodle, adventure and action games in general then you will definitely love Stickman Run. Fun is guaranteed! If your phone/tablet/device has enough CPU processor speed, this game is displayed in HD.

description: Easy to use, fast, field-friendly ballistic calculator tailored to those using ballistic drop compensating scopes. Features: - Over 500 factory loads to choose from. - You can save your own cartridges and custom gun data. - Calculates drop, wind drift, correct hold-over aimpoint and the number of scope turret clicks for ballistic drop compensating scopes. - Ability to override drop calculations with observed values. - User-defined shooting distances and environment variables (temperature and elevation). - User-defined scope reticles (aimpoints that are circles, dots, or lines representing user-defined hold-over distances). - Estimates the Ballistic Coefficient for bullets if the user does not know them. Full-featured PC version at www.becrs.com.

description: The F-Ready mobile application empowers the user with the ability to communicate their GPS location and alert status to three friends via any email address during, after or just prior to a disaster striking. The original “Disaster ID” application was designed to empower citizens caught in the aftermath of a disaster, such as a Hurricane or Tornado, with a method of visually signaling their location, condition and group makeup to their neighbors and/or first responders. When you first download the f-Ready app you will enter your name, phone number and the three emails of the friends who you would like to be alerted in case of an emergency. When you activate your f-Ready app you will not only change the screen to the appropriate Disaster ID color selection, you will also send your GPS coordinates and an alert message via email to the three friends you had entered. Your friends now know you are in need of assistance and know your GPS location. The friends can now go help you or call authorities with the information and tell them the GPS coordinates and to look for the illuminated signal coming from the phone.
release_text: Updated f-Ready app - now utilizes any email address, instead of just Facebook buddies to send email alert notification. Fixed issues in older version related to refreshing and transmitting current GPS location and maneuvering between app screens and internet screens.

description: ********Not all Functionality Active Yet************* *******We are not yet to provide offline support for this app************* Currently active are Differentiation Calculators Derivative calculator Subtraction Rule Product Rule Quotient Rule Power Rule Chain Rule Addition Rule Limit Function Value Calculator Homogeneous Differential Equations Integral Calculus Calculators Trapezoidal Rule Approximate Integration Simpson's Rule Numerical Integration Romberg's Numerical Integration Integral Transport Function Calculator Differentiation is all about finding rates of change (derivative) of one quantity compared to another. We need differentiation when the rate of change is not constant. Derivative Calculator computes a derivative of a given function with respect to a given variable using analytical differentiation. In calculus, the subtraction rule in differentiation is a method of finding the derivative of a function that is the subtraction of two other functions for which derivatives exist. The subtraction rule in integration follows from it. The rule itself is a direct consequence of differentiation. In calculus, the product rule of derivatives is a method of finding the derivative of a function that is the multiplication of two other functions for which derivatives exist. The product rule in integration follows from it. The rule itself is a direct consequence of differentiation. In calculus, the quotient rule of derivatives is a method of finding the derivative of a function that is the division of two other functions for which derivatives exist. The quotient rule in integration follows from it. The rule itself is a direct consequence of differentiation. In calculus, the power rule of derivatives is a method of finding the derivative of a function that is the multiplication of two other functions for which derivatives exist. The rule itself is a direct consequence of differentiation In calculus, the chain rule of derivatives is a method of finding the derivative of a function that is the composition of two functions for which derivatives exist. The rule itself is a direct consequence of differentiation.. In calculus, the sum rule in differentiation is a method of finding the derivative of a function that is the sum of two other functions for which derivatives exist. The sum rule in integration follows from it. The rule itself is a direct consequence of differentiation. Trapezoidal / Trapezium Rule is a method of finding an approximate value for an numerical integral, based on finding the sum of the areas of trapezia. Trapezium rule is also known as method of approximate integration. A slight underestimate will often be cancelled by a similar slight overestimate from another trapezium. Using narrower intervals will improve accuracy. Simpson's 1/3 Rule Numerical Integration is used to estimate the value of a definite integral. It works by creating an even number of intervals and fitting a parabola in each pair of intervals. Simpson's rule provides the exact result for a quadratic function or parabola. Romberg's Method Numerical Integration is based on the trapezoidal rule, where we use two estimates of an integral to compute a third integral that is more accurate than the previous integrals. This is called Richardson's extrapolation. A perfect tool for college going students and mathematicians. Disclaimer: This app used web Api of calculation from www.catoom.com with Due permission App Developer : Ariful Haque Shisir

description: A GPS-based lap timer. Analyze your performance and improve your lap times by seeing exactly where you are and how fast you're going at every point around the track. Designed for car or motorcycle track days but can be used for any circuit lapping (running, biking, etc) or even as a simple GPS logger. Features - Use pre-defined start/finish points for major tracks or easily set your own using Google maps or your current location. - Use the internal phone GPS, or a Bluetooth-enabled GPS receiver for faster update rates and better accuracy. - See, in real-time, how your current lap compares to your previous lap and best lap. - See exact position and speed for each lap. - Analyze your performance and consistency by directly comparing different laps on a single map. - Display data in metric or english units. - Export session data to CSV file. - Shows braking and acceleration points If you have questions, comments or suggestions email support@velocityferocity.com

And it's free. • Does changing Time zones affect your business; as you are not sure what time it is in the specific country? Now Stay updated with the time of all cities around the world. • Check date and time on a single screen at one go. You can even change the cities according to your preference and the app will show the time of that selected city from any part of the world. • If you have friends and family in other countries, or need to work on a daily basis with people in multiple time zones around the world, then this app is definitely for you. Features: • Show time at current location and any location world-wide. • More than 500+ cities in all time zones of the world with their flag! • Have analog clock styles • Greatly configurable • Can change city’s name, long click on the city you want to change with the new name. • Select the city that you want to add from the list of cities. • The analog world clock of the unique design, that display the time of the world.

description: * Kids memory game: animals is the classic board game, which help develop memory skills of children. * Playing this game with your kids will help them improve their recognition while having fun. * Kids memory game contains very cute images of animals as lion, cat, dog, etc., which are on memory cards. * Animals memory game is a game for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children and teens. Both, boys and girls will love this game. HOW TO PLAY ANIMALS GAME FOR KIDS: Initially you will see all cards turned face down. Tap on one of the card and remember the picture on it. With the next tap try to find and flip the card with the same picture as previous one. If the pictures on the both memory cards will be the same, they will stay opened and you can continue with the next pair. Otherwise both cards will flip back over and you will get another try. Try to find all matched cards as fast as possible. FEATURES ( of animals memory game for kids ): - 3 different difficulty (easy: 2x3; medium: 3x4; hard: 4x5) - develops recognition, concentration and motor skills of kid - cute sounds for kids - colorful HD graphic designed for toddlers - contains beautiful images of animals - visual memory training - highscore (paid feature) * Simple and intuitive interface which is easy to use and easy to play, specially designed for children. * Animals memory game for kids is also optimized for tablets (provide HD pictures). * This free kids memory game will keep your kids quiet and entertained in car, in a restaurant or everywhere.
release_text: Performance improvement of animals memory game for kids

description: This creative building game for kids allows you to make a whole new world in one fun app! If you can imagine it you can build it with the six Toca Builders! Join your new Toca Builders friends on an island far away and create a whole new world with blocks. Jump, walk, roll and rotate the builders to use their unique skills, and they will help to build whatever you can imagine! Toca Builders is a kids app that makes it fun to drop, spray, smash and lift blocks to construct new objects - may it be a house, lamp or maybe a banana? Let's get started by putting down some blocks. MEET THE BUILDERS! Blox: Great at dropping and smashing blocks Cooper: A fantastic painter Vex: Amazing at putting blocks in stacks Stretch: Specialized at placing blocks anywhere Connie: Enjoys lifting and moving blocks Jum-Jum: Loves to spray paint The builders will guarantee that you’re having a good time when create your world! Toca Builders is a new way of creating and crafting things with blocks, that encourages both creativity and curiosity. With simple touch gestures and unique controls the builders come alive and help create a world only you can dream up! To save your world, just tap the Back-button to go back to the main menu and everything you've made is saved. The snapshot feature makes it easy to take a photo of your construction to share with the world! Key Toca Boca App Features • 6 super builders • Build whatever you want - drop, spray, lift and smash! • Color each individual blocks as you want • Unique controls of the builders - spin, roll, aim and move • Autosave guarantees your progresses is saved • Use the snapshot feature to take a photo of your creation • Easy-to-use app for kids with a kid-friendly interface • Incredible creative possibilities • Beautiful original graphics • No rules, stress or time limits – play any way you want • No third-party advertising • No in-app purchases About Toca Boca Kids Apps Toca Boca is a game studio that makes digital toys for kids and educational apps for kids. We think playing and having fun is the best way to learn about the world. Therefore we make digital toys and games that help stimulate the imagination, and that you can play together with your kids. Best of all - we do it in a safe way without third-party advertising or in-app purchases. Privacy Policy Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: http://tocaboca.com/privacy

description: Talking Goggles can recognize images and speaks out what it finds. - Recognizes almost any image within seconds. Logos, landmarks, books, products, artwork, text and more.. - Shows the description of the image and speaks it out to you. - Speaks it out using the correct accent of your selected language. - Includes a torchlight to assist in reading. - Video mode. Talking Goggles will continuously check the video stream for any familiar images, and will present it and speak it out when it finds something. - Easy copy function. Use goggles as a scanner/translator and use the results in any other application. - Look up more details on the image found by doing a direct search. Or, if it is a product, check where it is available nearby, and show a price comparison. Don't know the name of that actor on that poster? Just point your camera at it and Talking Goggles will tell you! Want to find out if that product is really the cheapest around? Take a picture and let Talking Goggles do a comparison for you. Point Talking Goggles at a logo, and you will be told the name of the company after which you can do a search for it. Talking Goggles is particularly good at recognizing book covers and posters. Try it out!

description: This program allows to record phone calls. The program is designed to be a very simple in use. The program gives options to delete records automatically when they becoming old or when a record length is not long enough to be saved. Additionally it is possible to disable recording when headphones or Bluetooth device is used. Also it is possible to disable recording for incoming or outgoing calls. WARNING: The app does not work on S4 and Note 3 with KitKat 4.4.2 if records are being stored on a SD card. It is highly recommended for Note 3 users not to update to KitKat 4.4.2 Features list: - Recording calls, ability to use automatic and manual recording modes - Showing grouped records extended with contact information such as name and icon - Disable recording when headphones on or Bluetooth device connected - Disable recording for incoming, outgoing call and for some contacts - Specify different audio sources for headphones and Bluetooth devices - Calling, sending SMS, creating an event from the app - Mark records as important, highlight and write notes - Stop recording from a notification - Play, delete the recent record from a notification - Specify a recording delay, a minimal length of records - Enable/disable the detailed notifications in the program - Split recording into multiple files - Deleting a record or many records at once - Locking/Unlocking records to prevent unwanted deleting - Ability to delete records automatically - Send records to SkyDrive etc - Integration with Google+ - Screen Lock - Saving records to MicroSD card, DropBox disk Recommended devices for a two-way recording: GALAXY: S5 (klte) Note3 (hltespr, ha3g) S4 (jflte) S4 Zoom (mproject3g) S4 mini (serranods, serranolte) Note 8.0 (kona3g) Note2 (t03g) S3 (m0, GT-I9300) ( except d2spr. d2att, d2mtr, d2can, CyanogenMod ) S3 Duos (arubaslim) MEGA (crater) Grand Duos (baffin) S2 (GT-I9100) ( Android 2.3 only ) S II (SGH-T989) S Advance (GT-I9070) Note (GT-N7000) Mini2 (GT-S6500D) Y (GT-S5360) Y Duos (GT-S6102) Y Duos Lite (GT-S5302) Y TV (GT-S5367) S DUOS (logan2g) S Epic (SPH-D710VMUB) Star (mint) Ace (GT-S5839i) Ace Duos (GT-S6802) Win (delos3geur) Core (arubaslim) Young (royssnfc, roy) Pocket Neo (corsica) XPERIA: Z1/Z (C6903) SP (C5303) U (ST25i) LNV-Lenovo A790e (msm7627a) Acer E320 (C6) ZTE N9120 (elden) Xolo X900 (blackbay) Moto G LG Optimus L1II (v1) Qilive 53 (msm8625) FAQ Q. Galaxy Call Recorder stopped working. A. 1) Make sure "Audio Source set to "Voice Up-Link + Down-Link" 2) Reboot your device 3) Use only one call recorder at the same time Q. I have purchased the ads-free item but the ads are back. What can I do? A. You could try to do the following to see if it resolves your issue with the ads. Clear the cache/data of Google Play Store (Menu > Settings > Applications > Manage applications > All > Google Play Store > Clear cache / Clear data) Q. When I use "Bluetooth" "Galaxy Call Recorder" records only incoming side of conversation A. This is the specific of Android OS which cannot be solved. Q. What is the max size of the recording which can be recorded? A. It depends on the free resources of your device. Galaxy Call Recorder does not limit the length of recordings. Q. Where can I find the files of the recordings? A. /sdcard/GalaxyCallRecorder/ Q. What is the recording file pattern A. (DIRECTION)_(PHONENUMBER)_(TIME IN MILLISECONDS SINCE 1 Jan 1970)_(CALL LENGTH IN SECONDS).(FILE EXT) OUT_+447852599999_1365174018295_257.acc Q. "Galaxy Call Recorder" does not record some calls A. It is depends on the resources of the device. It is recommended to reboot your device once a three days.
release_text: Version 1.21 - DropBox removed to suppress virus/trojan warning from antiviruses Version 1.20 - Hungarian localization - DropBox SDK updated Version 1.19 - Italian localization - Fixed issue with DropBox and Ads Version 1.18 - Ability to start recording manually - Improved UI for Notifications - Spanish localization Version 1.17 - UI Improvements (Users of Android 2.3+ and Android 4.0+ have the same interface now) Version 1.16 - Added Bing Daily Wallpapers ...

description: Dos criadores de Quem Quer Milhões! O Trivial é o teu jogo de cultura geral dividido por diversas categorias para desafiar o teu conhecimento Como jogar: • Começa um novo jogo • Seleciona a tua categoria preferida • Responde a 15 perguntas no menor tempo possível • Quanto mais perguntas certas seguidas, mais pontos ganhas! Podes escolher entre as seguintes categorias: • Geografia (Países, bandeiras, capitais...) • Entretenimento (Filmes, música...) • História • Arte e Literatura (Livros, artistas...) • Ciência e Natureza • Desporto e Lazer (Futebol, gastronomia...) Não queres ficar apenas por uma categoria? Não há problema! Podes escolher o modo aleatório para que o teu jogo tenha um pouco de tudo ;) ESTATÍSTICAS: O Quiz TRIVIAL mostra um conjunto de estatísticas para que fiques à par do teu desempenho no jogo e tentes sempre melhorar os teus máximos! AMIGOS: Poderás também competir com os teus amigos (Login com Facebook) ou outros jogadores através do ranking online, para que possas mostrar o que vales! MODO SEM TEMPO: Joga sem limite de tempo para relaxar e partilhar conhecimentos em família ou com teus amigos. MODO CONTRARRELÓGIO: Neste modo de jogo tens tempo limitado para responder a cada uma das perguntas. O teu desafio é ser o mais rápido. Ainda não estás convencido? - Um jogo de quiz para se divertir e aprender com toda a família. A não perder. - Um quiz viciante e divertido com perguntas atualizadas para jogar em qualquer altura. - Mais de 20.000 perguntas para testar o teu conhecimento e cultura geral. - Este jogo de trivia está disponível em 6 línguas: Inglês, Francês, Alemão, Espanhol, Italiano e Português. - O passatempo ideal para mostrar como ainda tens muito para aprender. - O Trivial é um jogo dinâmico para agilizar o teu raciocínio e ajudar-te a ser cada vez mais rápido. - Partilha nas redes sociais as tuas conquistas e mostra aos teus amigos que és o melhor! Tens comentários ou precisas de ajuda, contacta-nos info@walkme.pt From the creators of Who Wants Millions! The Trivial is your general knowledge game divided by different categories to challenge your knowledge How to play: • Starts a new game • Select your preferred category • Answers to 15 questions in the shortest time possible • The more followed right questions, the more points you earn! You can choose from the following categories: • Geography (countries, flags, capitals ...) • Entertainment (movies, music ...) • History • Art and Literature (books, artists ...) • Science & Nature • Sports and Leisure (Football, gastronomy ...) Will not you stay only for a category? No problem! You can choose the random mode so that your game has a bit of everything;) STATISTICS: The Quiz TRIVIAL shows a set of statistics for you to stay on track of your performance in the game and try to always improve your maximum! FRIENDS: You can also compete with your friends (Login with Facebook) or other players via online leaderboards, so you can show what you got! NO TIME MODE: Play with no time limit to relax and share knowledge with family or your friends. CONTRARRELÓGIO MODE: In this game mode you have limited time to answer each question. Your challenge is to be the fastest. You're not yet convinced? - A quiz game to have fun and learn with the whole family. Not to be missed. - An addictive and fun quiz with questions updated to play at any time. - More than 20,000 questions to test your knowledge and general culture. - This trivia game is available in 6 languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian and Portuguese. - The ideal hobby to show how much you still have to learn. - The Trivial is a dynamic game to speed up your thinking and help you to be faster and faster. - Share in social networks your achievements and show your friends you're the best! Do you have comments or need help, contact us info@walkme.pt
release_text: - Novo visual: simples, bonito, colorido e elegante! - Perguntas com imagens - 10 perguntas por ronda (em vez de 15) - Bónus de tempo: ganha +5 segundos em cada pergunta - (BREVEMENTE) Modo MULTIPLAYER: Desafia os teus amigos! - Ideias e sugestões? Contacta-nos!

description: This app contains 5 free fonts compatible with the FlipFont program that is installed on most Samsung Galaxy devices. This app is designed to be used with Samsung Galaxy devices that are using the TouchWiz interface and have the FlipFont program. NOTE: This App is NOT sponsored, endorsed, or affiliated with Monotype Imaging, Inc, the owner of the FlipFont trademark and technology. Fonts for Android Samsung Galaxy FlipFont Free have spent the last year gathering free fonts and creating Android apps to provide users with the ability to change their device’s typeface for free. Using the FlipFont font changer program installed on your Samsung Galaxy phone, you can use this application to customise your device to one of the many beautiful fonts that we have collected. Each Bundle of fonts is a random selection of 5 typefaces that have been optimised for use on Samsung Galaxy Android devices. Please browse through our many FlipFont packs to find the perfect font styles that fits your taste. To change fonts on your Samsung Galaxy device, navigate to the display settings in your device's system settings. In the display settings you can change the font style to any of these 5 new fonts for Android. This font pack should work on all Galaxy brand phones and will provide fonts for Samsung Galaxy 3 (S3), fonts for Samsung Galaxy 4 (S4), and fonts for Galaxy Note 3. This app will not work on developer devices, such as the Galaxy Nexus, because it does not have the FlipFont program. Please verify that your phone can change its font. Look for the font style option in the display or screen display section of your device settings. This app is not designed as fonts for root and does not require root permission to change your font, nor will it require you to restart your phone.* Also, you will be able to enjoy your fonts for texting and messaging, however the typeface used on your device will not be sent to people that you send a text message to. We love fonts and love to personalise our Android devices with unique typefaces. We hope you enjoy all of the fonts that we have collected for use on FlipFont free. Please let us know if you have any issues using a font or any suggestions on fonts that you would like to see. * Phone restart will not be required for devices running Android 3.0 or later. Devices such as the Samsung Galaxy Y and Samsung Galaxy Ace will still require a restart to apply the new font. This android application is not affiliated with FlipFont or Monotype Imaging Inc. All functionality, trademarks and copyrights remain the property of their respective owners.

description: L'application Constitution du Bénin facilite et favorise l'accès au grand public des textes de la Loi Suprême du Bénin. Vous pouvez depuis votre mobile ou tablette et connecté à internet découvrir, lire, apprendre ou partager avec vos proches les articles de la Constitution. Donner l'accès au plus grand nombre de citoyens des articles de la Constitution contribue à l'éducation pour tous. Un citoyen qui connaît sa constitution connaît ses droits et devoirs envers la société. Télécharger, découvrir et comprendre les articles en famille, entre amis où que vous soyez sur votre tablette ou mobile. Vous aussi contribuer à l'éducation pour tous en partageant avec le plus grand nombre l'application. The application of the Constitution Benin facilitates and promotes public access to the texts of the Supreme Law of Benin. From your mobile or tablet you connected to the internet and discover, read, learn or share with your friends the articles of the Constitution. Provide access to the greatest number of citizens of articles of the Constitution contributes to education for all. A citizen who knows his constitution knows his rights and duties towards society. Download, discover and understand the items with family and friends wherever you are on your tablet or mobile. You also contribute to education for all by sharing the application with the greatest number.
release_text: La nouvelle version 1.1 apporte les améliorations suivantes : - L'application est disponible sans connexion internet - Nouveau bouton "Partager" en cliquant sur l'icône "i" - Correction du bug au lancement - Correction du bug lié à l'ouverture de la page "A propos" sur certains modèles de téléphone - Correction de bugs mineurs au chargement d'un article

description: Race with Tiny and his friends in the most fun runner that EVERYONE is playing. Race against 3 of the cutest opponents to win races and unlock new exciting worlds, zones and weapons using sneaky and devious weapons. Tiny Run is a single player as well as a Multiplayer racing game with upto 4 players playing together that are connected on wi-fi. Choose between various characters and levels as you battle it out with your opponents to be the ultimate winner in this race for running supremacy, using devious, sneaky powerups and low cunning to outrun your opponents. If you think you're in for an easy win, think again, because nothing's for sure in TinyRun until you've crossed the finish line! Winning a race has never been this much fun! Awesome Features: - Compete across many different, beautifully-designed worlds - Funny and despicable powerups to use against your opponents! - Collect quirky characters with unique abilities! - Easy, intuitive controls - Safe for kids - No inappropriate violence - Save your progress across all your devices! PS - TinyRun is free to play but contains in-app purchases that can be bought for real money.
release_text: ★★ We have a very special, limited time character - available during these holidays ONLY ★★ Guess who was playing Tiny Run? I'll give you a hint - this guy is from the North Pole ... So a funny thing happened. The gang (Charlie, Kona, Rexar and me) were so psyched to have Santa playing the game - that we pulled him into the game itself - and I mean this quite literally. Here is wishing you a terrific Christmas and a glorious new year from the entire gang here at Tiny Run. Tiny out!

description: If you are looking for the best ocean–inspired live wallpaper on the market, you can stop your search, since this amazing Sea Shell Live Wallpaper offers you wonderful animated backgrounds of colorful and sparky seashells scattered across sand covered beaches. Conch shell, abalone shell, starfish...check what it is that the waves have brought to the shore! Seashells Live Wallpaper allows you to take a peek at the lavish and colorful underwater world, without diving into deep blue ocean! All the magic of these sea creatures can now be at your fingertips with this beautiful live wallpaper seashell pictures. - Amazing 3D live wallpaper for your phone! - Animated sea shells floating on your screen; - Full support for landscape mode and home - screen switching! - Amazing HD graphics; - Social share button and more - This beautiful, free and enjoyable background is waiting for you! Follow the installation instructions: Home - > Menu - > Wallpapers - > Live Wallpapers - Motion of flashes and lights keeps changing with time. - You can choose from several different Sea Shell background themes. - Optimized Battery Usage - Compatible with 99% mobile phone devices. - The wallpaper app will sleep when your phone is inactive, so this live wallpaper will not drain your battery. - Sea Shell Live Background fully supports horizontal orientation and looks amazing on both mobile phones and tablet devices. Seashells are truly amazing sea animals which inspire both with appearance and unusual characteristics. They have the ability to create precious pearls inside them from a substance called mother of pearl. Natural, fresh water pearls from deep oceans are immensely valuable and can cost a fortune – especially the well known and rear black pearl. This “marine live wallpaper” with wonderful seashells pictures of vivid and bright colors will beautify your mobile phone screen like no other wallpaper! Take a stroll along the beautiful beach of white sand and start your own collection of marvelous ocean shells and sea stars. This brand new “Seashell Live Wallpaper” will inspire you to start noticing these miraculous sea creatures which can be an amazing decoration for your home, not only for your smartphone. Get this cool free app for Android™ now, and enjoy the very best from the unbelievably rich sea world. You don’t have to dive all the way down to coral reefs to experience the natural wonders of the underwater world! “Sea Shell Live Wallpaper” offers you the most wonderful “images of seashells”, starfishes and other sea creatures which can now rest on the palm of your hand, making you feel like you are somewhere on the sunny beach with the warm white sand beneath your feet, listening the sound of the waves. It’s amazing what just one “live wallpaper” has to offer! Get the inspiration from this cool new “Sea Shell Live Wallpaper” – with these colorful “sea shells” you can make wonderful decorations for your home, amazing bracelets and necklaces…you can brighten up everyday, and make everyone around you feel like they are on the beach, sunbathing on the warm sand and enjoying life! Share these amazing high definition background pictures of unusually-shaped shells with your friends – they will love you for that! *Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. *This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Samsung.

description: **AGORA COM SUPORTE AS CIDADES DE RIO DE JANEIRO E GRANDE SÃO PAULO ** Acompanhe o trajeto do seu ônibus e a situação da CPTM e do Metrô em tempo real e nunca mais perca tempo parado no ponto. Andar de ônibus, metrô ou trens em São Paulo ou no Rio de Janeiro ficou muito mais fácil com o Ônibus ao Vivo, seu aplicativo oficial de transporte público! COMO O ÔNIBUS AO VIVO FUNCIONA 1. Faça o download e abra o aplicativo; 2. Localize a melhor e mais rápida linha de ônibus para seu destino; 3. Acompanhe no mapa o trajeto do ônibus e o horário estimado de chegada; 4. Veja a situação das linhas de trens e metrô próximas e escolha o melhor caminho; 5. Favorite suas linhas prediletas e facilite ainda mais seu dia a dia. VANTAGENS - Localize linhas e horários de ônibus da SPtrans (Sistema OlhoVivo) na capital e EMTU na região metropolitana - Localize linhas e ônibus da Cidade do Rio de Janeiro (Fetranspor); - Saiba a posição em tempo real de todos os onibus, bem como sua estimativa de horário de chegada; - Confira a situação das linhas da CPTM, Metrô de São Paulo e ViaQuatro (Suporte apenas em São Paulo); - Alertas Ao Vivo: recurso exclusivo que te avisa quando seu ônibus está chegando - Veja quais linhas de onibus estão ao redor de onde você está (disponível apenas para ônibus SPTrans); - Consulte até três linhas de onibus simultaneamente e escolha melhor o seu trajeto; - Explore a rota feita por uma linha e veja a localização de todas as paradas no trajeto; - Reveja rapidamente o histórico de pesquisas recentes; - Salve as linhas que mais usa como favoritas; - Identifique ônibus adaptados para pessoas com necessidades especiais; DISPONIBILIDADE DO SERVIÇO Disponível nas cidades de Rio de Janeiro - RJ, São Paulo - SP e região metropolitana - ABCD (Santo André, São Bernardo, São Caetano e Diadema - EMTU). Em breve em Santa Catarina e Belo Horizonte. Estamos trabalhando na expansão dos nossos serviços para outras cidades do Brasil. DEPOIMENTOS "Esse app eh sensacional, um Waze dos onibus, não achei que um serviço como esse pudesse existir!" - Paulo M. "Adorei o aplicativo porque ele mostra a posição do ônibus que quero pegar, parece mágica! Nunca mais fiquei parada no ponto de ônibus esperando por muito tempo, esse app é muito que o Moovit e BusFinder SP." - Sara COMO O ONIBUS AO VIVO PODE TE AJUDAR NO DIA-A-DIA - Para quem utiliza transporte público todo dia e nunca sabe qual o horário certo de ir para o ponto esperar seu ônibus - Descobrir quais linhas de ônibus próximas a você e qual a mais rápida - Obter previsões do seu tempo de deslocamento - Descobrir linhas de ônibus diferentes que chegam ao mesmo destino - Acesso rápido a estimativa de chegada do próximo ônibus em sua linha favorita - Descobrir quantos pontos de ônibus existem em seu trajeto, e em qual você deve descer para chegar ao seu destino - Para comparar linhas de ônibus diferentes para descobrir qual é melhor para o seu trajeto Com o Onibus Ao Vivo ficou ainda mais fácil escolher o onibus para chegar ao trabalho, ir a eventos, shows, shoppings, faculdade, etc. Nossa missão é facilitar a vida das pessoas que precisam andar de onibus todos os dias em grandes cidades, diminuindo seu tempo de espera nos pontos e economizando tempo. -------------- Onibus Ao Vivo é um aplicativo de transporte público com foco em localização e horários de onibus em tempo real. Para maiores informações e suporte, visite: www.cisnt.com.br/onibus ** NOW WITH SUPPORT THE CITIES OF RIO DE JANEIRO AND SAO PAULO GREAT ** Follow the path of your bus and the situation CPTM and Metro in real time and never miss downtime in point. Riding the bus, subway or train in Sao Paulo or Rio de Janeiro has become much easier with the Bus Live, its official application for public transportation! AS BUS LIVE WORK 1 Download and open the application; 2 Locate the best and quickest bus route to your destination; 3 Follow the path on the map of the bus and the estimated time of arrival; 4 See the status of trains and subway lines nearby and choose the best path; 5 Favorite your favorite lines and further facilitate their daily life. ADVANTAGES - Locate lines and bus schedules of SPTRANS System (Hawkeye) in the capital and in the metropolitan area EMTU - Locate lines and bus from Rio de Janeiro City (Fetranspor); - Learn the real time position of all buses, as well as their estimated time of arrival; - Check the status of CPTM lines, São Paulo Metro and ViaQuatro (Support only in São Paulo); - Live Alerts: unique feature that warns you when your bus is coming - See what bus lines are around where you are (only available for bus SPTrans); - Refer to three bus lines simultaneously and choose your best route; - Explore the route taken by a line and see the location of all the stops on the path; - Briefly review the recent search history; - Save the lines you use most as favorites; - Identify bus adapted for people with special needs; AVAILABILITY OF SERVICE Available in the cities of Rio de Janeiro - RJ, São Paulo - SP and metropolitan region - ABCD (Santo André, São Bernardo, São Caetano and Diadema - EMTU). Soon in Santa Catarina and Belo Horizonte. We are working on expanding our services to other cities in Brazil. TESTIMONIALS "This app eh sensational, Waze one of the bus, I did not think that such a service could exist!" - Paul M. "I love the application because it shows the position of the bus that want to get, it seems magical! Never stood at the bus stop waiting for a long time, this app is very Moovit and BusFinder the SP." - Sara HOW THE BUS CAN HELP YOU LIVE IN DAY-TO-DAY - For those who use public transport every day and never know what the right time to go to the point waiting for your bus - Find out which bus lines close to you and what the fastest - Get your travel time predictions - Discover different bus lines that arrive at the same destination - Quick access to estimate the arrival of the next bus at your favorite online - Figure out how many bus stops are there in your path, and that you should go down to get to your destination - To compare different bus lines to find what is best for your commute With the Bus Live was even easier to choose the bus to get to work, go to events, concerts, malls, college, etc. Our mission is to make life easier for people who need to ride a bus every day in large cities, reducing their waiting time in points and time saving. -------------- Bus Live is an application of public transport with a focus on location and bus schedules in real time. For more information and support visit: www.cisnt.com.br/onibus
release_text: Versão 2.1.2: - Rio de Janeiro! Nós chegamos :) Versão 2.1.1: - Integração com situação de trens (CPTM) e metrô; - Suporte a múltiplas cidades (Configurações de região); - Ajustes na integração com o AdMob; Versão 2.0.4: - Ajustes na integração com o AdMob; - Exibição da camada de trânsito no mapa.

description: Boris Bot Shootem: The One Armed Bot! *one of my favourite platform games* *Robot armor mayhem fun with assault rifles at the ready!* *8 bit epic, battle classic style enemies* This is my homage to the classic 90s action platform games I always loved to play - in a similiar style to Apogee games like Commander Keen or Duke Nukem 2 (they may be ancient war games given that 3 years is a 'lifetime' in computers!) but I hope you will enjoy it. I have a number of exciting level updates on the way. An epic battle in 4 chapters, in that classic style. Robot armor mayhem fun with assault rifles at the ready! If you miss the classic 90s platform game then Boris Bot is for you - jump on it now, and join the epic battle in his escape and the assault on the enemy fortress. The enemy attack force is at the ready, so don't take too much time. Attack quickly and jump on it now to secure your victory and clear his name! Boris Bot Shootem is locked way for a 'crime he didn't commit' - it is up to you to help him take action, plan well, and bust out of a high security prison. Travel the desert wastes, left over from an ancient war, and stage an epic battle to clear his name. Be careful escaping the prison - the One Armed Bot's attack force is ready to jump on it the moment you get out of your block! After the few levels dodging prison guards, the assault by waves of his minons will start. So keep to that action plan and keep moving... And exact revenge on the one armed man - I mean one armed bot! He waits for you in his jungle fortress. With a bot this big, mere assault rifles cannot stop him so expect a battle of huge battle robots, armor, mayhem and puzzles. Run, shoot, and jump on it as you work your way through the assault in all the levels in this high single action, platform game. Enjoy high resolution graphics for tablet and phone size screens, with an awesome soundtrack to bring back the glory days of 8 bit classic computer gaming. From the days of ancient war, through the industrial age, we have created more effective ware machines. From the earliest tanks and assault rifles to the armor mayhem that can be produced in the current time, through to hulking battle robots of the future - an attack force ready for the assault. A force of which Boris Bot is a member... Enjoy classic 8 bit graphics and lots of action. Plan you way through the puzzles. Play levels again as you try to beat your star rating by finding hidden areas and playing time attack - how fast can you get the next check point? There are four challenging platform game levels to play broken up into ten levels per chapter. From the depths of your prison cell to the wide open wilderness battling evil bots and armor. Mayhem rains in this single action player game! Contains the classic level styles you expect in a good classic platformer - including the dastardly auto-scroller which gives you the urgency of a time attack to include in your level's action plan. And while this is a single player game, you don't have to play single. Action games are more fun with friends, and you can try to beat your friends and strangers on the shared leaderboard (Game Services or Game center depending on platform). Don't miss out on this epic battle game - jump on it now! It may be the best single action game you play this month ;-) Note: Duke Nukem and Commader Keen and Cosmo's Cosmic Adventure are trademarks of Apogee Games
release_text: We spent a lot of time on this release adding: - full GAMEPAD support - menus and gameplay! - Android TV support! so whip out your game android or xbox game controllers! Also addressed: - fixed a rare issue for some players on level 8 - it is now possible to remove ads - if playing on the TV using game-pads, you will have no ads, however access past level 8 will be restricted. If playing on a mobile device with touchscreen then you will have be able to aply the entire game, with ads.

description: After many players of Duty Driver games wrote us that they want special Bus edition, we developed Duty Driver Bus. In this game you are a bus driver and you will be able to drive 10 different missions: • Tour - drive bus in town • City line - point by point driving • Tourist - drive tourists to the mountains • Interstate - drive outside city • Football bus driver - drive football team to the game and avoid obstacles on the road • Parking - park my bus levels • School - drive children to school with school bus • Find a way - find a way on map to get to the finish point • Fog - drive in heavy fog conditions • Mirrors - drive backwards and park using side mirrors This game is available in 2 versions: • Lite (free, total download size 45 MB, 17 levels) • Full (paid, total download size 45 MB, 51 levels) Warning: • BEFORE YOU BUY FULL VERSION, PLEASE CHECK LITE VERSION (free) ON YOUR MOBILE PHONE. • IF DOWNLOAD OR INSTALL DOESN'T WORK RESTART YOUR PHONE AND TRY OVER WI-FI AND OVER MOBILE INTERNET • THIS GAME MIGHT NOT WORK ON LOW END DEVICES AS IT NEEDS A LOT OF RAM MEMORY • TO GET BEST RENDERING PERFORMANCE CLOSE OTHER ACTIVE APPLICATIONS ON YOUR MOBILE Advantages: • Beautiful city scenarios • Complete game size is only 45 MB - no extra download needed • Changing weather conditions • Simple but colorful and fast graphics rendering • No extra permissions needed for installation • Easy quit from game • 4 different buses • Big highway intersections • Different bus stations • Simulation mode (1st person, no damage, no time limit) • Freedom mode (select any bus, no objective, just drive) • Random mode will open you one of completed levels with random bus and random sky Features: • Unity 3D engine • NVIDIA® PhysX® physics engine • Support for both OpenGL 1.x and OpenGL 2.0 • Available for Android 2.0.1 Eclair (API level 6) or higher • Possibility to configure difficulty level: easy, medium, hard • Possibility to configure way to control your vehicle: by touch, by slider, by using wheel and by tilt screen • Possibility to reduce visibility range, to increase frame rate on low-end devices • Possibility to change camera during game (in car, follow car, rotate cam, dynamic and static) • Supports all screen sizes from e.g. Samsung Galaxy Mini (480x320) to Samsung Galaxy S3 or Huawei Tablets • During loading of levels check new games from our partner advertisement network Notes: • Use LITE version to check Duty Driver Bus LITE performance, before downloading full version! • You need better Android device to run this game. If you have low-end device and game works to slow, even after reducing visibility range and turning off fog and other effects, please don't rate this game with 1 star. Just get faster Android. • On some devices visibility range, model details and textures might be different, depending of device that you are using • In case of bad performance, reduce visibility range in OPTIONS/GRAPHICS to 150 meters and turn the fog OFF • If you will like this game, check occasionally Google Play for new versions of Duty Driver • Vehicle traffic use simple physics model in order to work fast on mobile devices • Loading of some levels might be longer because world is built element by element to reduce total game size to 45 MB • There is no animated walking people on bus stations at it could decrease rendering performance • Auto-detect mode will decrease visibility range if rendering speed drops below 20 frames per second (FPS) and increase above 30 FPS • Email us your experience with this game: ideas for new episodes of Duty Driver, what you don't like and what kind of missions did you like the best Enjoy the game!

description: limited-time sale ! "Clip it! pro" is coming soon and you can get this old-pro-version for lower price! Clip it! (formerly Clip it!forEver) gives you the smartest way to clip web pages to Evernote. You can clip all contents of web pages (text, links, images ) to Evernote as you like and view it locally! Not only that, you can edit the page and share the edited page through this app.(Evernote need to be installed) Other read later app , such as Instapaper and Pocket, can't do that. Using this app,You can make Evernote the best "read later" app! ☆Background Work This app works in the background.So you can save web pages when you don't have the time. ☆Flipboard is Supported This app works with Flipboard. You can get many informations from Flipboard and store them to Evernote using this app! ☆Share the original page and the page you edited. You can share the title and URL with many other apps. Not only that, you can edit the page and share the edited page through this app.(Evernote need to be installed) Other read later app , such as Instapaper and Poket, can't do that. this app make the most use of Evernote ! Using this app,You can make Evernote the best "read later" app! ※This app works with many standard browsers, but may not work with non-standard browsers.If you fail clipping,try other browser.Sending error message will help. ★ Feature Highlights: ◆ Works with Flipboard - You can clip from Flipboard. ◆ Edit contents - You can edit clipped page and shere it.(Evernote needs to be installed) ◆ Quick Access - You can access the notes you clipped　quickly with this app. ◆ Various clip mode - 　default, Only URL ◆ Automatic Clip - You can clip web page via share Sharing menu. ◆ Background - This app works in the background. ◆ Progressbar - You can see the progress of clipping. ◆ Stay signed in - You do not have to sign in to Evernote every time to clip. ◆ Notebook - You can select a notebook. ◆ Tags - You can add tags. ◆ Comments - You can add comments. ◆ History - You can access the page you clipped on this app. If you can see how to use, check the movie on this page. keywords : Evernote, Evernote web clipper, Flipboard, android web clipper,webclipper, Instapaper, Pocket
release_text: 1.1: activated a api key 1.2: bug fix 1.3: bug fix 1.4: bug fix 1.5: bug fix 2.0: - Added: Share - Added: Support Flipboard and more browsers - Added: Title Edit and URL Edit.

app_name: 장영실 과학만화 2권 교육 위인 학습 과학 유아
description: 꼬마 장영실 과학만화 ***** 언제까지 우리 아이가 게임만하고 있게 하실 건가요? ***** ***** 2012년 아이들의 과학상식 학습 종결자! 장영실이 등장했다 ***** ____________________________________________________________________________________ 아기자기한 캐릭터와 그림, 재밌는 과학 이야기를 통해 보고 즐기며 자기도 모르는 순간 과학을 알게 되는 신기한 과학만화 어플리케이션 ‘장영실과학만화’가 출시되었습니다. ★ 조선의 천재 발명가 ‘장영실’과 미래에서 온 로봇 ‘두와’로부터 배우는 재밌고 쉬운 과 학 만화 ★ 아이들에게 어려운 과학을 그림만화 영상과 KBS 성우들의 재미있는 음성으로 쉽고 재밌게 설명 ★ 게임과 TV에만 빠져있는 아이들에게 공부에 대한 흥미와 과학에 대한 상식을 넓혀 줄 수 있는 탁월한 App ★ 조선시대 천재 과학자 장영실과 그의 발명품에 대한 소개 ★ 장영실 과학만화는 충남테크노파크와 장영실의 고장 아산시의 지원과 자문으로 개발되었습니다. ★★★ 주요기능 ★★★ -만화보기: 성우들의 음성과 함께 애니메이션처럼 볼 수 있습니다. -어플소개: 어플소개, 장영실 소개, 장영실의 발명품 소개 ★★★ 출시작 소개 ★★★ -장영실 과학만화 1편:부력- 꼬마과학자 장영실과 미래에서 온 변신 로봇 ‘두와’와의 만남을 통해 자연스럽게 ‘부력’을 알아보자! -장영실 과학만화 2편: 관성- 장영실을 골탕먹이려는 동규, 뚱뚱이, 홀쭉이의 달걀 문제를 ‘관성’을 이용하여 해결하자! -장영실 과학만화 3편: 지렛대- 귀신이 나오는 동굴을 탈출하기 위해 ‘지렛대’를 배워보자! ★★★ 출시 이벤트 ★★★ 장영실 과학만화 1편(부력)을 무료로 다운받아 보실 수 있어요! 검색키워드 과학만화, 유아 동화, 창작 만화, 만화, 학습동화, 아동 만화, 육아, 영상만화, 교육애니, 아동 과학, 유아 과학, 만화놀이, 과학놀이, 상상력, 두뇌발달, 장영실, 로봇 만화, 두와, 어린이 앱, 부력, 관성, 지렛대, 과학 영상, 교육 영상, 집중력, 창의력, 아이 두뇌발달

description: Die heise online-App bietet einen schnellen und übersichtlichen Zugriff auf Nachrichten, Hintergrundberichte und Forendiskussionen von heise online. Die App präsentiert die Nachrichten aus dem Newsticker sowie aus den Themen-Websites in übersichtlicher Form und ermöglicht den Zugang zu den Foren. Auf Tablets stellt die App nicht einfach nur mehr Inhalt dar, sondern schaltet auf eine Darstellung um, die den größeren Bildschirm effizient nutzt. Dann sind Nachrichtenübersichten und einzelne Meldungen nebeneinander zu sehen und auch die Foren sind schneller zu überblicken als auf kleineren Geräten. Ein konfigurierbares Dashboard macht Ihre Lieblingsbereiche von heise online schnell erreichbar und zeigt das aktuelle Top-Thema. Alle weiteren Themen-Websites sind in einer Liste leicht zu erreichen. Darin enthalten sind die Magazin-Websites von c't, iX und Technology Review, und die Themenbereiche von heise Security, heise Foto und heise Open Source bis heise Autos. Seit Version 2.0 verfügt die App über eine Offline-Synchronisation. Damit ist es möglich, auch ohne Netzverbindung auf die Inhalte ihrer Lieblingsbereiche zuzugreifen. Wir freuen uns über Ihre Rückmeldungen zur neuen Version. Verbesserungsvorschlägen und Kritik können Sie direkt an ho-app-android@heise.de senden. Erweiterte Berechtigungen Die Offline-Synchronisation der App ist in das Android Konten- und Synchronisations-System eingebunden (zu finden unter Einstellungen > "Konten" bzw. "Konten und Synchronisation"). Für diese Funktionalität werden die erweiterten Berechtigungen "Ihre Konten" und "System Tools" benötigt. Wenn Sie sich in der App mit ihrem heise online Account anmelden, werden die Login-Daten im Konto-Eintrag gespeichert und können nicht nur in der App, sondern auch in der Kontenverwaltung gelöscht werden. Sie können der Übertragung von Nutzungsdaten und Fehlerberichten in der App widersprechen. Weiter Informationen dazu finden Sie in der Datenschutzerklärung des Heise Zeitschriften Verlags: http://heise.de/-4860 heise online ist eine offizielle Android-Applikation des Heise Zeitschriften Verlags. The Skinflint app offers a quick and clear access to news, background reports and forum discussions from heise online. The app presents the news from the news ticker as well as the topics of websites in a clear format and provides access to the forums. On tablets, the app does not just represent more content, but switches to a representation that uses the larger screen efficiently. Then, news summaries and individual messages side by side to see and also the forums are faster now than on smaller devices. A configurable dashboard makes your favorite areas of heise online quickly accessible and shows the current hot topic. All other themed sites are easy to reach in a list. This includes the sites of c't magazine, iX, Technology Review, and the themes of H Security, The H Open Source Photo and H to H cars. Since version 2.0, the app has an offline synchronization. Thus it is possible, even without a network connection to access the content of their favorite areas. We welcome your feedback on the new version. Improvement suggestions and criticisms can be sent directly to ho-app-android@heise.de . Advanced Permissions The offline synchronization of the app is accounts and synchronization system involved (found under> "Accounts" and "Accounts and sync" settings) in Android. For this functionality, the advanced permissions "Your Account" and "System Tools" are required. When you log in to the app with their Skinflint account, the login information in the account entry will be saved and can not be deleted only in the app, but also in the management accounts. You can object to the transfer of usage data and crash reports in the app. For more information, please refer to the privacy policy of the Heise publishing: http://heise.de/-4860 H is an official Android application of the Heise publishing house.
release_text: Version 2.3.2 Die App verwendet jetzt die neue Android Werbe-ID (Advertising ID) für die Reichweitenmessung (IVW/AGOF) und Werbung. Hinweise zur Werbe-ID: Die Android Werbe-ID kann in den Google-Einstellungen unter "Anzeigen" eingesehen und zurückgesetzt werden. Die Einstellungen gelten für alle Apps, die die Google Play Services verwenden.

description: Robo Defense is the ultimate portable tower defense experience. Featuring open maps, upgrades, achievements and nice graphics. The full version features 5 maps with unlimited upgrades and difficulty levels. A free version is also available (try it first!). Free version progress is automatically imported into the full version, should you choose to upgrade. HTC Desire, San Francisco: Turning off "High Quality Graphics" fixes known issues. Galaxy S: Turn on "16-bit Backgrounds" to fix studdering performance issues. Atrix: Disable sound to improve stability Performance tips: If the game is running sluggishly, try playing fully "zoomed in". Turning off "High Quality Graphics Mode", in the options menu, will also help on some phone models. http://lupislabs.blogspot.com
release_text: 2.4.1: Bug Fixes: - Addressed graphic scaling issues on Motorola Razr and other devices. - Fixed Achievement popup rendering. - Increased the maximum vertical scrolling limit to make the placement of towers near the buttons easier.

description: Put everything you need to know about your vacation in the palm of your hand. Download the all-new, Official Universal Orlando® Resort App. It’s free! It’s the easy way to: · Check ride, show and attraction wait times at home, on the go or in the parks. · Explore the parks using detailed maps and photo navigation with the “Guide Me” feature. · Customize your park experience using filtered lists and the map to plan your day. · Create your own favorites list. · Share your Universal Orlando® Resort experience on Facebook and Twitter. · Stay up-to-date with in-park notifications and news about upcoming special events. · Set ride wait time and show time alerts to make the most of your time in the parks. · Guests with visual disabilities can access Voiceover support to better utilize the app and enhance their in-park experience. NOTE: – Guide Me photo navigation features are only available when visiting Universal Orlando® Resort.
release_text: • View dining menus at participating restaurants. • Get excited for special events and view detailed information in the new Events page. • Just in time for summer: discover the rides, dining, and shopping that Wet ’n Wild has to offer! • See exclusive special offers available to American Express cardholders.

description: Finding the perfect condo or apartment has never been easier! Condo.com’s free mobile app gives you instant access to all available condos for sale and apartments for rent around you! You can pull up condo and apartment listings based on your current location or by entering criteria such as by address, city or zip code. Get all your questions answered about specific properties too. Details such as price, square footage, estimated mortgage, taxes, features, descriptions, pictures and maps are given with every property listing shown. Save your favorite condos or apartments to view again later. Share your real estate findings with family and friends via email, text, Facebook and / or Twitter. The Condo.com app brings the most up-to-date and accurate real estate information directly to your phone! Now you can access the largest selection of condos for sale and rent - anytime, anywhere. Have more questions on a specific property? No problem. You can easily connect with a real estate agent by pressing the “Contact” feature. Use of the Condo.com mobile app is subject to Condo.com’s Terms of Use: http://www.condo.com/SiteTermsConditions.aspx
release_text: • Enhanced Open House search and display • Recent Searches available from single-line entry on home screen • Map Draw and other Map View enhancements • Updated List View • General bug fixes

description: It’s time to channel your inner-MOGUL and conquer Capital City! Invite up to five friends, choose from one of 11 over-the-top vehicles, hone your strategy, and get ready to make some fast deals! Everything – every coffee shop and car wash, every fourplex and fixer-upper – has the potential to be a great opportunity! But just like in real life, not every deal is a good one. The key is to acquire the RIGHT houses, apartments and businesses before your opponents do. Your ability to implement your strategy with quick, decisive action and to finance deals will mark the difference between BANKRUPTCY and TYCOON STATUS! Capital City: The Finance & Strategy game is officially licensed from Robert Kiyosaki’s The Rich Dad Company and its core gameplay is based on the lessons from his original tabletop game CASHFLOW.
release_text: Bug fixes and other improvements.

description: For 2-5 year old kids Are you looking for something fun, cool, addicting game but entertaining and educational for your kids? Let’s make fun more educational! Bugs Jigsaw Puzzles is a great app for your kids. It keeps your kids entertained and educated at the same time. A jigsaw puzzles made for kids. This app brings preschool puzzles to your smartphone and tablet devices. The insects jigsaw puzzles app goes beyond simply great insects, bugs graphics and sound effects of crickets or bees and many more insects and bugs. The difficulty would increase more and more as they play along. These insects puzzles are intuitive but challenging, with kids preschool puzzles that are fun and easy for small hands to move into positions. Choose from our different bugs and insects puzzle pictures and listen to its sound effects. These bugs and insects puzzle pictures are child oriented kids puzzles and you can let the kid drag and drop each puzzle piece with or without your help. If the child can’t find the right place for a puzzle piece, a hint button is found at the bottom helps the kid solve these tricky puzzles. Features: 1. 16 Free Unique Bugs and Insects Puzzles and 8 more puzzles thru in-app purchase (butterflies, dragonfly, cricket, ladybugs and more bugs puzzles) 2. Stuck on a puzzle? Use the in-game hint button. 3. Bugs Jigsaw is enabled with Family Play learning technology to help your child learn faster. For the parents, do join our community and tell us what you think or your comments and feedback. We truly appreciate anything you can give us. Like our Facebook Page, http://www.facebook.com/FamilyPlayApps , and get the latest updates, contests and some freebies. You can also follow us on Twitter, @FamilyPlayApps, to get the latest news and new apps from Family Play. No Sound? If the sound is not working, make sure the mute is turned off, then turn up the volume and the sound will work. Need Help? Contact us with any questions or comments: support@familyplay.co We Value Your Feedback We always welcome your feedback, comments and suggestions. You can contact us at support@familyplay.co If you do like our app, please take a minute to rate and write a great review.

description: Geopaparazzi is a tool developed to do fast qualitative technical and scientific surveys. Its strength is its direct connection to the BeeGIS GIS, that can be used to further process the collected data. Even if the main aim is in the field of surveying, it contains tools that can be of great use also to tourists that want to keep a geo-diary. Visit the official homepage: http://www.geopaparazzi.eu for documentation. Visit the blog to find use cases and other info: http://jgrasstechtips.blogspot.it/search/label/geopaparazzi Use the mailing list for any issue and if you need help: http://groups.google.com/group/geopaparazzi-users
release_text: Quick bugfix release to solve secret view crash. More on Geopaparazzi here: http://jgrasstechtips.blogspot.it/search/label/geopaparazzi https://github.com/geopaparazzi/geopaparazzi/releases Compatibility with older versions: http://jgrasstechtips.blogspot.it/2014/09/geopaparazzi-3-retirement.html

description: CPA Congress brings together over 10,000 finance, accounting and business professionals in a global conversation that will help convert innovative ideas into practical action plans. CPA Congress is delivered globally in 13 locations including Melbourne, Sydney, Canberra, Brisbane, Hobart, Adelaide, Darwin, Perth, Auckland, Singapore, Malaysia, Hong Kong and London. Our CPA Congress app will provide all the information you’ll need while attending this year. Use our app to: • View the program information • Explore session content • Access speaker information • View the venue map • Connect with exhibitors and sponsors • Keep up to date with live news • Provide survey feedback and participate in live polls
release_text: Minor improvements

description: Amber is a beautifully designed and fully featured RSS client. Sync your feeds once and read even when offline. Thoughtfully designed to deliver the best reading experience. Widgets let you get the latest news right on your homescreen. And it's optimized for tablet reading. Supports Feedly, Feedbin, Bazqux, FeedHQ, and now InoReader and The Old Reader. The press says "What sets Amber apart from the pack is beauty and functionality." -Rootzwiki "One of the most beautiful new apps of 2014." -TheDroidEffect Features tablet-optimized UI fullscreen reading mode light + dark themes mark as read on scroll three fully customizable widgets zero ads offline reading and image caching flawlessly smooth scrolling font options, sizes, and settings expandable news notifications in the status bar (4.2+) save and share articles with one tap search for new feeds Muzei support in-app image galleries article navigation while reading swipe to mark articles as read readability integration Report a bug or tell us how much you love us. Reach out at reindeercrafts@gmail.com or on Twitter @reindeercrafts.
release_text: Update v2.2.5: - Tweaked text selection method, now you have to long press the text content to first enable the text selection mode, and then do text selection. - Improved image loading in article view. - Added confirm mark as read option. - Improved internal browser. - Improved stability of add subscription. - Removed YouTube embedded player (due to the recent update of YouTube app, the YouTube embedded player is modified and not providing many features). - Other bug fixes.

description: Talking to strangers has never been easier. Chat with a person picked randomly from thousands of users on Omegle.com web site. Conversations are totally anonymous. Simple, fast and clean interface, for the best mobile Omegle experience! This is the lite version, ad-supported. No limitation. New: - Random chat with common interests - Spy mode - Captcha reduction system Features: - Random chat in standard mode - Random chat with common interests - Spy mode - Real Omegle look (and night and day themes) - Share conversation online with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, email... and save to your SD card. - Browse web links sent by strangers without leaving the app - Rotate your screen, it's fun! - Fill Omegle captcha directly in application - Stay connected while app is in the background - Analyze network problems with the embedded Connectivity Wizard. If you wish to report a bug, please use about menu in the app. Feedback is welcome. Requires permission to write to SD card in order to save conversations, when you wish to do so. For those with device memory problems: if there is not enough memory left, please shutdown other apps or reboot your phone. If you have connectivity problems, please try via WiFi. Thank you. App does not support video chat at the moment.
release_text: Enhanced connectivity. Fixed server overloaded issue. Reduced time to find a stranger to chat with. Improvements in captchas reduction system. Added smart servers manager. More colorful interface. Fix a few bugs reported in Spy mode (on Android 4.0.4) Thank you all for the reports.

All for free ! ☆ Online multiplayer mode ☆ Various original missions : - Bounty hunting - Treasure quests - Asteroid mining - Transport ship escort - Rescue missions - Trade with space stations to make your fortune - Become a gladiator of the galactic arena - Destroy and loot pirates - Buy new powerful spaceships And many more adventures to unlock! ☆ About Space Corsair : Inspired from pc games like the "X3" saga or "spaces pirates and zombies", this space opera contains many of their features plus much more leading its players to acclaim it as a wonderful and addictive game. ☆ All the game's levels and missions are playable for free.

description: Samsung TecTile is an app which lets you read & write TecTile NFC Programmable Tags. You can create TecTiles to change settings on your phone, launch applications, check-in to places, update social status, or even make phone calls or send text messages automatically. Once you create a TecTile using the TecTile app, place the TecTile in a convenient place, then tap your phone to the TecTile to perform the action stored in the TecTile. You will need Samsung TecTile NFC Programmable Tags to use with this app. You can buy tags in your mobile phone store, or from http://www.samsung.com/us/tectile The official Samsung TecTile website and store. If the TecTile application download fails to initiate, please exit, re-tap the Samsung TecTile and select Google Play as the download option or download directly from the Google Play store. Settings & Apps: Change Phone Settings Make a tag to set your phone up the way you like it when you get to work, or when you get in your car. Switch Phone Profiles Switch between pre-defined or custom profiles. Create a “meeting” TecTile and put it on the conference room table that will have mute one person's phone while letting another person set their phone to vibrate. Launch an App Make a tag to launch any app you have on your phone. You can even set music volume for music players or internet radio applications. Toggle Music Playback Make a tag to toggle between playing music or pausing music. Join a WiFi Network Make a tag that will connect a phone to your WiFi network. Great for visitors to scan when they arrive! Show a Message Make a tag that shows a message to whoever scans it. Play a Track Choose your favorite song and make a tag to play that tune at the tap of a TecTile! Phone & Text: Make a Call Make a tag that'll bring up the phone ready to make a call to the number you choose. This is the 'Call Mom' tag. Send a Text Message Make a tag that'll send an SMS to the number you choose. This is the 'Honey, I'm Home' tag. Send an Email Message Make a tag that’ll send an email to the contact you choose. Share a Contact Make a tag that shares a contact's details. Great as a way to exchange business cards. Start a Google Talk Conversation Make a tag which will start a Google Talk conversation with the Google Talk user that you choose. Forward Calls Make a tag which will forward all of your calls to another phone number. Location & Web: Show an Address or Location Make a tag that'll bring up a map of an address or location. Foursquare Check In Make a tag that checks the reader into the Foursquare venue that you choose. Put this tag on your reception desk or next to your register. Facebook Places Check In Make a tag that checks the reader into the Facebook Place that you choose. Put this tag on your reception desk or next to your register. Show a Google Place Make a tag that shows a Google Place. Find all of the information you want about your favorite store or restaurant – all with a simple tap. Send a Glympse Make a tag that shares your current location for a set duration of time. Great for letting your friends know exactly how close you are to the party. Open a Web Page Make a tag that shows a web page. Save a Bookmark Make a tag that adds a link to a website in the user’s browser. For business owners, this is a great way to promote your website or link to a weekly specials. Social: Update Facebook Status Make a tag that updates the Facebook status of the reader. Facebook Like Make a tag so the reader can Like the link you supply. Tweet a Status Make a tag which will tweet the message you choose. Follow a Twitter User Make a tag which will let the reader follow the Twitter user you choose. Update Google+ Status Make a tag that updates the Google+ status of the reader. description: USMC Summer Survival Manual Created using iAppThat.com UNITED STATES MARINE CORPS Mountain Warfare Training Center Bridgeport, CA. 93517-5001 SUMMER 2002 SURVIVAL COURSE HANDBOOK TABLE OF CONTENTS CHAP. CONTENTS 1. REQUIREMENTS FOR SURVIVAL 2. SURVIVAL KIT 3. WATER PROCUREMENT 4. EXPEDIENT SHELTERS & FIRES 5. CORE VALUES & MOUNTAIN LEADERSHIP CHALLENGES 6. SIGNALING & RECOVERY 7. SURVIVAL NAVIGATION 8. SURVIVAL TRAPS & SNARES 9. SURVIVAL USES OF GAME 10. EXPEDIENT TOOLS, WEAPONS AND EQUIPMENT 11. FORAGING FOR PLANTS & INSECTS FOR SURVIVAL USES 12. SURVIVAL FISHING 13. TRACKING 14. SURVIVAL MEDICINE 15. MOUNTAIN WEATHER 16. INTRO TO EVASION APPENDIXES A EVASION PLAN OF ACTION (EPA) B PME VIDEO “THE EDGE” C SURVIVAL QUICK REFERENCE CHECK LIST D ANIMAL HABITS E TACTICAL CONSIDERATIONS F GRADING STANDARDS POSITIVE LEADERSHIP AND THE RIGHT ATTITUDE. Leadership must be by example. At first, harsh and unfamiliar conditions tend to be frightening. Marines will find themselves up against many challenges they have never met before and the environment will constantly remind them that they can become a casualty if they make mistakes. Aggressive leadership, which consistently meets and overcomes the challenges of the environment, is essential to mission accomplishment. There will be two enemies to contend with: the enemy soldier and the environment itself. The first step towards defeating these enemies is getting your Marines in the right mental attitude. The leader must maintain a positive attitude towards the mission, his Marines, and the equipment they have to carry out the job. You can be defeated psychologically, if you are not aware of the symptoms of a poorly motivated unit. a. Core Values applied in a survival situation. Core value are very applicable to leadership in a surviv al situation. In the absence of constant adherence to our core values, subordinate Marines may suffer the consequences of injury and in extreme cases, DEATH. b. Honor. Honor is integrity, responsibility, and accountability. Without honor in this type of environment, decisions are made with inaccurate and/or misleading information. Dishonorable actions or intentions ultimately lead to unethical behavior...trust between Marines will erode, dependability will become unimportant, and the resulting consequences to energy conservation will greatly affect a unit’s cohesion and ability to accomplish its mission. c. Courage. Courage is doing the right thing for the right reason. Courage in this type of environment for small unit leaders to take charge of their unit. The added stress and pressure induced in mountainous terrain makes the tough decisions even tougher to make: courageous leaders take that extra step. Trust and confidence in leadership is built upon thorough training to ensure their men are capable of overcoming the fear and uncertainty of enemy and the harsh environment.
