description: Matchingo is a new twist on the classic memory matching card game you played as a kid. Match any two cards for a simple match, or make multiple matches in a row to earn combo multipliers. Collect gold coins and unlock dozens of ways to customize the game to make it all your own. Matchingo is perfect for everyone from 2 years old, to 102 years old. Best of all it is totally free - get it now! What is a memory matching game? A memory matching game starts with 8 or 16 tiles or cards face-down. From there you flip over any 2 cards at a time trying to make a match. In Matchingo, if you can remember where multiple matches are on the board, you can make those matches one after another to create combo multipliers so that you earn even more coins per match! What is customizable? Matchingo has a number of backgrounds, card backs, and card image sets to unlock. There are thousands of different combinations you can make to fit your own personality. Featured content ranges from images of golf and football to holiday themed wallpapers. Have other content you would like to see? Email us!

description: The school summer holiday is over! Yeah kids school is starting again, the summer holidays are over so time again to get into that famous yellow schoolbus. And if you get bored and the journey takes to long and you have a feeling you can do a better job then the bus driver. Then download City Schoolbus Driver 3D the newest schoolbus driving 3D simulator VascoGames. Love schoolbus pick up driving games This is newest bus driving simulator will put you in the seat of these big vehicles. You don’t need any special driving license to drive this big Schoolbus around in this beautiful designed big city. The goal in this game is of course to get the students from their home in time at the school. So if you love schoolbus pick up driving games you should definitely try this game. Picking them up and bring them to school sounds easy right, well think again you need to hurry and get the kids in time at the school but you need to watch the traffic. Take care you don’t smash your schoolbus during driving into any other vehicles on the road. Keep your Schoolbus under control! Driving these big busses is not so easy as you may think. You need to perform some maneuvers to not hit anything or anyone on the road. You need to use your on screen controls to stay clear of the dangers that you may encounter on your pickup driving missions. In this game you are the school driver and its up to you to get the students of this great 3D city save into school. So get ready for a super sweet gig driver, all you need to do is pick up kids, and stay cool when the traffic starts jamming. City Schoolbus Driver 3D is a Schoolbus driving 3D simulator game for everyone that would like to keep those driving skills up to date, you need to practice everything from parking, reversing and use your mental skills to keep calm. City Schoolbus Driver 3D - Game Features - Realistic schoolbus driving 3D simulator physics - Traffic on the streets you need to watch - Interior Camera, for the hard parking missions - Lots of different parking and 3D driving situations, learn the ropes of being a real bus driver - Experience the smooth gameplay of this free driving simulator - Exciting 3D graphics drive around in a huge city We hope you will enjoy this Schoolbus driving 3D simulator a new parking and free driving game and drive safely. Please give use some support by rating our game or by liking our Facebook page or you can follow us on twitter! Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/VascoGames Twitter - https://twitter.com/VascoGames

description: Du bist in der Natur unterwegs und entdeckst Spuren von Tieren? Du möchtest die Spuren lesen und erfahren wer diese hinterlassen hat? Mit "Wilde Tiere und Spuren 2 PRO" lernt man Spuren und Fährten zu erkennen und bekommt ein ideales Bestimmungs- und Nachschlagewerk für die geläufigsten Säugetiere im mitteleuropäischen Raum und den Alpen. Endlich hat man die Möglichkeit, die Spuren direkt auf dem Ausflug auch ohne Buch zu bestimmen und gleichzeitig umfassende Informationen aus einer Bibliothek voller Daten, Fakten und Bildern zu erhalten. Lerne die Spuren zu lesen, erfahre alles Wissenswerte über die Tierarten, erlebe die Natur auf eine ganz neue Weise. INHALT * 74 Arten - 800 Bilder * Umfangreiche Beschreibung der Spuren und Arten * Artennamen in Deutsch und Englisch * Wissenschaftliche Spuren- und Artenbestimmung * Quiz - Spiel SPUREN UND FÄHRTEN LESEN ANHAND VOM * FUSSTYP - Paarhufer, Unpaarhufer, Zehenballen, etc. * FUSSABDRUCK - Zehen-, Zehenspitz-, Sohlengänger, etc. * LOSUNG - Krümelig, pillenförmig, wurstförmig, etc. * NEST UND BAU - Erdbau, Burg aus Zweigen, Baumhöhle, etc. * STIMME - Piepsen, Zwitschern, Trillern, Quieken, etc. * AM BAUMSTAMM DURCH - Geweih, Zähne, Krallen, Körper, etc. BESTIMMUNG VON ARTEN ANHAND VOM * AUSSEHEN - Größe, Geweih und Hörner, etc. * LEBENSGEBIET - Lebensraum, Verbreitung, Standort Nest, etc. QUIZ - TRAINIERE DEIN WISSEN * Errate Bilder einer Art * Lerne die verschiedenen Spuren und Tiere kennen NATURE MOBILE auf YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/naturemobile ÜBER NATURE MOBILE NATURE MOBILE hat sich zur Aufgabe gemacht spannende Themen aus der Natur und anderen Bereichen einem breiten Publikum aus Interessierten, Liebhabern und Experten auf anschauliche und attraktive Art näher zu bringen. Sie sind Autor oder Fotograf, sie haben interessante Ideen oder Inhalte, dann sprechen Sie uns bitte an support@naturemobile.org . TESTEN SIE MEHR APPS VON NATURE MOBILE. You are in the nature of the road and discover traces of animals? You want to read the tracks and find out who left this? With "Wild animals and tracks 2 PRO" you learn to recognize tracks and tracks and get an ideal destination and reference guide for the most common mammals in central Europe and the Alps. Finally, one has the possibility to determine the traces directly on the excursion without book and at the same time to obtain comprehensive information from a library full of facts, figures and images. Learn to read the tracks, learn all about the animals, the nature experience to a whole new way.   CONTENTS * 74 species - 800 images * Extensive description of the tracks and types * Species names in German and English * Researchers trace and species identification * Quiz - Game Prints and droppings READ THE BASIS OF * FOOT TYPE - Artiodactyla, Perissodactyla, toe pads, etc. * FOOTPRINT - Toe, toes pointed, plantigrade, etc. * SOLUTION - Crumbly, pill-shaped, sausage-shaped, etc. * NEST AND CONSTRUCTION - Earthwork, castle made of branches, tree hole, etc. * VOICE - Beeping, chirping, trills, squeaks, etc. * AM TRUNK BY - Antlers, teeth, claws, body, etc. DETERMINATION OF SPECIES BY * APPEARANCE - Size, antlers and horns, etc. * LIVING AREA - Habitat, distribution, location, nest, etc. QUIZ - TRAIN YOUR KNOWLEDGE * Guess images of a kind * Learn the different tracks and Animals NATURE MOBILE on YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/naturemobile ABOUT NATURE MOBILE NATURE MOBILE is to bring themselves to present exciting topics from nature and other areas to a wide audience of interested people, enthusiasts and experts in a clear and attractive way closer. You are an author or photographer, you have fascinating ideas or content, then please contact us at support@naturemobile.org . CHECK OUT MORE APPS BY NATURE MOBILE.
release_text: WICHTIGES UPDATE ---------------- * Android 5.0 Support. * ONLINE-ARTENBERATUNG - Hobby-Biologen aus aller Welt helfen Dir bestimmen, welche Art es ist. * SICHTUNGEN-FUNKTION - Zu jeder Sichtung kannst Du umfangreiche Informationen hinterlegen. Zum Beispiel: Foto, Zeit, GPS Position und Standort. * TRAININGSMODUS bei dem Du die Quiz-Fragen nach verschiedenen Merkmalen zusammenstellen kannst. * Android 4.4 - Die Daten können auf eine EXTERNE SPEICHERKARTE (SD-KARTE) manuell verschoben werden.

description: A Halloween "Steampunkin" Live Wallpaper - that is, a "Steampunk Pumpkin" (say that 5x fast!)! Featuring interactive flames, scrolling mist, rotating mechanical gears and one crazy Jack-o-Lantern. The flames grow, and the gears react as you touch the screen, while layers of atmospheric mist float by. This version has one background theme, and is fully functional. A CPU/Battery saving setting is included. Also works well on Tablet devices, implemented with OpenGL for efficiency. Check out the FULL version for more options: - 4 background themes - Pumpkin Patch, Graveyard, Bricks, Full Moon (featuring witch sightings!) - 2 gear types - Interactive flames, with configuration options - Control the gear and scroller speeds and direction among many other customization options - Optional Gestures: double tap to cycle backgrounds - Works great with the other steampunk launcher themes in the market For fans of the halloween spirit, steampunk, the victorian era, clockwork, and our other steampunk, biomechanical, technology and horror themed wallpapers. None of our wallpapers require any permissions. A collaboration featuring the artwork of artist Cat Spencer. Please contact us with feedback or if you encounter any issues.

description: Pink for Facebook Messenger is a Pink styled chat application which lets you chat with your friends on the Facebook community. This theme was created to give users a different feel and look to the standard chat application. Pink was created to help bring awareness to breast cancer month. * PLEASE rate & comment on the app when you have a free moment. * Follow us on Twitter to know about the newest releases & more! Follow us @mjrandroid. Pink Messenger Features: • Send messages instantly to other friends who have Pink Messenger. • Chat with friends who are on the Facebook community. • Push notifications for incoming messages. • Adds location and photos to messages. • Reach friends via text message if they don't have Pink Messenger. • Access messages on both Pink Messenger and Facebook. • Create group conversations. • Add additional friends to a group conversations at any time. • Control alerts and location settings for individual conversations. .... And much more! * Check out more of our apps .... Search the market for "MJRAndroid" *Please Read* ------------- * If you are having a issue with the app then please EMAIL me with any problems before giving a negative feedback without a chance of fixing the problem for you. If you have any questions please email me, the problems are usually not app related and can be fixed with a simple email, I will get back to you as soon as possible. * If you are having problems downloading from the market or your pictures are not showing up in the application then try connecting with a WiFi connection and trying again. * This is a one time purchase and you will not be charged anything monthly. * Pink Messenger and MJRAndroid are in no way affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by Facebook. Facebook is a registered trademark of Facebook Inc. * This is a theme and is intended as such.

description: Intended for airplane pilot and long haul flight attendant, which calculates rest periods. - 3 patterns available: 1,2 or 3 breaks for flight attendants. - advanced patterns for pilots : 1,..,4 breaks which possibily have different relative length. - 2 algorithms. description: ***** NOUVELLE VERSION 4.6.0 ***** Télé-Loisirs s’enrichit de nouvelles fonctionnalités ! - La Watchlist : ajoutez vos stars, vos sports et séries préférés. Vous serez notifié lorsqu’un programme sera diffusé à la TV ! - Widgets : En plus du programme en prime time, Télé-Loisirs vous propose maintenant la pile des programmes ainsi que la liste des news télé. 1) PROGRAMME TV ET PERSONNALISATION => Dès la page d’accueil, accédez à tous les programmes de la semaine. Cliquez sur “Aujourd’hui” dans la barre en haut de l'écran puis choisissez le jour que vous souhaitez consulter. => Télé-Loisirs vous propose de filtrer l’information programme en fonction de votre bouquet (TNT, Free, Orange, SFR, Bbox, Canal+…) ou de vos chaînes (TF1, France 2, M6, Canal+…) dans la section « Ma grille hebdo ». Vous pouvez ajouter ou retirer librement chaque chaine de votre sélection. => Télé-Loisirs vous permet de filtrer les programmes par thématique : "Cinéma", "Séries TV", "Jeunesse", "Sport"... => Visionnez les bandes-annonces des programmes depuis les fiches programmes en cliquant sur l'image (une icône "Play" vous indique quand la bande-annonce est disponible). => Installez sur votre bureau Android widget Télé-Loisirs qui vous donnera un accès direct au programme de la soirée ! 2) WATCHLIST Ajoutez toutes vos stars, vos sports et vos séries préférés ! Vous les retrouverez dans votre Watchlist et vous ne raterez plus aucun de leur passage TV ! 3) LA SÉLECTION DE LA RÉDACTION Vous ne savez toujours pas quoi regarder ce soir ? La rédaction de Télé-Loisirs vous a concocté une sélection de ses programmes préférés (cliquez sur “Notre Sélection” dans le menu de l’application). Lorsque vous avez personnalisé vos chaînes, Télé-Loisirs ne vous propose que des programmes diffusés sur ces chaînes. 4) ENREGISTREMENT A DISTANCE L'application Télé-Loisirs vous propose une fonctionnalité innovante : l'enregistrement à distance sur votre Freebox ! Programmez l'enregistrement depuis votre application et ne ratez plus vos programmes préférés ! ATTENTION : Les opérateurs autres que Free n'ont pas souhaité ou ne sont pas en mesure de proposer cette fonctionnalité à l'intérieur de l'application. Découvrez l'enregistrement intelligent et programmez en un clic l'enregistrement de toute une saison de votre série favorite, de l'ensemble des films avec votre acteur fétiche ou encore des programmes similaires à votre choix. 5) MOTEUR DE RECHERCHE Retrouvez facilement votre programme ou une news par titre d’émission, nom d’acteur ou encore type de programme grâce au moteur de recherche de Télé-Loisirs ! 6) ALERTES PROGRAMME Ne ratez plus aucun programme avec les alertes de Télé-Loisirs : - Alertes 10 minutes avant la diffusion de votre programme - Alertes mail des prochaines diffusions de vos programmes sélectionnés. 7) NEWS Retrouvez les dernières actualités TV et cinéma grâce aux news de Télé-Loisirs ! 8) TÉLÉCOMMANDE FREE & ORANGE Changez de chaîne directement depuis l'application (pour les abonnés Free et Orange uniquement). Merci de noter que cette fonctionnalité est compatible avec les derniers décodeurs ADSL Orange (nouvelle interface blanche Orange) : Vous devez être équipé d’un décodeur Livebox Play TV ou de la nouvelle TV d’Orange. Pour les livebox compatibles : - Livebox Play - Livebox 2*. (* non compatible avec configuration multi-décodeurs) Attention : la télécommande n’est pas compatible avec la TV d’Orange par satellite Pour voir pourquoi nous vous demandons les permissions : http://apirecatch.programme-tv.net/docs/permissions.html ***** ***** NEW VERSION 4.6.0 Entertainment TV adds new features! - The Watchlist: add your stars, your favorite sports and series. You will be notified when a program will be broadcast on TV! - Widgets: In addition to the program in prime time, Télé-Loisirs now offers the program stack as well as the list of TV news. 1) TV PROGRAM AND CUSTOMIZATION => From the home page, go to all programs of the week. Click on "Today" in the top of the screen bar and select the day you want to view. => Télé-Loisirs offers to filter information program according to your bouquet (TNT, Free, Orange, SFR, Bbox, Canal + ...) and your channels (TF1, France 2, M6, Canal + ...) in the section "My weekly grid." You can add or remove freely each track selection. => Télé-Loisirs allows you to filter by thematic programs: "Movie", "TV Shows", "Youth", "Sport" ... => Watch trailers of programs since the plugs programs by clicking on the image (icon "Play" tells you when the trailer is available). => Install Android on your TV-Entertainment widget desktop that will give you direct access to the program for the evening! 2) WATCHLIST Add all your stars, your sports and your favorite series! You will find them in your Watchlist and you never miss their TV way! 3) SELECTION EDITOR You still do not know what to watch tonight? Writing Tele-Health has put together a selection of his favorite programs (click on "Our Selection" in the application menu). When you have customized your channels, Télé-Loisirs offers only programs broadcast on these channels. 4) RECORD REMOTE The Tele-Health application offers you an innovative feature: remote recording on your Freebox! Set the timer recording from your application and never miss your favorite programs! ATTENTION: The operators other than Free does not wish or are not able to provide this functionality within the application. Discover the intelligent recording and schedule one-click recording of an entire season of your favorite series of all movies with your favorite actor or similar programs you want. 5) SEARCH ENGINE Easily find your program or news by program title, actor name or type of program through the search engine Télé-Loisirs! 6) PROGRAM ALERTS Do not miss any program with Télé-Loisirs alerts: - Alerts 10 minutes before the broadcast of your program - Mail alerts coming broadcasts your selected programs. 7) NEWS Find the latest news through TV and movie news Télé-Loisirs! 8) FREE REMOTE & ORANGE Change channels directly from the application (for Free and Orange subscribers only). Thank you to note that this feature is compatible with the latest ADSL decoders Orange (new clean interface Orange): You must be equipped with a Livebox Play TV decoder or the new Orange TV. For compatible Livebox: - Livebox Play - Livebox 2 *. (* Not compatible with multi-decoder configuration) Warning: the remote control is not compatible with satellite TV Orange To see why we ask permissions:   http://apirecatch.programme-tv.net/docs/permissions.html
release_text: Cette nouvelle version s’enrichit de nouvelles fonctionnalités ! - La Watchlist : ajoutez vos stars, vos sports et séries préférés. Vous les retrouverez dans votre Watchlist et vous ne raterez plus aucun de leur passage TV ! - Widgets : En plus du programme en prime time, Télé-Loisirs vous propose maintenant la pile des programmes ainsi que la liste des news télé.

description: Prepare yourself for battle! You are about to enter a thrilling but dangerous cube world where high energy meets high intensity in the form of ultimate enemies that test your skill and reflexes every pulse pounding second and every blocky turn is ripe with danger. It's time to meet this next chapter first person shooter game head on and face aggressive mobs on enemy territory while navigating visually stunning worlds, all while collecting whatever pickups you can manage to find to defend yourself. Survival is key in this block hit first person shooter 3D adventure game. **** PLEASE NOTE THE LEVEL SIZE ***** In order to bring you the most epically awesome immersive game play ever, we created levels that are HUGE! Because of this, load time can often take awhile… Rate kindly! Please don't penalize us with a one-star review, after all, this is a FREE game and we just wanted to ensure this game was fully loaded with as much action packed fun as we could fit into it. **** ENTER THIS DYSTOPIAN WORLD... IF YOU DARE **** Enter a beautiful but deadly survival arena where it's your sole job to stay alive... Chosen by fate, you are now the target of a deadly set of games where you face death with each twist and turn. Ah, but victory is sweet. If you survive each of the three dangerous arenas, you will be crowned the reigning victor. But be careful! The judges of the cruel game are betting against you and the stakes for survival are high. **** FAST PACED GAME PLAY **** Powerful enemies descend upon you in waves of intensity and it's all up to you to dominate the battle field. It's a battle to the death as you collect a variety of weapons in which to defend yourself with while also collecting health and ammo pickups that will aid you in survival. Put your FPS skills to the test and run through the worlds in head-to-head combat. Navigate your way with smooth, intuitive controls and stunning pixel graphics. Fans of free classic block building games such as Minecraft and Survivalcraft, will love this next generation block craft game! This cool dystopian block world is rife with rapid paced action with three epic maps to play, each with their own exciting challenges. Precision shooting and stealth planning are your keys to winning this survival of the fittest game... But only if you have the guts to stand the heat. **** SEE AND FEEL THE ACTION **** Dominate the battlefield with immersive first person fighting action that will have your adrenaline pumping and ready for the next round! Run through addicting levels and test your skills in the intense wilds of these cube arenas. Collect hidden items that include ammo, health and slow and mega speed pickups. Deal damage the rise above the competition for ultimate bragging rights. Dive into the most epic and memorable action shooter game available. Quest to wreak as much havoc as you can on this survival island and obliterate the enemy in your mission to survive and thrive. The world is at your fingertips, one knock down at a time! Features: -Hidden melee (Axe, Mace and Sword, Bare Fist) & firearm (Crossbow, Hunter's Bow and Uzi) weapons -Collect health and ammo as you navigate the worlds -Prepare for enemies to increase as levels progress while pickups decrease -Score slow and mega speed pickups -Navigate obstacles -Entity map with explosive aerial views of oncoming enemies -Choose weapons easily or fight hand-to-hand for the ultimate experience -3 extensive levels to explore: Navigate winding block streets Battle through intense and winding caverns Run for your life in a grand mansion **** DISCLAIMER **** This amazing world craft style game isn't associated with Survivalcraft or Minecraft. It does not use any textures or skins associated with the Minecraft games. You won't see Steve, Creepers, Enderman or any other Minecraft characters lurking around either.
release_text: New Weapons and new effects Better game play Challenging Levels

description: Cartoon Wars is an arcade war game which combines the formulas of defense and real-time strategy games. ───────────────────── CRITICS SAY "A wonderful game that will keep you busy for hours... the best mix of Tower Defense and Real Time Strategy" - AppVersity "The gameplay is fun... and the chaotic battles aren’t short on spectacle or excitement." - Pocket Gamer "Incredible depth and one of the most addicting gameplays. 5 of 5 stars" - AppSmile ───────────────────── SCENARIO Two tribes existed in the Cartoon World; the vicious Color Tribe and their slaves, the Black and White Cartoon Tribe. For generations the Black and White Cartoon Tribe were treated as property, and forced into slavery. Fortunately... some with bigger ideas existed amongst them. They gathered and began a revolt to free themselves, taking the battle to the Color Tribe. The inevitable war has begun... become the hero of the Black and White Cartoons and set your people free. ───────────────────── FEATURES ALL-OUT ACTION STICK FIGURE GAME Produce your unit, aim your bow and destroy the enemy's castle UPGRADE AND CUSTOMIZE YOUR TROOPS Over 20 types of units and 16 different upgrades for troops, castle, weapon and productivity items COMPETE AGAINST MILITANTS FROM AROUND THE WORLD Keep track of your ranking and see how you compare against the rest of world STRATEGIZE PERFECTLY COORDINATED ATTACKS Determine the dispatchment of your troops and help them to become veteran units UNLIMITED NUMBER OF STAGES Play through an infinite number of stages slaughtering endless number of enemies NEWS & EVENTS Website http://www.gamevil.com Facebook http://facebook.com/gamevil Twitter http://twitter.com/gamevil YouTube http://youtube.com/gamevil

description: NEW v2.0 - with fresh new look and feel, stylish yet functional !!! The definitive classic on military strategy and tactics, presented in an awesome appbook format. The Art of War (attributed to Sun Tzu, of late-6th century BC) is one of the oldest and most prestigious books on military strategy in the world, influencing business tactics, military thinking & beyond. As a treatise on the anatomy of organizations in conflict, it applies to competition & conflict in general, from the interpersonal to the international and remains relevant even today. Presented in an awesome, fluid UI with loads of themes and customization options, the app ensures the perfect reading experience on your mobile device. You can quickly save/load relevant text using the convenient favorite tags. The app also allows you to easily copy/share quotes from this masterful classic. Features: ~ Fluid & highly customizable interface. ~ Easily share or copy quotes. ~ Save/reload favorite quotes. ~ Multiple well-designed visual themes. ~ Fullscreen mode supported. ~ Navigate via chapters or paragraphs. ~ Small size. ~ Ad-free experience!!!
release_text: Version 2.0 released. ~ Fully redesigned fluid UI ~ Share/copy quotes functionality ~ Favorite tags for easy access ~ Updated visual themes ~ Gesture info dialog on init

description: Your island has been invaded by aliens, take your shotgun, and kick them out! ▷ Alien Blitz is a 3d arcade-shooter with loads of weapons, maps and monsters. You play a soldier resting on his native island, but it is quickly overrun by monsters from outer space and no outside help is available. You put on your armor, take your shotgun and go to find out what happened at the peril of your life. Features: ◉ Now in 3d! You need a recent device with 3d acceleration to use it (2d mode is still available) ◉ 4 difficulty settings ◉ Hours of shooting ◉ 3 episodes, 41 maps ◉ 14 Upgradeable weapons ◉ Controller support (moga and generic controllers) ◉ Leveling, experience, money collecting,... ◉ Achievements, best time tracking,... ★Explore★ Explore lots of levels, find keys to access new zones, avoid the traps, and try to get out alive from these labyrinths. ★Fighting and weapons★ "Aliens want you dead, and you don't want to die!" You will face more than twenty different kinds of monsters during your journey; avoid homing fireballs, missiles, and all the other atrocities aliens prepared for you. Fortunately, you will not fight alone; you are accompanied by the best weapons available: starting from a simple shotgun you might end with powerful weapons such as fragmentation missiles, chain lightning or bombardment! Find all the 14 weapons and upgrade them to make them even more devastating! ★Gameplay★ Rediscover the pleasure of killing monsters, these monsters might not be very smart, but they are many and strong. Beware; some are particularly tough! Remember that these monsters might get new skills later in the adventure! ★Difficulty★ 4 difficulty settings are available, from casual gamer to hardcore gamer everyone will get appropriate difficulty. Best warriors can also try Nightmare mode / New game + (unlockable), but only if they are ready to die! ★Achievements★ Try to get all achievements, find all the treasures, finish levels quickly (SpeedRun!) or try to beat the game with a 100% score everywhere. There are great rewards awaiting. ★Try it now!★ The first episode is available for free on Android! And if you like it, you should definitely purchase the full version. Visit http://www.microbasic.net for more information
release_text: [update] new end of level screen [update] new advanced options screen [update] new help popup [update] misc balance changes [bug] some achievements not displayed [bug] some achievements not triggered [bug] decoy not working

description: Mobile HotSpot is an application which facilitates your Internet phone connection sharing either with your tablet or PC via a Wi-Fi connection (tethering). You can easily share your Internet mobile with only ONE CLICK. Mobile HotSpot shows the number of devices connected to your hotspot. It is also possible to see in detail the list of all connected devices. You can define a timer to turn off your HotSpot automatically after a number of minutes. Also you can automatically activate your HotSpot as you connect your phone on AC or USB power. In the same way, as you disconnect your phone from a power source you can automatically turn off the HotSpot application. Finally, in order to save your battery "Mobile HotSpot" turns itself off and instantly stops sharing when your battery is running at less than 20%. Most parameters can be changed via a configuration screen available via the menu: SSID, timer, battery level, notification. Mobile HotSpot is the most complete application on Google Play to manage tethering and share your Internet connection from your phone. It is compatible with Desktop, Laptop, iPad, Playstation 3 (PS3), Xbox, Blueray, Smart TV. Warning, some providers block the Internet connection sharing or tethering (Ex: Sprint). This application works only if tethering is running on your phone. If Mobile HotSpot is not compatible with your device, please don’t rate it negatively. Instead send me an email describing your problem, your model device and I will be pleased to implement corrections and publish an updated version. Thank you in advance for your cooperation. If you need help to solve a problem, you can visit the Mobile HotSpot support or FAQ Web pages : Support : http://androidstt.com/mobilehotspot/support/ FAQ: http://androidstt.com/mobilehotspot/faq/ PLEASE ! Take 1 minute to participate to our survey to create a list of compatible devices at : http://goo.gl/932DA ** Your carrier may charge you for hotspot, validate your agreement your provider.
release_text: Now compatible with the last version of Android Lollipop

description: Welcome to our collection of traffic apps for the UK road network. We aim to deliver a traffic app that will help you keep up-to-date on the latest traffic incidents from the major roads across the UK. Whether this is a specific road or a collection of roads you want to check, our traffic apps will help you avoid traffic en-route to your destination. The M25 Traffic News app is an incredibly useful tool featuring the latest updates on traffic from the busy M25 motorway. Whether there is a disruptive road/lane closure; an accident; congestion or any other incident for that matter, you will find the latest updates here. This is a must-have app for anyone who travels and is perfect for accessing prior to you leaving your location, in order to help ensure you avoid any problems en-route. What you get: • Latest (Traffic updates via RSS) • Twitter (Traffic updates via Twitter) • Share (Help spread the word!) • Map (Live updates via Google Maps utilising the 'Traffic Layer' to highlight traffic flow using a highlighted line)* • Push History (Instant message history from the developers) • Feedback (Send your feedback to the developers) • Mailing List (Sign up to our mailing list) • Appdesigned4u (Link to our website) * Map (Traffic colours) Google Maps will either show current colour-coded traffic conditions on roads where data is available or display a message that data is unavailable. Please note that you may need to apply the 'Traffic' layer within Google Maps to enable this feature. This is easily achievable by simply selecting the 'Settings' feature and clicking on 'Traffic'. Important Information: For obvious safety reasons, please refrain from using this app whilst in the control of a vehicle. This is understandably for your own safety and the safety of others. Please note that this app requires the use of a stable connection to the internet to update the various in-app features. We have made every effort to ensure the in-app features apply to the specific road/s in question. However, from time to time there may be other unrelated information included. All of the traffic feeds in this app are reliant on the various sources keeping these up-to-date. Please understand that we have no control over this and we simply can only advise our users to try the in-app feature at a later date/time to see if the applicable feature has been updated. Please understand that this app utilises various advertising in the form of banners and various page links to external sites. Although many of the adverts are not related to the app itself, they have been included to help support the ongoing development of the app. Please view our other related apps in the app store (if available) that do not include any advertisements, and may instead include extra features! There will typically be a small extra charge for an ad-free higher specification version. If you do experience any issues with this app, please contact us using the 'Feedback' facility in the app rather than leaving us a negative star rating and/or review. We will always try to endeavour to fix a problem in the app for the benefit of all of our users. Finally, if you do like our app, please be so kind to leave us a high star rating and a review. We greatly appreciate your support! Disclaimer: This app is in no way associated to any of transport organisations used in this app in the UK or beyond. All of the feeds included are the property of their respectful owners, and this app simply serves the purpose of directing the user to that specific source. The RSS traffic feeds utilised are provided by the Highways Agency ( http://www.highways.gov.uk ) and are freely available to use for commercial purposes.
release_text: What's new in this version: * Bug fixes

description: 폰을 켤 때마다 성경 한구절씩! 내 삶속에 스며드는 하나님의 말씀! 성경일독을 위해 거창한 계획을 세울 필요도 없고, 성경어플을 열 필요도 없습니다. 성경을 생활속에 스며들듯이 틈틈이 짬짬이 읽을 수 있는 어플입니다. 안읽을래야 안읽을수 없는 환경!^^ 하나님을 믿는 성도라면 언젠가는 성경일독을 해야합니다. 지금 바로 '성경일독Q '어플로 시작하세요. “성령의 검 곧 하나님의 말씀을 가지라 에베소서 6:17” bible -특징 및 기능설명- ● (1) 너무 간단합니다! 스마트폰을 켜면, 성경 한 구절이 뜹니다. 한절한절씩 볼 수 있어 부담없이, 볼 수 있습니다. 폰을 자주 열어보시나요? 그만큼 더 성경을 읽어 하나님과 가까이 할 수 있습니다. (참고 : 성경은 66권 1189장 3만절이 넘습니다.) ● (2) 한번 읽은 절은 자동으로 기억하고 다음절을 보여줍니다. ● (3) 성경 각권 / 각장을 선택할 수 있습니다. (창세기,마태복음 2장 등) ● (4) 이전절/다음절 버튼을 누르면 계속 읽을 수 있습니다. ● (5) 개역개정(4판-최신), 개역한글판, 현대어성경, 새번역, 아가페쉬운성경, 영문성경(KJV / NIV NLT)을 모두 지원합니다. ● (6) 다른 성경과 동시에 비교할 수 있는 기능이 있습니다. 그래서 번역본별로 비교해볼 수도 있고, 한글-영어성경을 같이 보면서 비교할 수도 있습니다. ● (7) 좋은 구절이 있으면, 그 구절을 카카오톡 / 카카오스토리에 바로 올리는 기능이 있습니다. 주위 분들과 좋은 말씀을 나눠보세요. 말씀이 SNS에 돌고도는 모습은 정말 아름답습니다. ● (8) 다양한 색상의 컬러 테마가 지원됩니다. (기본-베이지 / 하얀색 / 검은색/ 핑크색 / 연두색 / 하늘색 / 초록색 / 푸른색) ※ 깔끔한 디자인, 눈이 편한 색상, 기술적으로 오류가 거의 없는 어플입니다. (알람과 충돌나지 않습니다.) ※ 앞으로 편리한 기능이 더 추가될 예정입니다. 혹시 좋은 아이디어나 개선할 사항이 있다면 어플에서 "의견"버튼을 눌러 저희에게 알려주세요. 더 멋진 어플로 보답하겠습니다. ※ 주위 성도, 가족들에게 이 어플을 많이 알려주세요~ 크리스챤들의 필수어플이 될 그 날까지! BIBLEQ app copyright@성경일독Q (성경구절) / 성경통독 / 성경일독큐
release_text: 폰을 켤 때마다 성경말씀이! 내 삶속에 스며드는 하나님의 귀한 말씀! 성경구절을 잠금화면으로 만들어줍니다. 하나님께 내폰의 첫화면을 바칩시다. 제안받은 구현가능한 모든 기능 개발중입니다. v1.7.5 라이브러리 구버전 업그레이드 v1.7.4 구글 가이드에 따른 트래픽 최적화 작업 v1.7.2 새번역, 출애굽기, 고린도전서 오류 제거 v1.7.6 기본 라이브러리 업데이트 (Google Service) v1.6.7 Android 5.0 대응 v1.6.1 ~ v1.6.2 - 새번역 - 구문중 중복된 정보 제거 - 구글 라이브러리 버전 업데이트 v1.5.9 - 군청색 테마 추가 - 진행률 삭제 기능 - 오타 수정 v1.5.5 - NLT(영문) 성경 추가 - 패턴 락스크린 오랜 버전 폰 대응 v1.5.3 - 개역개정 성경 교체 - 새번역, 아가페쉬운성경 추가

description: De Regenmeterapp is ontwikkeld om snel inzicht te krijgen in neerslaghoeveelheden van uw locatie. De app biedt u volgende features: • Actueel: Neerslag van <3h, <6h, <12h, <24h. • Periode: Neerslag overzicht per week en per maand. • Pushbericht met dagelijkse neerslag • Neerslag overschot/tekort overzicht van Nederland De actuele neerslag zijn de gegevens van de buienradar data per 3 uur. De periode gegevens worden gecorrigeerd met behulp van de op dat moment beschikbare waarnemingen van de neerslaghoeveelheid van stations in het klimatologisch KNMI neerslagmeetnet. De app wordt beschikbaar gesteld door Bayer CropScience Nederland en is ontwikkeld door AppsforAgri.com. Rain With Rapp is designed to quickly understand rainfall amounts of your location. The app offers the following features: • Current: Precipitation of <3h, <6h <12h <24h. • Period: Precipitation overview per week and per month. • Push message with daily rainfall • Precipitation surplus / deficit overview of Netherlands The actual precipitation data from the rainfall radar data every 3 hours. The period data is corrected using the currently available observations of precipitation stations in the climatically KNMI precipitation monitoring network. The app is made available by Bayer CropScience Netherlands and developed by AppsforAgri.com.
release_text: De regenmeter app is uitgebreid met pushnotificatie zodat u automatisch op de hoogte wordt gehouden van de neerslag op uw locatie. Nieuw is ook het neerslag overschot/tekort overzicht van Nederland. Het doorlopend potentieel neerslagoverschot wordt verkregen door het verschil te berekenen tussen de hoeveelheid gevallen neerslag en de berekende referentiegewasverdamping.

description: A turn based strategy war game where you lead Roman legions in their conquest of the Italian peninsula. Play various scenarios of the conflicts fought by the Roman Republic; Be the dictator for the Roman civilization at the ancient age when it was yet to become the largest empire in the world. *** If you encounter a bug, please get in touch with us by email, so that we can fix the problem! Same thing with refunds: Just mail us. *** * 14 scenarios of varying size and difficulty, ranging from the initial conquests of neighbouring kingdoms by Roman city-state, to the First Punic War and beyond * Single player and Local Multiplayer (players sharing same device) game modes (online multiplayer not supported) * Freely zoomable and pannable hex based map, with multitouch gesture support * Hex and counter style of play, like many table-top TBS board games * Autosaving: Progress is automatically saved at end of each turn, or when you switch away from the game; No risk of losing game progress because of forgetting to save * Designed to be playable also on lower-spec Android phones and tablets; on the other hand, users with more capable 'droid devices have enhanced frame rate and smoother experience * In-game help guide * Supports natively all screen resolutions from the smallest phones in your pocket to the largest HD tablets * OpenGL ES hardware accelerated graphics engine The basic gameplay style of this game was inspired by many earlier hexagon based "oldskool" or retro PC strategy games like Fantasy General, Panzer General and Battle for Wesnoth as well as some of the more recent titles, such as Uniwar on mobile devices ... with a little bit of Civilization / Freeciv spirit mixed in. However, the backdrop of the game is set in the ancient Rome, and the game attempts to follow faithfully the known course of the events to the extent that is known to the modern historywriting (some liberties have been taken in interpreting the details to make the game more entertaining). The game has some minor RPG like elements such as unit leveling (success in combat leads first to veteran, then to elite status, giving stats improvements), but at its heart it is first and foremost a pure strategy game. Nearly two millennia before the era of medieval knights and castles of the European middle ages, the first ancient settlers of the Roman tribe founded the city of Rome. As the legends customarily tell, the twin brothers and townsmen Romulus and Remus were the original founders, with Romulus eventually becoming the first king of Rome. From its humble beginnings first as a small village, and then a local kingdom, its destiny was to become a great empire encompassing all coasts of the Mediterranean sea and even beyond. For centuries, his royal majesty the Emperor of Rome was undoubtedly the most highborn ruler on the Earth, wielding total authority over a large portion of the humankind, until barbarian hordes and many years of revolution brought the fallen empire to its end. The game begins in the very first years of the Roman saga; You, the player, will lead the Roman army, legion after legion, from a battle to another in the name of the Roman Empire against the mighty warlords of the neighbouring realms. Assault the Etruscans on river Tiber, stop the madness of Samnite invasion in Campania, conquer South Italy, drive Carthaginians out from the isle of Sicily, and much more ... May the god of war Mars spare you from the fury and vengeance of your enemies in the battlefield! While the main campaign of the game deals with the Roman Republic expansion wars, the second campaign is played as commander Hannibal of Carthage, one of the greatest military commanders to ever live, whose brief advance against Rome brought him all the way from North Africa almost to the gates of Rome, before the Romans got their defense lines established. This revival of warfare between Carthage and Rome came to be known as the Second Punic War in the books of history.
release_text: v1.5: - Maintenance release (several fixes for different crashes; fix occasional savegame corruption in multiplayer) v1.4.4: - Added larger game font for high-resolution (xhdpi) devices

description: Get Lost!(BlackList) - Is a powerful tool that is needed for people who value their time , not spending it on unwanted calls and SMS messages . Flexible options will satisfy the most demanding user , and the user-friendly interface will help to do it quickly and with the greatest comfort . Create your own space , no spam, no ads. Blocking occurs without the slightest sign of a call , but did not remain unnoticed. You will not miss an important message or call. Everything is saved in the log . Maintain statistics will allow you to assess the effectiveness of the application and your black list using informative graphs. Add objectionable words in the filter and then analyze your posts and you will find out how much spam and unwanted ads you've already got. Install the widget on the desktop to always be aware of what is happening , as well as easy access to the application. If for some reason the app does not work on your device, or you will not work as you would have liked , do not rush to write a comment and rate it . Write to us at email, we will try to help as soon as possible . The set of lock modes :   - Blacklist   - Block SMS only   - Block all   - Lock the SMS keyword   - Block all unknown numbers Advantages:   - Stable operation   - Minimal power consumption   - Flexible settings   - Easy to use   - Instant Response   - Do not consume memory and processor smartphone   - Maintain statistics in graphs   - Analysis of SMS messages Tags: Black List, block calls, blocking sms, blacklist, white list.

description: Have you ever dreamed of building a mega-metropolis in the Arabian desert? Play Desert Tycoon and become an Arabian business tycoon by building your dream city in the thriving Arabian emirate of Abu Lumba! Start from humble Bedouin beginnings and progress step-by-step in building your business empire of real estate, business, energy, and tourism assets. Develop major industries and watch your economy grow right before your eyes as you expand your city and progress to new levels in the game! Desert Tycoon game features: - Grow your city and attract new residents by building a variety of housing structures - Develop a thriving economy by constructing new businesses and industries - Amass a fortune of Gold Coins and Dinars by collecting profits from your businesses - Glorify your city by building beautiful structures, like parks, schools and mosques - Add distinctive features to your city that make it your own! Play Desert Tycoon now and build the Arabian metropolis of your dreams! Note: A wireless data connection is required to play Desert Tycoon. This game supports Android tablet devices! For feedback and support, please email us: dt-support@lum.ba Follow us on Twitter: @DesertTycoon Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/deserttycoon

TuneIn has all of the best sports, news, music and talk radio as well as live events and top podcasts. Stream over 100,000 real radio stations, playing live from around the world. TuneIn Radio Pro is display ad free and lets you record what you are listening to. With TuneIn, you can: - Stream over 100,000 real radio stations from around the world, playing sports, news, talk and music. - Hear your favorite music genres from Hip Hop to Top 40 Pop to Alternative Rock. - Discover your new favorite song, artist, show or station. - Find and follow genres, podcasts, artists, sports teams and more. - Listen to exclusive 24/7 stations from top podcasts and artists. - Share what you’re listening to with friends. - Record shows & listen to them anytime. - Enjoy TuneIn without display ads For information about why we request certain permissions visit: http://tun.in/9ekgZ ✪ +1 us on Google Play: http://plus.google.com/+TuneIn/ ✪ Like us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/tunein ✪ Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/tunein ✪ Follow us on Tumblr: http://blog.tunein.com

description: Enhance the Ordinary with MatchCut Videos! MatchCut Videos is the fastest and easiest video editor for Android, giving you a stunning new way to make and share videos with friends on Instagram and YouTube. With MatchCut, you can make professionally edited movies from start to finish in under a minute! Choose between 30 or 15-second format (perfect for Instagram). How easy is it to really make videos with MatchCut Videos? 1. Record videos and or select previously filmed clips. 2. Choose your favorite song from hundreds of popular free and fully licensed music tracks 3. Watch as MatchCut’s video editor automatically edits your videos perfectly timed with the music. 4. Share with friends -------------------------------------------------------------------- Listen to other MatchCut Users: “Great App! Nothing Else like it.” “Excellent app for quickly editing my videos together. I love the music selection, too!” “So fun!!! Love the music options and the way the app splices the video, its like vine on steroids.” “I’m really enjoying this app. Creating a video is easy, fun, and surprisingly fast.” ** Featured on AndroidPolice.com *** ***Featured in Gizmodo’s Favorite Apps of the Week*** -------------------------------------- Features: **NEW** • Share on Instagram - You can now create 15-second MatchCuts and share them directly to one of your favorite social networks. • Introducing Artists Contests - participate and submit your MatchCuts in new artist-run contests for chances to win prizes. Winning submissions are handpicked by each artist! • Enhanced Song Descriptions - You can now find details on each song used in your friends' videos. See who created the songs, when they were published, and get direct links to download / buy the music for your own use. • New Music Themes - Listen to new music to auto-edit your videos to, ranging from new Hollywood-themed music to new featured independent artists. MatchCut Videos comes bundled with over 100 royalty free music for your MatchCut Videos, allowing you to set the perfect mood and theme for your movies. Plenty more songs will be coming soon! • Choose from either our Hollywood-style music or our curated Indie music playlist. • Share with friends: MatchCut Videos makes it very simple for you to upload your movies onto YouTube and share on your favorite social networks. • Export or share: Some of us don’t like to share our videos to the public. MatchCut Videos allows you to export your videos to your gallery, if you choose to. • Preview: Preview each video you create to make sure you have the perfect song and the perfect cuts before you post it live for your friends to see. • Browse through our real-time Explore feed to see the top trending MatchCuts. • Like what you hear? Purchase full songs from within the app. -------------------------------------------------------------------- Anybody Can Use It! You don’t need to have any prior editing experience! Seriously, three year olds are now making professionally edited music videos and montages because of MatchCut. The music video editor inside of MatchCut was built to give you the most simple and fun experience as possible. **Now on Google Play & Android due to popular demand from iOS** -------------------------------------------------------------------- We Love Our Customers! •You are everything to us. We are constantly listening to your feedback and making improvements as fast as possible to keep you happy. •Please 5 star us if you enjoy using MatchCut Videos! Every positive review gives us that much more encouragement to give you a better and easier-to-use product •Follow us ☺ https://www.facebook.com/m2matchcut?ref=hl https://twitter.com/M2MatchCut https://plus.google.com/b/117828179095152614083/106947739923814594801/about

description: "My kids say '5 stars is not enough! Give them 200 stars!'" "This has to be the BEST app ever!" This app is intended for students who have already completed Level 1 of Hands-On Equations. In Level 2, the student learns how to solve equations involving the white pawn -- whose name is "star" -- as well as the blue pawn and the red cubes. The white pawn is an unknown like the blue pawn. The value of the white pawn is the opposite of that of the blue pawn. Hence if x = 3, star = -3. Since their sum is zero, when the white pawn and the blue pawn occur together on the same side of the scale they may be removed without affecting the balance. The notation used for the white pawn is that of an x with a crossbar through it. It has the name of “star” since it looks like a star. Later on in the program the students learn to recognize “(-x)” as another name for star. In Level 2 students learn to solve equations such as 4x+(-x)+1=2x+5 and 2x-(-x)=12. A video introduction is provided for each lesson. (See the sample YouTube video at http://youtu.be/VFYQ47EAqZw .) Each video introduction is followed by two examples and ten exercises. It is essential for the student to view the lesson video prior to attempting the examples and exercises for that lesson. Hands-On Equations is the ideal introduction to algebra for elementary and middle school students. Not only will students have fun and be fascinated with the program, their sense of self-esteem will be dramatically enhanced as they experience success with sophisticated algebraic equations. High school students struggling with algebra will likely experience success and understanding for the first time as they work with this app. The video instruction for each lesson will enable the user to continue with the success and enjoyment they had with the Level 1 app as they solve even more challenging equations! More information on Hands-On Equations can be found at www.borenson.com and on YouTube.

description: Free Photo Editor is tool to create Amazing photo with different effects. How It works : - Select Photos From your camera or Photo Gallery - Customize (Edit) Your Selected Photo. - Apply Different FX. - Share Photo To Facebook,Twitter,Instagram & Many More Social Networks. Features - More than 20 Filters. - Rotate,Crop,resize Photo. - Adjust Brightness & Contrast of Photos. - More than 20 Borders. - Place Text On Photo. - Apply Photo Frame. - Lots of Fun & Loving stickers. - Draw on Photo. If you have any feedback contact at appsupport@mobappbuddy.com Thanks to Aviary Android SDK.

description: My girlfriend had, like many others, posed the question: "What do I actually my hard earned money from?" And "Why does not remain at the end of the month left as much as I have made it my thought and hope for?" Due I have these questions developed together with her ​​this little app to get an overview of where all the good money actually disappears. And the result is Skimp - a simple and fast Budget Book: • Quick entry of expenditure: Start Skimp, press the pig, enter the amount, change the date if necessary and select a category: complete! • Assorted monthly overview (course) of expenditure: Here are all issues sorted by categories to get an overview of what the most money "on it goes." By selecting the respective category do you see the individual listings, which you also once again very easy to edit, delete or duplicate here can. • Categories: About the Category menu, you can create, delete, or rename the categories. We have made a small pre-selection of categories, which you can of course adapt to your needs. What is important to us: • We will continue to develop and try to improve it Skimp over time. Parts for us like your criticism, opinion and wishes. However, the development of apps is only a hobby for us and not our main job. So please bear with me if we can not implement everything immediately. • Skimp is and remains a non-profit Project. Have fun saving money!
release_text: 1.01.0011: • Bugfix: Long description text and category names are now displayed correctly. 1.01.0010: • Bug fix: In the List of repetitions is displayed the correct currency now. 1.01.0009: • Repetitions: Create, edit, and delete recurring expenses (eg: monthly rent)

description: The application TapTaxi allows to request the taxi for any taste easily. By using it there is no need to talk to the dispatcher — only some moves by finger and after 5–10 minutes the required car is here. TapTaxi is operational in the cities: Balashiha, Bryansk, Vladimir, Volgograd, Voronezh, Gelendzhik, Dzerzhinsk, Domodedovo and Domodedovo Airport, Izhevsk, Kazan, Kaluga, Kiev, Kirov, Kostroma, Krasnodar, Nevinnomyssk, Nizhnekamsk, Nizhny Novgorod, Novorossiysk, Orel, Perm, Podolsk, Pyatigorsk, Rostov-on-Don, Samara, Sochi, Stavropol, Ufa, Khimki and Sheremetyevo Airport, Cheboksary, Yaroslavl. TapTaxi offers following possibilities: * to сall the taxi without long conversations with dispatcher, * to see how the application determines your current location, * to mark the point on the map without writing down long address by hand, * to save popular addresses and quickly call them up, * to select any car — which is close by or which looks nicer, * to track the car on the map, * to add the disreputable drivers to the black list and never see them on the list again, * and mark nice drivers, so next time be able to use checked car, * to see on the screen detailed cost of the ride to exclude fraud. Taxi services which operate TapTaxi: Balashiha, Voronezh, Domodedovo and Domodedovo Airport, Kiev, Nevinnomyssk, Podolsk, Pyatigorsk, Rostov-on-Don, Sochi, Stavropol, Khimki and Sheremetyevo Airport — RedTaxi. Bryansk, Vladimir, Volgograd, Gelendzhik, Dzerzhinsk, Kaluga, Kirov, Krasnodar, Nizhny Novgorod, Novorossiysk, Samara, Ufa, Cheboksary, Yaroslavl — Taxi Saturn. Izhevsk — Taxi 373. Kazan — Taxi Tatarstan. Kostroma — Kostroma Troyka. Nizhnekamsk — Taxi Max. Orel — Taxi Voyage. Perm — Permskie Taxomotornye Linii.
release_text: * You can select car classes such as Comfort and Business. * You can create order with options such as "child seat" and "air conditioning". * Availability of car classes and options depends on the city where you are.

description: Борис Леонидович Пастернак — великий русский поэт и писатель, переводчик, лауреат Нобелевской премии по литературе (1958), автор произведений «Доктор Живаго», «Девятьсот пятый год», «Зимняя ночь» и других. Основные возможности: - Приложение включает в себя практически все сочинения Пастернака. - Настройка отображения: светлая/темная тема, ночной режим - Настройка размера шрифта - Быстрая публикация произведения в Facebook, Google+, Вконтакте, Gmail, Twitter, SMS. - Произведения известных отечественных и зарубежных писателей в одном приложении. Для загрузки текстов произведений используется Интернет-соединение. Boris Leonidovich Pasternak - the great Russian poet, writer and translator, winner of the Nobel Prize for Literature (1958), the author of works of "Doctor Zhivago", "Nine hundred and fifth year", "Winter Night" and others. Key features: - The application includes almost all the works of Pasternak. - Setting the display: light / dark theme, night mode - Adjust the font size - Rapid publication of works in Facebook, Google+, FaceBook, Gmail, Twitter, SMS. - Works of famous domestic and foreign writers in a single application. To download the texts of works using the Internet connection.

description: Christmas Kids Hospital - Game for Kids Christmas Kids Hospital is specially designed for kids and other who love to play games. Here is the chance for you to get your children become a doctor and take care of sick Santa in Christmas Kids Hospital. Enjoy this really extra-ordinary game for kids.

description: The SAP Mobile Documents mobile app for Android lets you securely bring all your personal and business documents and content with you wherever you go. Unlike manual file transfers using shared folders or e-mail, with this app you can quickly and easily access and collaborate on files from your computer and corporate document management systems anywhere, anytime. Key features of SAP Mobile Documents for Android • Securely access your content including documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and videos • Navigate through your folders and documents and view them directly in the app • Sync documents to your Android device for offline access in secure and encrypted storage • Create and edit content in SAP Mobile Documents and make it available on any other device • Communicate and share documents with other users and peers Note: To use the SAP Mobile Documents mobile app for Android with your business data, you need to have an account for SAP Mobile Documents provided by your IT department.
release_text: • Technical improvements

description: Fish the world's greatest rivers with Big River Fishing! This newest expansion for Big Sport Fishing now features realistic 3D backgrounds! With the full expansion you can explore the dense jungles of the Amazon, the ancient ruins along the Nile, or the beautiful natural landscapes of the mighty Mississippi. Catch more than 20 new fish including vicious Piranha, and river monsters such as Pirarucu, Tigerfish and Giant Catfish. A total of five rivers are included in the full expansion, each rendered in stunning 3D and containing a variety of native fish which swim and act like real fish! This expansion pack provides a new theme and additional locations for Big Sport Fishing and requires either Big Sport Fishing 3D or Big Sport Fishing 3D Lite (free). With over 8 million downloads, Big Sport Fishing provides beautiful panoramic views, stunning 3D graphics and exciting motion based controls. In Big Sport Fishing you can earn virtual credits to acquire special bonus items. These credits can also be purchased using an In-App purchase.

description: MinuteCast by AccuWeather gives you minute-by-minute precipitation forecasts for the next two hours, for your exact location. It is the leading nowcast technology in North America and this free weather app now integrates user-submitted, ground-level observations. Popular features: • AccuWeather MinuteCast®: Find out the minute it will start and stop raining, sleeting, or snowing over the next two hours in the contiguous U.S. and Canada (more locations coming soon!) • Integrates user-submitted, ground-level weather observations – submit yours today! • Address Book Lookup: Check the weather forecast for locations listed in your address book • Severe weather alerts and tornado warnings • GPS-enabled: detects your exact location • Precise forecasts for approximately every half square mile Download MinuteCast by AccuWeather for free and experience the Superior Accuracy™ that comes from the world’s most trusted source of weather forecasts. What’s New • SkyMotion is now part of the AccuWeather family. The SkyMotion nowcast products that users love are still available. They are now available as AccuWeather MinuteCast®. • Submit a weather observation for your location today! User-submitted, ground-level observation functionality now available. • Address Book Lookup: Check the weather forecast for locations listed in your address book. • Updated ad serving platform: ads can be removed through in-app purchase. • Interface enhancements for an improved user experience. • Updated legal terms and conditions, and privacy policy. • AccuWeather provides customer care 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. We welcome your comments, suggestions, and any questions, support@accuweather.com .
release_text: • SkyMotion is now part of the AccuWeather family. They are now available as AccuWeather MinuteCast®. • Submit a weather observation for your location today! • Address Book Lookup: Check the weather forecast for locations listed in your address book. • Updated ad serving platform: ads can be removed through in-app purchase. • Updated legal terms and conditions, and privacy policy. • AccuWeather provides customer care 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. support@accuweather.com.

description: Fruit Draw is the most fruity application there is ! It's fun for adults and kids as one ! Choose a realistic looking high definition fruit or vegetable from a wide selection, and peal it using the brush or cutout tools. Fruit Draw gives a real sculpting experience ! Use different brush shapes and sizes, invert the peal back and forth using a click of a button, hide or show the fruit's top which sometimes looks like the fruit's 'hair' actually.. Easily educate your kids towards nutrition by clicking the 'i' button and reading about the nutritional benefits of the current fruit. Want to know more about it ? just click on the 'W' button to go directly to Wikipedia's definition. Draw all kinds of wacky faces and share it with your friends and family : you can easily save the picture to the gallery, or share it on Facebook in one click straight from the app ! Get Fruit Draw now, and sculpt your fruit without making a mess in the kitchen.

Are distinct biomes (deserts, plains, forest, jungle, and more.) The set of different creatures and animals! -Thank Number of different items that can be created and used. -Convenient Touch control -And More. !!! Attention !!! description: 명함 관리 비서, 리멤버! 명함을 찍으면 비서가 입력해주는 궁극의 명함관리 앱 *2014 대한민국 모바일앱 어워드 '이달의 으뜸앱' 선정 *네이버 매거진캐스트 '금주의 앱' 선정 *GAME-NEXT SUMMIT 2014 공식 네트워킹앱 선정 ”충격과 공포의 명함 앱” – 한국경제 ”전문 타자수가 직접 입력하여 오류가 없다” – 조선일보 ”시간절감과 정확도 면에서 압도적 우위” – 아이티투데이 ”명함 정리해주는 ‘개인비서’가 찾아왔다” – 머니투데이 ”모든 명함을 한방에 정리 가능한 서비스” – Platum 1) 비서들의 명함 정보 수기 입력 - 받은 명함들을 촬영만 해두면 비서들이 직접 입력 - 명함 100장 촬영하는데 10분이면 충분해요 2) 대량명함 스캔대행 서비스 (별도 신청 필요) - 명함을 택배로 전달 받아 스캔 후, 명함 정보를 모두 수기로 입력하여 리멤버 앱에 넣어드리는 서비스 (앱에서 명함을 직접 촬영하여 사용하는 것은 무료이며, 대량의 촬영이 번거로운 분들을 위한 유료대행 서비스) - http://bit.ly/massprocess : 이용방법 확인 및 신청 3) 회원간 명함 정보 자동 업데이트 (Live 명함) - Live 명함 = 등록한 명함 중 리멤버 회원의 명함 - 회사, 직책, 주소, 연락처 변경 시 실시간 자동 업데이트 4) 최적의 비즈니스 인맥 관리 도구 - 그룹 관리 기능 - 전화 수신 시 해당 인물 명함이미지 표시 기능 - 입력된 모든 정보로 손쉽게 명함 검색 - 명함별 메모 기능 5) 명함 정보 연계 활용 - 핸드폰 주소록에 연락처 저장 기능 제공 - 구글주소록 동기화 제공 - Excel로 내보내기 및 Outlook 연계 - 명함 이미지/정보를 문자, 카톡, 이메일로 전달 가능 [리멤버의 개인정보보호 및 보안관리 안내] 첫째, 리멤버는 개인정보를 도용/악용하지 않습니다. 회원님들께서 등록하신 명함 정보는 휴대폰을 변경하셔도 안전하게 복원하여 사용하실 수 있도록 클라우드 서버에 안전하게 저장하고 있습니다. 이 때 정보들은 이중암호화하여 관리되고 있어 누구도 임의로 접근할 수 없으며, 저희가 무단으로 도용/ 악용하지 않습니다. 또한 회원님의 개인정보를 동의 없이 임의로 제3자에게 제공하는 일은 결코 없으므로, 이 또한 안심하셔도 좋습니다. 둘째, 리멤버는 입력 보안 사고로부터 안전합니다. 철저한 보안 교육과 검증을 통해 선별된 리멤버의 전문 타이피스트는 자체 입력 모니터링 시스템으로 항시 관리됩니다. 또한 타이핑할 때 해당 명함 소유자에 대한 정보 또한 알 수 없는 구조이므로 명함 소유자와 촬영된 명함 간의 관계 또한 절대로 유출되지 않습니다. 또한 2015년 상반기 내로 명함이미지를 정보 단위로 분할하여 별도로 입력한 후 자동 병합하는 방식을 도입하여 궁극의 입력 보안 시스템을 완성할 예정입니다. 셋째, 리멤버는 외부 해킹으로부터 안전합니다. 리멤버는 SSL 통신 보안 프로토콜을 적용함으로써 세계 100대 은행과 동일한 VeriSign 인증을 획득하였습니다. 또한 명함 DB는 과거 해킹사례가 전무하여 삼성, NASA 등의 세계적인 기관에서도 사용하고 있는 아마존(AWS) 서버에 안전하게 저장되며, 이중암호화 저장을 통해 다시 한번 해킹에 대한 안전한 대비를 해두었습니다. [리멤버의 기기 접근권한 안내] 1. 휴대전화 상태 및 ID 읽기 : 가입시 인증을 위한 사용자의 휴대폰번호를 별도의 입력 없이 자동으로 채워줍니다. 2. 주소록 읽기 : 등록한 명함을 연락처에 저장시 중복된 연락처를 검색합니다. : 회원의 자발적 의사에 따른 친구초대 문자 발송시 연락처를 불러옵니다. 3. 문자메시지 발송 : 회원의 자발적 의사에 따른 친구초대 문자 발송시 SMS앱을 거치지 않고 리멤버에서 바로 발송할 수 있도록 합니다. (절대 회원의 의사에 반하여 임의로 문자메시지가 발송되지 않습니다.) 4. 주소록 수정 : 등록한 명함을 연락처에 저장하기 선택 시 새로운 연락처를 생성하여 저장합니다. 5. 다른 앱 위에 그리기 : 전화 수신 시 리멤버에 등록된 명함정보를 통해 발신자의 정보를 전화화면 위에 표시합니다. ---- 당신의 명함 관리 비서, 리멤버 (REMEMBER) ---- 개발자 연락처 : 이메일 : contact@rememberapp.co.kr 주소 : 서울시 강남구 대치동 890-29 정인빌딩 2층 (주)드라마앤컴퍼니 business cards secretary, Remember! description: Provides a useful interface for calculating unknown quantities in the fields of electronics and electrical engineering. Current features include: Resistor colour codes - tells you the resistance, tolerance, upper and lower values, and E-series information for any colour-coded resistor. Ohm's Law and Power Calculator - Finds any unknown quantity in terms of voltage, current, resistance and power dissipation for any omhic component. Series/Parallel Value Calculator. Finds the total value for any series or parallel combination of resistors, capacitors, or inductors. The calculator can also find an individual value given the value for the whole combination. Reactance Finder - Calculates the reactance of any capacitor or inductor from the circuit frequency. Power Triangle - Calculates real, apparent, and reactive power dissipation as well as impedance phase angle in any electrical system. Resistivity - Finds the resistance of any wire or prism from its dimensions and resistivity, or vice versa. Magnetic Fields - Finds the force that acts on a conductor in a magnetic field. Capacitors - Finds the charge and energy stored in a capacitor. Many more electrical utilities coming soon, with regular updates. Plus, NO ADS. Please rate or give feedback. Feel free to give suggestions or comments.
release_text: 23/02/12 - (1.1) - Improved UI, added Pro upgrade option. 28/02/12 - (1.2) - Removed a bug causing 'Webpage not Available' errors in the series/parallel converter calculators. 31/10/12 - (1.3) - Added Capacitors and Magnetic Fields, enabled screen rotation and numeric keyboard.

description: Simple and fun Reversi game! • Play vs a person, or computer. • Choose from 6 levels of computer. • You can 'Undo' your moves as many times as you need. Levels 1 to 3 are for beginners. Please try Level 4 or higher if you feel it's too easy. Includes NO annoying ads at all. Requires NO special permissions such as Internet access. ======================== Reversi (Othello) is a board game involving abstract strategy and played by two players on a board with 8 rows and 8 columns and a set of distinct pieces for each side. Pieces typically are disks with a light and a dark face, each face belonging to one player. The player's goal is to have a majority of their colored pieces showing at the end of the game, turning over as many of their opponent's pieces as possible. (from Wikipedia) ========================

description: Fast Search for words, substring of words or anagrams, perfect for crossword and word games like Wordfeud, Words With Friends, Scrabble, WordSmith, Word Game, DroidWords, WordWise, Word Mix etc. PRO version has no ads. This is the only dictionary tool you need for all word based games, 23 different dictionaries available. Click on any of the words that match your input and get instant definitions from a configurable source, like Wiktionary, TheFreeDictionary.com, or FreeDictionary.org. Dictionaries are loaded into memory allowing for extremely fast searching for any number of letters. No restrictions on number of letter combinations, number of blanks/unknowns or number of results. Dictionaries are downloaded as needed. Some dictionaries are fairly large and might take a minute or two to download. Functions: - Dictionaries will be installed locally, no network access required during search - ENABLE, SOWPODS, TWL06, TWL98, Norwegian Bokmål, Nynorsk, Swedish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Spanish, Portuguese, French (ODS4, ODS5), German, Italian, Icelandic, Faroese, Romanian, Czech, Russian, Polish, Magyar dictionaries available - Click on a word in the results to get an online dictionary lookup - Online lookup dictionaries are configurable - Search for any number of letters - Specify any number of blanks/unknowns in your input - Get any number of results - Transparent mode for easy use together with other applications. - Separate mode for game or crossword - In game mode, specify prefix, postfix, letters on rack, letters on board - Specify ? anywhere in search string for unknown letter, in game/anagram mode, this indicates a blank letter tile. In crossword mode you can also specify * to indicate the wildcard character, meaning a sequence of unknown letters. Words uses "Den stora svenska ordlistan" by Göran Andersson (dsso.se) and is licensed by Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike. Please check this wiki page for answers on comments: http://code.google.com/p/dicts/wiki/Comments

description: Welcome to Fairy Pony Forest, where you get to dress up and interact with your cute pony friends! As you explore the forest, keep an eye out for treasure chests. They contain new dress up items and treats for your ponies. While "My Fairy Pony" was specifically designed with small children in mind, everyone can enjoy exploring the magical beauty found throughout Fairy Pony Forest. Be the stylist that every pony dreams of! All ponies keep their states saved after leaving the app, so there's no need to start again from scratch if you have them dressed up exactly how you want them. All the ponies animate, talk, and even the dress up items you choose for them animate right along with them! After beautifying your ponies, you can watch them trot around the forest, or explore the forest's majestic scenery for yourself. Toddlers enjoy customizing each pony to their liking with the intuitive dress up menus. Kids also love the treasure hunt aspect of this game. All of this makes "My Fairy Pony" so much more than just another dressup app. You can customize your ponies with many different styles and colors, including: * Body colors * Hairstyles * Pony tail styles, * Unicorn horns * Eyelashes * Shoes * Wings * Eye colors * Cutie marks * 200 dress up items, which make thousands and thousands of combinations! Since you can dress up your ponies anywhere in the forest, the gorgeous backgrounds are never the same twice. Like living pony dolls, these little pony girls will pose in your awesome outfits and amazing styles that you pick out for them, in a beautiful setting! They're like the barbie dolls of ponies! No irritating in-app purchases or ads. Just pure pony goodness. Little girls can unleash their inner pony princess and even guys can unleash their inner brony with this pony discovery and dress up game. While the ponies of Fairy Pony Forest are unique, you can dress them up to resemble some of your favorite my little pony characters such as Princess Celestia, Rainbow Dash, Twilight Sparkle, Fluttershy, Rarity, Apple Jack, and Pinkie Pie. ABOUT TegTap Search “TegTap” on Google Play and discover more fun apps for young kids. TegTap’s games are always exciting, interactive, colorful, and stimulating. No personal data whatsoever is collected by any of TegTap's apps. Join our Facebook Page: www.facebook.com/TegTap Follow us on Twitter: @TegTap Relevant Keywords: pony, ponies ,little ponies, little pony, fairy, fairies, princess, princesses, little, girl, toddler, baby, babies, pretty, dressup, dress up, dress, my, unicorn, magic, game, wings, fly, makeup, make up, horse, horses, horsies, pet, pretty, picture, forest, treasure hunt, hidden, beauty, cute, brush, hair

description: 360 degree gravity platforming is back! Run, jump, collect, avoid enemies and feed yourself to the monster at the end! "They Need To Be Fed" is a platformer game in which you can walk in all directions: 360 degree gravity ensures you can never fall off. The series has received very positive reviews so far, and is even bigger now! What people said about They Need To Be Fed 2: "They Need To Be Fed 2 is a near-perfect mobile platformer. [...] an incredibly satisfying experience." - Kotaku 4/5 - Touch Arcade 9/10 - Arcadelife Must Have - Slide To Play Hopefully they'll say the same about part 3! They Need To Be Fed 3 is bigger, better, smoother. Levels are generally bigger as well, with more secrets and more things to collect. Features * 360 degree gravity * 7 exciting worlds * Over 50 hand-crafted levels * 200+ diamonds to collect * Smooth, slick visual style * Epic mode * Adventure mode (separate game) * 40 achievements * Collect secret golden beans * Unlock special "x" levels * Groovy soundtrack by Jake Almond Epic Mode ========= In addition to the regular game, there is Epic Mode in which you can play the levels again but upside down, and full of new dangers. Not for beginners... NEW Adventure Mode ================== Adventure Mode is an entirely separate game mode with interconnected areas you can explore. You get help from various creatures to travel further into a mysterious world. It is more easy-going and has a great ambient background track. Perfect for relaxing in between the regular levels! Go ahead and feed yourself to the monsters!

description: Over 20 million people use Bloglovin' to discover and read blogs in fashion, food, DIY and more! Never miss any posts again, whether you're reading at home or on the go. Bloglovin' is the best way to read blogs on your phone; it's faster and more fun! Bloglovin' helps you to keep up with your favorite bloggers like The Sartorialist and Cashmere & Cupcakes for fashion, Smitten Kitchen for food, and millions more. Bloglovin' has every kind of blog you’d want to read, whether its a Wordpress, Blogger or Tumblr blog. - Follow all of your favorite blogs and see all of their posts in a beautiful feed - Discover new blogs and bloggers through both social and curated channels - Save posts, fashion trends, inspiration for your home, and food styling ideas into collections for reading later - And much more! Whatever your passions may be, discover the best blogs for your interests. Read and get inspiration from top fashion, food, DIY, home decor and fitness bloggers. Our community loves us: "Reading made easy; like that it helps me track what's unread. And posts are made mobile screen friendly. My current #1 blog reading list." "I just love it! description: Battle demons and undead attorneys, and win souls to pay back your student loans! At the elite demonic-law firm of Varkath Nebuchadnezzar Stone, you'll depose a fallen god, find romance, and maybe even make partner, if you don't lose your own soul first. "Choice of the Deathless" is a necromantic legal thriller by Max Gladstone, Campbell Award-nominated author of "Three Parts Dead" and "Two Serpents Rise." The game is entirely text-based--without graphics or sound effects--and powered by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination. • Explore a fantasy realm with a rich and evolving backstory, based on the novels published by Tor Books. • Play as male or female, gay or straight, dead or alive (or both). • Build your career on carefully reasoned contracts, or party all night with the skeletal partners at your firm. • Navigate intrigue and mystery in a world of scheming magicians and devious monsters. • Look for love in at least some of the right places. • Balance student loans, sleep, daily commute, rent payments, and demonic litigation—hey, nobody said being a wizard was always fun. Note: You can play the first part of the game for free. (Beware, it ends on a cliffhanger!) You can purchase the rest of the game inside the app; purchasing the rest of the game will also turn off in-game advertisements.

description: This ProKey unlocks Pro feature of Outgoing Call Blocker ProKey How to use: - Once you install this key, you should restart USB in order to recognize the key. If it does not still recognize it, please restart your phone and try again - You should'n uninstall the key or revert to free version What is Outoging call blocker? Outgoing Call Blocker supports to filter outgoing calls ☆ Prohibit outgoing call for selected numbers ☆ Password confirmation before making outgoing call for selected numbers ☆ Confirm receiver before for making outgoing call for selected numbers More features: ☆ Lock outgoing call with passcode ☆ Spell out recipient names ☆ Confirmation dialog with two mode: simple (name, photo, number) & detail (simple mode plus call/sms logs ☆ Shake to confirm Important notes - Special numbers accepts exact numbers or a startWith (such as country code), endWith , contain , or do not contain , - Code may be enabled in three levels: all numbers, numbers in phonebook, or special numbers - Detail view mode will add latest sms and call logs, send SMS button to simple view mode, - Bluetooth on bypass intercepting considers only bluetooth radio status, not bluetooth device, - Speak notification works on some common languages (defined in the list), not all, - Shake to confirm also request correct code.

description: WebAccess gives you easy access to your LinkStation or TeraStation from anywhere. Access terabytes of storage directly from your Android device! Features: - File streaming: play terabytes of photos, videos, and music from anywhere, anytime. - File download: save files on your Android from your LinkStation or TeraStation. Before a long flight, download movies and music and enjoy them in the air. - File upload: upload your photo and video files to your LinkStation or TeraStation without any concern for the storage capacity on your Android device. - File sharing: easily share files from your LinkStation or TeraStation with your friends and family. - Photo slideshow: automatic photo playback makes your Android a photo frame. Enjoy your photo albums anywhere. - SSL support (Android 4.0 or later): encrypted communication ensures confidentiality and message integrity. Supported models : The following LinkStation series are supported with firmware version 1.00 or later. - LS200 Series - LS400 Series The following LinkStation series are supported with firmware version 1.26 or later (version 1.34 or later is recommended). - LS-AVL Series - LS-CHL Series - LS-QVL Series - LS-SL Series - LS-VL Series - LS-WSXL Series - LS-WVL Series - LS-WXL Series - LS-XHL Series - LS-XL Series The following TeraStation series are supported with firmware version 1.00 or later. - TS-6VHL Series - TS-8VHL Series - TS-QVHL Series - TS-RVHL Series - TS-WVHL Series - TS3000 Series - TS4000 Series - TS5000 Series - TS-2RZ Series The following TeraStation series are supported with firmware version 1.32 or later. - TS-RXL Series - TS-WXL Series - TS-XEL Series - TS-XHL Series - TS-XL Series Notes: AirStation NAS is not supported. Some NAS icons are not available in the app, but you can still access files and data from the NAS. Images taken while automatic uploading is active may not be uploaded. In such a case, wait until automatic uploading finishes and re-take the picture. The saved picture will be uploaded in during the next automatic upload session.
release_text: - LS220DB and TS1200D are now supported. - Modified the mechanism for selecting files for automatic uploading. - Fixed a bug where the BuffaloNAS.com name could not be entered. - Fixed a bug where a shared link could not be registered. - Modified to show an error message when deleting downloaded files. - Fixed a bug where resuming download failed if the half-downloaded file did not exist. - Modified the default image size to original size when manually uploading. - Made other minor changes.
