description: This is the official Pittsburgh Penguins Mobile app. Make your Android phone a unique part of your game-day experience for Penguins games. Want to catch breaking news of the team? See real-time statistics? Watch video-on-demand clips of press conferences and player interviews? Follow post-game recaps and pre-game previews of the matchups? Now, you can stay in touch with the Penguins anytime, anywhere, on your Android phone. And, with one click, you can spread the word--tweet, or post to facebook, any media item from the app! Features include: - NEWS: Real-time breaking news from the Pens, previews of upcoming matchups, recaps of previous games - MEDIA: News, photos, video-on-demand clips of press conferences and player interviews, audio podcasts, organized by date - HD RADIO: Live streaming 24x7x365 Penguins HD Radio - STATS: Real-time statistics and scores from the official NHL stats engine, head-to-head live stats of game, player stats, box scores - STANDINGS: Division and conference standings - ICE TRACKER: Real-time visualization of the ice rink, viewable by shots, penalties, goals and saves - SOCIAL MEDIA: Aggregated twitter of all of your favorite Pens tweeters - DIGITAL KEEPSAKE: Your game-time moment superimposed on the Consol Energy Center jumbotron in the form of a unique digital keepsake - SCHEDULE: Schedule of upcoming games, scores/stats of previous games, ticket purchases - CLOSED CAPTIONING: Closed-captioning text simultaneously visible on the live video feed Follow us @yinzcam on Twitter for updates or to ask questions and provide feedback. Developed by YinzCam, Inc.

description: Learn the numbers from one to five with this easy to learn counting song. The song and animation stop at the end of each verse and you can use a switch or touch the screen to play the next verse. Clear graphics, which include the numbers and words to sing along with and high quality voice over to encourage correct pronunciation of the number names. The follow-up activities give lots of opportunities to see numbers and hear number names. • Counting up – touch the screen or press a switch to count up to five. • Count along number line – errorless activity using touch or switch to count to five with clear visual and auditory feedback for numbers and number names. • This set of activities is an enjoyable way to help a child become familiar with numbers from one to five. • Works with touch or single or two switch scanning. • Use a switch with any currently available Android switch interface.

description: Here comes Callist! Did you remember that your smartphone is also a phone? Well, Callist is here to remind you of that. ★★★★★ Callist V3.0 is out with a brand new design and scheduled reminders feature! Check it out for FREE! ★★ The basics ★★ - You can keep a list of the people you want and need to talk to (don't worry, Callist will help you with that list) - Schedule call reminders, add notes and repetitions - Add to, delete from and organise your Callist with simple touch gestures - Call, text and email your favorite contacts and contacts you recently talked to But Callist is not a regular Calls Manager... here comes the COOL stuff! ★★ After call popups ★★ Had a missed call or you could not reach someone? Callist will show you a popup from which you can easily: - Add a call reminder directly into your Callist (Can be done automatically, if you'd like) - Add a call reminder - Call that contact back - Send a text, email or open a Whatsapp conversation - NEW! Added "Quick Text Messages": easy to send predefined messages - Call someone else - your Callist is a click away - You can choose exactly which popups you want Callist to show you from the app's settings window ★★ Home screen Widgets! ★★ There is no need to search for contacts in a contacts app anymore: - You can add a widget that gives you easy access to favorite contacts and your Callist (Call,Text,Email,open Whatsapp) - We have a small and handy widget for adding contacts to your Callist, opening the dialer or choosing and calling a contact. ★★ No Ads ★★ Callist is just getting started, and we want you to have the best and non-intrusive user experience. So, we have no ads what so ever. Enjoy! ★★ Permissions explained ★★ We want you to feel comfortable installing Callist, so we wanted to explain why we need each permission: - "Phone calls (directly call phone numbers)" - our app and widget let you call contacts directly with no hassle - "Phone calls (read phone status and identity)" - allows us to know when to show you our awesome after call popups - "Your personal information (modify your contacts)" - used to allow you to edit your favorite contacts from within Callist - "Your personal information (read call log, read your contacts)" - being used to know which contacts to recommend to you and to show you contacts' information - "Network communication (full network access and view network connections)" - a lot of basic android features require internet connection + analytics (NO private data is tracked) - "System tools - run at startup" - allows callist to add your reminders after restarting your phone - "Hardware controls - control vibration" - for vibrating when getting a Callist notification There is a lot more fun stuff, so what are you waiting for? Your Callist awaits!
release_text: ★★★★★ To Callist's awesome users: If you like Callist - it would be GREAT if you could rate it, and share it with your friends :) ★★★★★ V3.0.2.2 - improves "schedule reminder" screen UI - added reminder repeat option - once a day V3.0.2.1 - small bug fixes V3.0.2 - new "smart suggestions" feature for adding Callist reminders - new "delete reminder" button in Callist tab - added a Snooze options to reminder notifications - fixed non-saved contacts reminder bug V3.0.1 - small bug fixes

description: Measure your surrounding sounds using just your mobile's microphone and compare the results on a realtime chart. The circular meter displays the live sound level in Decibels and changes its color according to the measured value: Green: Quiet range Blue: Low sound range Orange: Medium sound range Red: High sound range Pinch to zoom in and out of the realtime chart and slide your finger to move across the measured values history. Note: Due to the limitations set by most Android phone manufacturers, the built in microphone will not detect sounds higher than 80 Decibels (90 Decibels on certain models). Disclaimer: This tool is not valid as a replacement to a real sound meter device and therefore, should not be used in critical situations. The mobile's microphone is not an industrially accurate sound measurement device and might produce incorrect and incompatible values with different environments and situations.

Il banner a fondo applicazione è di terze parti; l'autore non ne ha possibilità di controllo e non ne percepisce alcun provento. Utilizzando alcuni antivirus per android mobile potrebbe essere rilevato nell'applicazione un Adware: Hamob.A@Android (codice nel banner a fine schermo). In effetti si tratta di un falso positivo che alcuni antivirus rilevano ma non si tratta né di un virus né di un adware. Infatti non produce alcuna azione tipica di questa famiglia di adware come per esempio apertura indesiderata di finestre popup pubblicitarie o altro. In ogni caso potete installare l'applicazione in tutta tranquillità e non avrete mai nessun problema di sicurezza o di violazione dei vostri dati. NOVITA' La nuova app "Erbe Officinali e Medicinali +" -uguale in tutto a questa- non ha il banner di terze parti a fondo schermo. Gli iscritti come soci o contribuenti non visualizzeranno alcun banner pubblicitario. Si consiglia quindi di installare quest'ultima realizzazione gratuita dallo Store Google play. --------------------------------------------- Per comunicare direttamente con l'autore ed avere risposta, inviare email esclusivamente dalla pagina predisposta sulla app o dal sito all'indirizzo https://www.erbeofficinali.org/email.php Grazie. HANDBOOK ENCYCLOPAEDIC WITH OVER 560 MEDICINAL PLANTS COLLECTED IN CARDS SEARCHES - Names of plants - Blooms - Colour of flowers - Diseases, Properties and therapeutic indications (over 900 entries) - Biological Components - Human organs to treat affected by a pathology (over 160 entries) - Plants honey - Food Plants - Searches free MONOGRAPHS - Olive oil - Tea tree oil - Argan - Klamath - Mangosteen - Stevia - Obesity and Diabetes - Omega 3 - Power - Intolerance and Allergies - Nutrigenomics Pharmacopoeia - Compositions official HERBAL COMPOSITIONS - Herbal teas combined with each herb - List of available formulations (members) - Compositions to be realized personally (members) FREE SERVICES - Offers and demands of working in the world of natural - News scientific in real time IMPORTANT You should read the guide ('Help' at the bottom of each page) and the tips on 'how to' contextual to search pages marked with a red question mark inside a button. --------------------------------------------- WARNINGS ON BANNER INCLUDED: The app is free, so there are two advertisements. The banner at the bottom of the application is a third party; the author does not have ability to control and does not receive any income. Using some antivirus for Android Mobile could be detected in the application an Adware: Hamob.A@Android (code in the banner at the end of the screen). In fact it is a false positive that some antivirus detect but it is neither a virus nor a adware. In fact it does not produce any action typical of this family of adware such as undesired opening of pop-up ads or other. In any case, you can install the application in peace and you will never have any problem or security breach of your data. NEWS ' The new app "Medicinal Herbs and Medicinal +" -uguale around to this- does not have the banner of third parties to bottom screen. Members as shareholders or taxpayers will not see any banner ad. You are advised to install this realization free from Google Play Store. --------------------------------------------- To communicate directly with the author and have answer, send email only from page prepared on the app or the website at https://www.erbeofficinali.org/email.php Thank you.

description: ♪More than 2 million Japanese women use Lalune♪ ★Start by simply entering the date of your last menstruation, and you will be able to check the date of your next menstruation, your day of ovulation, and the time during the month you are most likely to successfully conceive♪ ★Check your body condition now! Answer simple questions that Lalune provides, and you will be able to check your stress levels, how relationship-dependent you are, and whether you are in the early stages of pregnancy for FREE! ★Women-only community! Lalune provides a relaxed community exclusive to women, where they can come to discuss and give each other advice about relationships, dieting, health, pregnancy, and a wide range of other delicate topics! 《Why use Lalune?》 ●Do you want to know what time during the month you can more easily get pregnant? Simply enter in the date of your last menstruation and Lalune will inform you of the period during the month when your body can conceive. Also, Lalune will give you a brief explanation of your body's status every day. For women that are trying to conceive, or those who want to avoid pregnancy, simply log in to Lalune and check your status! ●Am I pregnant? Minor changes that occur in your body could be early signs of pregnancy. Answer simple questions from Lalune and get a clearer picture of whether you are actually pregnant! ●Do you want to know when the best time to diet is? The best time for you to diet is linked to your menstrual cycle. Lalune provides information regarding dieting that is tailored for you. The information is accessible on your "home page", so you can easily check when to diet and when to indulge yourself. ●Do you often go through stages where you feel up and stages where you feel down? During your menstrual cycle there are times when you will feel at your best and times when you won't feel like doing anything at all. Lalune provides advice regarding your health and body condition based on your menstrual cycle. Make sure to login every day and check the advice tailored to you! ●Have something on your mind you would like to discuss with other women? Lalune offers an anonymous women-only community where you can come to freely discuss relationships, health and fitness, dieting, beauty, and a whole range of other topics. 《List of Lalune Features》 ★Estimate of your next menstruation ★Estimate of the time you are most likely to get pregnant ★Simple body condition check-up ★Women-only community! Lalune's vision At Lalune, we continually strive to fulfill our vision of "easing the minds of all women". Please send any comments or requests you may have to the following address: support-en@lalu.jp Thank you for taking the time to read this description. We look forward to seeing you in Lalune!

description: 유아놀이앱 Play 똥깨비는 아이들이 다양하고 간단한 놀이를 통해 재미와 학습을 동시에 할 수 있도록 구성된 앱입니다. 아이들에게 친숙한 동물, 캐릭터를 사용하여 재미와 흥미를 쉽게 접할 수 있도록 하였습니다. 유아놀이앱 Play 똥깨비는 간단한 놀이 5종 / 색칠놀이 1종 / 사진놀이 1종 이 모두 하나의 App.에서 실행되도록 구성되었습니다. (App. 용량 관계로 놀이의 경우 다운로드 처리됩니다.) ◆ 메뉴별 안내 ① 간단한 놀이 5종 아이들이 손쉽게 접할 수 있도록 제작된 놀이 앱 5종을 제공합니다. description: La aplicación de la Cadena COPE para Android te permitirá escuchar la emisión en directo desde donde estés. Podrás leer las noticias del portal www.cope.es, escuchar y ver los audios y videos de tus programas favoritos, y recibir notificaciones cuándo éstos comiencen. Desarrollada por Cristaliza http://www.cristaliza.com Applying Cope for Android lets you listen to the live broadcast from wherever you are. description: Steam Pipes is a Puzzle Game where you have a limited time to build a path with Pipes from the Start to the Arrival. Prepare to spend some time on more than 700 levels split in 3 rooms, in a game graphically inspired by the Steam Punk culture. On each level, the time depends on the difficulty mode selected. There are 3 difficulty modes : - Easy : Plenty of time on each levels. - Normal : Best mode if you are used to play Puzzle game and you like some challenge. - Hard : You have to unlock this one, on each room. Very challenging mode, only for the best players. The liquid starts to flow when the time is over. Keep in mind that you don't lose when the time is over, but only when the liquid can't go any further and haven't reached the Arrival. Furthermore, to keep the challenge intact, when you retry a level, it will be probably flipped or returned. Have Fun :) And I want to sincerely thanks for the musics : Menu's music : "Winter Walk" by spinningmerkaba ( http://dig.ccmixter.org/dig?user=jlbrock44 ) Level's music : "ukeSounds" by airtone ( http://dig.ccmixter.org/dig?user=airtone )

description: We bring you extremely fun physics based stunt game on Android! * Experience the evolution of becoming the greatest stuntman in the world. * Make it big in the stunt show business and don't back down even from the most dangerous of stunts and jumps. * Take yourself to your limits and beyond by facing the challenges of physics bending stunts. * Collect coins to upgrade your equipment to enable the biggest and most entertaining feats ever attempted. * Rise from the bottom as an promising up-and-comer to true stardom. * As a stunt man it's trial and error that counts Features: * Different and fun stunts with amazing obstacles and multiple goals in each level. * Smooth and intuitive controls. * Earn 3 stars on each track to brag to your friends. This game is suitable for all girls and boys of all ages. Install and play "Fail Hard" – for free on Android now! Like us at Facebook and stay tuned with all new games and updates: http://www.facebook.com/Fingersoft We'd appreciate if you'd report any issues you're having with the game to support@fingersoft.net , please include your device make and model. Fail Hard is developed by Viima Games Ltd. and published by Fingersoft Ltd.

description: Volume Booster is a native app which will increase your overall sound by 15-30% depending on your device. Rather than the rest boosters, Volume Booster adjusts your Android eQualizer via sophisticated algorithm in order to increase the sound. Simply press the Boost button, sit down and relax and let the app do the work for you. Features: * System - Adjusting the volume level of your system. * Media - Adjusting the volume level of your media. * Notifications - Adjusting the volume level of your notifications. It works for both speakers and headphones. You will also discover a significant difference in your ringer, alarm and voice call level. Disclaimer: This app will NOT damage your speakers. This app doesn't have viruses and will NOT damage your phone! Advertising Policy Disclosure: We love creating apps, and want to keep them free forever. In order to keep our development running, Volume Booster is ad-supported to generate some revenue. When you click on advertisements delivered by Volume Booster, you will typically be directed to a third-party’s web page.

description: What triggered the Trojan War? Did you know that at Thermopylae only 299 Spartans died, not 300? Which famous philosopher was Alexander the Great’s tutor? Show how much you know and learn with Genius - History of Greece! Discover the history of ancient Greece, the cradle of our culture, from its legendary origins in Crete, Troy and Mycenae, to the glory of classical Athens and the empire of Alexander the Great. Answer the questions correctly and learn about the key political, cultural and artistic events in a civilization that created philosophy, democracy and classical art. • The origins of Greek culture: Minoans and Mycenaeans • The birth of the polis • Athens and the classical era • Alexander the Great and the Hellenistic world • Greek Mythology In the answer to each question, you will find an explanation rich in interesting information that will allow you to learn about the History of ancient Greece while having fun. • Test your knowledge with the trivia game • Learn with the detailed explanations for each answer • Share questions and answers with your friends • Excel in each level so you become a Pentakosiomedimnoi With Genius – History of Greece, learning becomes a game. Discover it.

description: Telekom aplikacija je vaš lični prostor sa različitim sadržajima: provjera stanja na računu, plaćanje računa, aktivacija usluga, prijava problema... Sve je tu, na jednom mjestu! I uvijek pri ruci. Telekom aplikacija radi za vas i omogućava vam ležerno korišćenje naših usluga. Tu možete dobiti informacije, podršku i servise. Sve što vam je potrebno – gdje god da se nalazite. - novo iz Telekoma - pregled trenutne potrošne, po uslugama - pregled plaćenih računa, 6 mjeseci unazad - pregled neplaćenih računa - plaćanje računa - dopuna prepaid računa - pregled aktivnih usluga - aktivacija/deaktivacija dodatnih usluga i opcija - prijava problema u radu servisa - pronalaženje T-Centara, T-Partnera i besplatnih Telekom hotspot lokacija na mapi - Telekom profili na društvenim mrežama - Telekom Blog feed Nalogu možete pridružiti sve vaše Telekom brojeve telefona. - Novi dizajn - Nova tehnologija - Unaprijeđen korisnički interfejs - Brži i komforniji rad - Integracija sa Telekom Blogom

description: This is a simple calendar widget where the month view and today's agenda are combined together. It gives you a good overview of your events at hand in your home screen. PLEASE NOTE: This is a trial version with NO TIME LIMIT . After 7 days, you will be asked to buy the license key to unlock more options and support further development. But you could continue use this app for free as long as you want until you decide to buy it or not. ALSO NOTE: It is NOT a calendar app. It's only a widget. To make it work you should add it on your home screen (like on the screenshots). Features: • Synced with Google calendars • Shows markers for dates with events • Shows today's agenda • Shows week numbers (optional) • Opens default calendar app by taping on date • Beautiful and clean design • Looks similar to HTC Calendar Widget (from HTC Sense) The app still in BETA stage and may be not perfectly stable, so if you are getting problems or have any ideas, please let me know at calendar@itbenefit.com . Don't forget to rate and comment it if you like it :-)
release_text: • Now event mark color may be different for different calendars. To enable option go to Widget settings -> Appearance -> Event mark (available after license purchase). • Other minor improvements and bugfixes

description: Did you know that the human body produces its own supply of alcohol naturally on a continuous basis, 24 hours a day, seven days a week? Did you know that the world's oldest known recipe is for beer? The app allows you to browse through a huge collection of Fun Facts, over 5000 facts. Stuff that you always wanted to know about! ================================= Fun Facts Categories ================================= Animal Facts Business Facts Celebrity Facts Christmas Facts Computer Facts Country Facts Fart Facts Food and Drink Facts Funny Facts Geographical Facts Health Facts Historical Facts Interesting Facts Language Facts Law and Crime Facts Obama Facts People Facts Politics Facts Religion Facts Science Facts Space Facts Sports Facts Superstitions Technology Facts TV Facts Weather Facts Weird Facts Weird Laws ================================== Can publish on Facebook with single click. Sharing messages with your friends easier than previous versions. Features ================================== - Over 500 images to make your Facebook profile look even better - Add facts to your favorites, to create a personal collection of your favorite facts - Simply amazing graphic content to share on Facebook and WhatsApp - Ramdom button to view the most popular content on random - Copy fact content and paste in your favorite chat/messaging app - Search option to find that perfect fact fast - Can schedule facts to be posted on Facebook - Featured categories with daily updates - New images added each day and pushed to your mobile by choice - Option to view only unread/new facts only - In-app Feedback to request all the features you want to see - Post directly to Facebook and WhatsApp! - Submit ideas from within the app to help us make your favorite app even better - Vote from within the app to help our team create similar content for you - In-App support forum with solutions to most common issues and quick how-to guides - Option to report content you wish to get removed or improved from within the app - Turn any fact to Cool Characters before you publish on Facebook - Can choose to be notified from one to five times per day. By default if one, you can choose to upto five notification per day. - Option to be notified when your Facebook status is updated by the app - Swipe to browse the facts, in addition to left and right buttons - Option to browse images only, case you love graphic content - Swipe remove a fact from scheduled Facebook posts - Option to Sign Out from Facebook, case you do not want to publish content anymore - Option to turn notification on or off by choice - Fun Facts Widgets have been added in the latest version. Try putting one on your home screen.
release_text: Leaderboard stats on application start screen Pager Navigation to Jump Content Performance Improved Featured content slider on start screen Can submit your own content Can view featured facts from last few days Can save image to your device now Can edit message content before posting on Facebook Users can choose to receive one to five notifications per day

description: This action packed space shooter combines 8 artistically magical 3D worlds, superb controls, challenging enemies, upgradable weapons, and futuristic sound effects to make for a truly immersive gaming experience. Whether playing with natural-feeling tilt and touch controls or console-feeling Moga Controllers, the controls in Solar Warfare do not disappoint! Dive into futuristic combat and navigate through a variety of supernatural landscapes while piloting your starship with intuitive, precise tilt controls. The clean interface allows you to press anywhere on the right side of the screen to rapid fire your main weapon, and press anywhere on the left side to hover. The hovering feature adds a whole new dimension to the game, as you can shoot enemies and dodge their fire without needing to fly past them. Enemies are all tracked in the real-time radar. Low altitude cruising through detailed close-up terrain sets this game apart from other third-person shooting games. The game play in Solar Warfare lends to up close and personal battles with enemies, and intense slot canyon flying. Though the controls make you feel like you're air borne, this game is much more than a flight simulator - you also need to eradicate an army of hostiles in each world. Collect coins throughout the game to buy new weapons, upgrade existing weapons, buy stronger shields, buy seeking missiles, and buy revive kits. There is an option to purchase coins within the app for those who just can't wait to own their very own Obliterator. Or you can just save up for all your upgrades by collecting coins in each level. Each of the 5 main guns is upgradable, with upgrade behavior unique to each weapon. Each shield has unique characterstics as well. Try the seeker missiles for some real fire and forget fun. Stock up on revive kits to continue right where your ship died. Each of the 8 worlds you explore and cleanse of various hostiles with various behaviors is unique, and simply beautiful. Destroy enemy fighters, jets, space craft, tanks, turrets, airplanes, and more. A different boss at the end of each level is sure to satiate your thirst for epic battles. You play the hero in modern star wars type science fiction combat, using your space ship to reclaim the galaxy by destroying all of the space invaders. The scenery in Solar Warfare, from space stations, to lush floating mountains, to ice planets, to desert terrain, to asteroid belts and everything in between this sci-fi galaxy's solar halo is detailed and unique. The graphics are great and the FPS is high in this interstellar combat game. With alien robot exploding laser guns and missiles, Solar Warfare is an exciting space shooting adventure that’s sure to keep you engaged and well entertained. So, soldier - duty calls. Go shoot some bad guys. If you like games like StarFox, Star Wars, Arc Squadron, Radiant, Galaga, R-Type, Tyrian, Sky Force, Metal Storm, AirAttack, 1942, 1943, Star Battalion, Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance, Siberian Strike, iFighter, Air Strike, Flying Shark, DoDonPachi Gradius, Espgaluda, Swiv, Asteroids, Shogun, Bullet Shooter, Warblade, and any other shoot 'em up, you'll love this game!

description: Finally, the bible of bodyweight exercises can be kept in the palm of your hand! Based on the best selling book by Mark Lauren, the bodyweight exercises in this app have been used to create society’s leanest, strongest, most confident people. Mark honed his program for a decade while preparing nearly a thousand soldiers for the extreme demands of the most elite levels of the U.S. Special Operations. Use this mobile companion to reference over 200 different body weight exercises! Need to spice up your workouts? Mark Lauren's proven training techniques are now available to you in the form of timers for Tabatas, Supersets, Stappers, Interval Sets, and Ladders. Let Mark Lauren guide you through workouts and tell you exactly when to workout and when to rest. Get into shape with as little as 30 minutes a day! The app installs with a comprehensive photo library of over 200 different bodyweight exercises. By installing the FREE 'YAYOG Video Pack' app from Google Play you get access to high quality video of Mark demonstrating every exercise. The video plays during workouts to help you keep your form as you exercise. This app also integrates with the 'Mark Lauren's DVD' series of apps on Google Play (available to purchase separately) to give you access to full video workouts. The warm-up and cool down videos are available for FREE, the circuits, timed sets and ladders packs are available as separate purchases at three different difficulty levels (Novice, Intermediate and Advanced). ** PERMISSIONS ** The app requires microphone and record audio permission for the new voice recognition feature that is available for evaluation in this version of the app. You can choose to run variable set ladders using voice commands (higher, lower) to increase and decrease reps, rather than pressing buttons on screen. ** PERMISSIONS ** We are continually updating and improving the app so stay tuned for more updates. You can keep up to date with development on the YAYOG app for Android through the 'YAYOG Android App Beta' community on Google+. There you can also sign up to the beta testing program to receive the latest beta test version automatically on your device via Google Play.
release_text: Thanks to everyone who gave us feedback and ideas for the app - please keep telling us what you think. v2.12 includes: New landscape mode for tablets Information button in workout screens to go to exercise details Bug fixes and video improvements EFX DVD integration 20 minute limit on workout builder stappers

description: Tired of Facebook not getting the attention it deserves on Android? HaxSync is the solution! It provides perfect integration of Facebook data with your Android device. Here are just some examples of what it does: • High-resolution contact images synchronized from Facebook. (up to 720x720 pixels on Jelly Bean!) Uses face-detection to get the cropping just right. • Synchronization of Facebook Events (including attendee lists!) into your device's calendar, including (optional) reminders. To top it off, every feature is highly configurable and can be disabled if unwanted. Don't like the way HaxSync cropped one of your contact images? Crop it yourself using the Contacts Manager. Want a different color for your calendars? Feel free to change it! HaxSync is being actively developed, with new features and bugfixes arriving on a regular basis. If you have problems/suggestions, please post here instead of giving a bad rating (I can't answer your market ratings, so I can't help you with your problem): https://redmine.limun.org/projects/haxsync/wiki/How_to_report_an_issue If you're wondering about the permissions HaxSync uses and what it needs them for, take a look here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Al4pTgdMpp-ndHRBUER1WFVtNzVZVVYwWG1OSDJqalE#gid=0
release_text: Fixed event sync Contact Manager now also uses Graph API -> No more outdated or low-res pictures! Added workaround notification on Samsung devices. Various bugfixes and stability enhancements

description: Looking for some nice lullaby songs to lull your baby and get her to sleep? Try French Lullabies, a free music app including some of the best good night songs for French children! Download this relaxing baby music free from the market and you'll be delighted to see your chidren fall asleep in no time! Top three soothing lullabies for Android! More lullabies in the update! Perfect sound quality! This beautiful, free and sleeping app will help an infant sleep like an angel Set the time interval or let it sing constantly until your child falls asleep! "How do I get a baby to sleep" is a question that will never pop in your mind again! Your heart may swell with love when you watch your baby sleeping. She looks so sweet and innocent. Your heart may race however, when you can’t get her to stay asleep all night or at times when you really want her to. Don't worry – 'French Lullabies' are here to solve your problems! Just play 'Frère Jacques' or “Au clair de la Lune” on your mobile phone every night and watch your baby falls into a deep slumber in no time. A crying baby sound will remain just an unpleasant memory for all parents. Lullabies are often sung by parents in calming babies, putting them to sleep, or simply spending time with them. The simple lyrics, nature, and storyline of lullabies are usually intended for children, and are therefore suitable for them. A parent can rock a child to sleep with a lullaby, calm a discontented child, or sing along with a playing child. Instrumental lullaby songs for babies are also good because the rhythm and the soothing sounds make them sleep longer, thus they are well rested. There are other types of lullabies which we are used to but instrumental lullabies are the best for babies. Download French Lullabies for your mobile phone and your kids will love these calming and soothing sounds to sleep to. 'Fais dodo' is probably one of the best French good night songs for kids. Play this baby lullaby to your kids every night and they will adore it. Children benefit emotionally when they and their primary caregiver have an opportunity to focus on one another. Lullabies for babies allow the singer to express her love to the child on a very intimate level and the child can focus on the singer in a peaceful and undistracted manner. Singing also provides comfort and reassurance to babies. Music in itself is calming but music coming from the primary caregiver can stop a baby from crying, and can sometimes comfort them even when they are the most distraught. Legal info: ===== This is a free app for Android phones. Songs are originally designated to lull a child to sleep and they are believed to be in a public domain. If you are an author of a song or you are aware that copyright belongs to a commercial author, please report to us immediately. Thank you!

description: C-Calc is a calculator application designed by, and for construction workers or anyone else who works with measurements in feet and inches. C-Calc is a full function calculator that works as a standard calculator but more importantly allows you to work in feet, inches, fractional inches, meter, centimetres, and millimetres. Features include; - add, subtract, multiply, divide, power, root, and more with measurements in feet, inches, and fractional inches - reduce fractions and fractional inches to their lowest common denominator - full memory feature including add, subtract, set, recall, and clear - split screen shows decimal value, feet/inch value, memory, and settings all at once in large easy to read fonts - calculate square and cubic footage easily - full instructions and video tutorial available at www.snappyappz.com

description: "Spectral Souls - Resurrection of the Ethereal Empires" (English Version), the first Full Size Tactical RPG for Android platform available for your favorite Smartphone : * 3D Battle Scenes. * The first full scale Japanese Tactical RPG for Android. * 52 outstanding soundtracks. * 84 characters. * High resolution graphic assets. * 100's of hours of GamePlay packed in 1GB data. * Cut-Scene videos. * Support for Touch & Keyboard with key mapping. * Compatible with MOGA controllers. * Play it on NVIDIA SHIELD. Simply "a must have" for all fan of "Spectral Souls universe" and for all fan of Tactical RPG in general. ** IMPORTANT NOTICE PLEASE READ ** -Game is set, by default, to use the HIGHEST resolution available so please adjust in the option screen should your device be a little "just" to support the full hires data. -A High-End device is highly recommended for the best gaming experience however the game is fully enjoyable from Nexus1 or similar type of device. There is a pre-hardware check in the game before allowing the 1GB download so those with hardware not yet supported should be able to refund within the actual refund window. STORY : Neverland is a world apart from our own, home to strange and dangerous creatures. Two of these creatures, humans and demons, have been struggling against each other for many years. As the centuries passed, control shifted from demons to humans and back again. The humans finally earned a clear victory after the First Neverland War. But this left the country in ruins and led directly to the Second Neverland War, which saw the decisive victory of the demons once again. Magic Age 1053— Tragedy strikes the small woodland village of Petun—the town is attacked and burned to the ground by vicious Neverland troops. But Petun is only the first of many massacres; the Demon Army tears through every human village it can find, slaughtering the people as it goes. Humiliated and infuriated by these abuses, the humans begin to resist and fight back. It starts as a rash of disorganized, sporadic riots. But it soon grows into something more, something meaningful. These uprisings become a beacon of hope to all humans, spurring them on to unite and form a new empire. They choose a name to reflect their most noble traditions, to reflect a time when they ruled over the demon horde. They call it the Reformed Simba Empire. Petun—little more than a bump in the road, a mark on a map. But this is where it all started, where the undercurrent of disdain and hatred overflowed into a bloody torrent of death and destruction, drowning Neverland in war for years to come. This is where our story begins—the story of the Seven Year War. - Visit our website and forum at http://www.hyperdevbox.com for more FAQ and information. ©2011-2015 IDEA FACTORY, developed for Android, licensed and published by HYPERDEVBOX .

description: 500 is a popular bid and trick taking card game originating from the USA played by four players in teams of two, with partners sitting opposite each other. It is especially popular in Australia and New Zealand. The game is called 500 because the objective of the game is to be the first team to reach 500 points. Player bid on how many tricks they can take based upon the hand dealt to them and the highest bid gets the chance to win the hand and the points. In this version you have a computer partner playing against two computer opponents. The characteristics of your partner can be configured to suit your style of play. Your partner can be an aggressive bidder, moderate or conservative, as your desire. Other options include - Ability to tailor the playing of Misere - Ability to tailor the rules according to local preferences - Large Card display for smaller screens - Ability to control game speed - Ability to turn on/off game sounds - Option to play 3 or 5 card kitty Here are some tips on playing the game... - Don't forget that when there is a trump suit, the highest trump is the joker , followed by the jack of the trump suit (right bower), the other jack of the same colour (left bower), then Ace, King, Queen, 10, 9, etc. down to 5 or 4.Therefore, if say, hearts are trumps, then the jack of diamonds in considered to be a heart for that hand. If diamonds are trumps, the jack of hearts becomes a diamond, conversely. This does not apply for a No Trumps or Misere Bid, naturally. - The minimum number of tricks that can be bid is six. If you bid say "six hearts", you are saying that with your partner's help, you will try to win at least six tricks with hearts as trumps. How many hearts say would you need to feel confident of making a six hearts bid? There are plenty of thoughts about the bidding process available online, and you need to take the strength of your offsuit into account, ie. do you have many aces?, but as a general guide, perhaps 4 hearts would be a good start. - If you win the bid, you get to pick up kitty, and need to discard any 3 (or 5) cards from the 13 available to you. As a guide, it is often a good idea to try to rid yourself of an offsuit of which you have no high cards, so that if that suit is led by the opposition during the hand, you are in a position to trump them if required. - During play, if you are trying to make a bid, it is often a good idea to try to extract trumps from the opposition early in the hand, so that when it comes to playing your offsuit later, they are not in a position to trump your aces. But if you are trying to stop a bid being made, it is also a good idea to not lead trumps back to the opposition if you can help it, try to keep the precious trumps for trumping offsuit. - When you can't follow the suit that was led, are you aren't looking to trump, you are said to be discarding. You should try to discard a low card from your strongest offsuit first, and your partner will pick up on this and believe that this suit is perhaps the best to lead to you later. For many more tips on all things 500, a good website to visit is http://www.specialksoftware.com/#500 To play 500 online against other people, try... http://www.juliannegiffin.com If you have any issues, please email trowe67@gmail.com and an update may be supplied. Note to Samsung users who can't seem to access any menus, that these can be accessed by long pressing the bottom right "recent apps" button on the device.
release_text: Version 2.8 Some more AI refinements have been added, in order to temper overbidding. Also, the AI in deciding what suit to call the joker when led in No Trumps hands has been refined. There was an issue when rebidding was allowed, but the first three bidders had passed. This has been fixed.

description: Super Security & Antivirus protects your Android mobile phones - from hackers, malware, virus, malicious link and so on. Check your Android phone/tablet and apps security settings and guide you to set your devices and apps properly in a safer configuration against hackers and malicious apps. Manual and automatic scan apps and updates on your Android phones and/or tablet and alert you about suspicious malicious app(s) no matter they are installed or installing. Detect suspicious apps based on attack scenarios or permissions app asked to discover all potential risky apps. URL opening warning to help you stay away from malicious URLs and social engineering hacks via various social network channels - including short message service (SMS), Facebook, Whatsapp, Line, etc. Expanding shortened URL to reveal real destination URL. Don’t need to guess what the shorten URL will lead you to anymore. Super Security & Antivirus FEATURES: * Trendy attacks alerts and explanations * Missed Call attack detection Tech Media "TechCrunch" reported a new kind of scam attack: Missed Call, ringing your smart phone shortly and hanging up immediately to leave you a missed call. If you call these numbers back, you may see some additional charge in your phone bill next month. To protect our users from "Missed Call" attack. We added a new feature that incoming calls hang up within short seconds will be labeled as suspicious phone numbers. These numbers will be sent to server for further analysis and shared with other users if they are recognized as scam numbers. If you try to call these suspicious numbers back, an alert window will pop up to warn you. * Phone and apps security setting checks * Scenario based suspicious apps detection * Permission based suspicious apps detection * URLs opening warning * Expanding shortened URL to reveal real destination URL * Input Method Editors (IME) detection and batch removal. Note: Based on Japanese News agent NHK, some Input Method Editors (IME) have been found that will send certain user inputs back to their server. In this update, a new feature for detecting the installed IME's Internet permission is added to the Scenario-Based Detection. It is suggested to check this IME's privacy policy or its publisher what this permission is used for, and what kind of data will be sent to the internet. *Malware is a general term for malicious software/app - including - Virus: may damage your devices & data - Spyware: may steal your data, such as contacts, photos - Trojan: may remote control your devices for their advantages - and more...and some may even combined different malicious features. Note: *Above mentioned apps/services, such as Facebook, Whatsapp, and Line, are not related to Super Security & Antivirus. They are mentioned for better explaining Super Security & Antivirus features and capabilities. *Advertisements may be served when you use Super Security & Antivirus to support us keep improving the service.

description: Calculatrice hydraulique et aéraulique. Utilitaire de calcul pour le débit, la vitesse et les pertes de charges. Inclus différents matériaux tel que l'acier, le cuivre, le PVC, le Fibair, le plâtre et de l'eau pure et glycolée à différents pourcentages. Permet également de calculer les pertes de charges singulières aérauliques et hydraulique simplement en sélectionnant un élément du réseau en fonction des caractéristiques saisies sur les autres onglets. Permet la sauvegarde sous excel de chaque opération élémentaire saisie afin d'en éditer une note de calcul de l'ensemble.Permet le calcul des caractéristiques d'une CTA à partir des données saisies tel que les températures, hygrométrie et bilan thermique. Hydraulic Calculator and ventilation. Utility for calculating the flow rate and pressure drop. Included different materials such as steel, copper, PVC, Fibair, plaster and pure water and brine in various percentages. Also calculates losses singular pressure ventilation and hydraulic simply selecting a network element according to the characteristics entered on the other tabs. Allows backup excel in each elementary operation input in order to edit a calculation of all. Allows the calculation of the characteristics of CTA from input data such as temperature, humidity and heat balance.

description: Natural Notes is a free digital note book for Android smartphones or tablets. With Natural Notes you can write, store and share your notes. It is a useful application, natural to use and totally free! You can add, edit, delete and share the notes you add. In addition to using this application as a digital note pad, you can use it to compose and save messages that you can then send by email, SMS and with other applications installed on your device. Just write a note and use the "share" feature. You can even write your tweets to Twitter or Facebook messages ... write down everything you need, Natural Notes stores it for when you want to check your notes or send them. Includes backup feature to the MicroSD memory card of your device. Nature Notes is a free application and without ads. Does not connect to the Internet. Added option to open any .txt file on the device with Natural Notes and save it as a note (.txt files you receive via Bluetooth, as an email attach, etc). Added option to install or move the app to the SD card (on Android versions that allow this) New design for large 10 inch HoneyComb tablets Improved portuguese translation. Thank you Bernardo! Improved french translation. Thank you Philippe! Improved style for large non-Honeycomb tablets. Improved translation into Italian and Portuguese. Version 2.9 NEW If there is no title for the note it will set automatically. NEW Improved design on Android Ice Cream and Jelly Bean versions. NEW Added more options to the new Settings screen. NEW Double tap note text to open edit mode. NEW Added option to insert date and time to text or title name on double tap. NEW More control over your backups: you can now choose the folder on your device in the settings screen. NEW Various bug fixes. Your comments and suggestions are welcome at info@naturalapps.com email (we can not reply to comments).
release_text: If there is no title for the note it will set automatically. Improved design on Android Ice Cream and Jelly Bean versions. Added more options to the new Settings screen. More control over your backups: you can now choose the folder on your device in the settings screen. Various bug fixes.

description: Instant Celebrity Makeover is an one-touch photo editing app that lets you try out different celebrity looks. It is simple. It is elegant. It is instant. Try out your favorite celebrity looks with a tap of finger! All you have to do is upload a photo, adjust a few points that define your facial features, and then tap on a celebrity look. Instant Celebrity Makeover is a quick photo editing app that lets you apply makeup as well as the hairstyle of a popular celebrity. When you are happy with your makeover, you can save your new look on your device, email to your friends, and share on Facebook. Our celebrity database is growing everyday and you will be able to update as soon as it becomes available! Some of the celebrity looks include: Kim Kardashian, Selena Gomez, Taylor Swift, Jennifer Aniston, Katy Perry, Miley Cyrus, Rihanna and more! This app is a must have! Try it out today! ★ Celebrity Makeup ★ Each celebrity look comes with a combination of makeup that is visible on them. The type of makeup includes eye shadow, eye liner, mascara, blush, lipstick, lip gloss, lip liner, contour, foundation, and many more. We have a team of makeup artists who perfect the makeup combination for each look. All you have to do is tap on your favorite celebrity look. It is that simple! ★ Celebrity Hairstyles ★ Each celebrity look comes with their hairstyle perfectly cropped for you to try-on. If the hairstyle is not perfectly fitted to your face, you can use one finger to reshape or two fingers to move, zoom, and rotate. If you prefer to not show the hairstyle, there is an option for you to turn on and off the hairstyle. ★ Features ★ ✔ Try on new celebrity looks on your own photo (supports gallery, camera, and Facebook) ✔ 100+ celebrity looks to choose from ✔ State-of-Art facial recognition technology ✔ Before vs. After comparison ✔ Share results with friends and family ★ Quick FAQ ★ Q. Face detection seems very off... A. In order to benefit from our latest facial recognition technology, you must be connected to internet. Q. Face point adjustment is difficult... A. Did you know you don’t have to touch the point to move it? Say you want to move a point on your lip. You don’t have to touch ‘on’ the point. You can simply touch the ‘near-by’ region and drag your finger to move that point. There will be a line drawn from that point to your finger in order to assist you with the process. This should make it easier for you to adjust the point! Q. What do you mean by “Would you like to save this photo as private model”? A: By saving a photo as a model photo, you can access it quickly from your model library. This photo *will not* be shared with anyone else. You can remove this model as well so don’t be afraid to use this feature! Q. I want to know the name of the makeup products I have applied. A. When you choose to share your new look through email, you will have a list of makeup products automatically included in your email body. Some of them will even have links to the products! Q. Where are the photos saved to? A. Saved photos can be found in ModiFace folder here: /mnt/sdcard/Pictures/ModiFace/. ✔ Support: Android 2.2 (Froyo) to Android 4.x (Ice Cream Sandwich & Jelly Bean & KitKat) ✔ Publisher: ModiFace - the Virtual Makeover experts

app_name: アンチエイジング+ダイエットforポケットメディカ
description: ◆◆◆【重要なお知らせ】月額課金方法変更のお知らせ◆◆◆ ポケットメディカアプリのご利用ありがとうございます。 この度、有料機能が開放される月額課金方法がdocomoSPモード決済からGoogle Playのアプリ内課金へ変更になりました。 基本無料である点は今までとかわりございません。 ◆「アンチエイジング＋ダイエット」について◆ 本アプリは、体の若さを保ちならがら健康的なダイエットをサポートするアプリです。 毎日のダイエット記録をつけていくことで、独自の判定方法によって算出される「体年齢」が表示されます。「体年齢」を意識し、基礎代謝を高めるための運動を行いながらダイエットすることで健康的な身体作りができます。 ◆「体年齢」を若くするためのポイント◆ 単に体重のみを落とし、体脂肪率に変化がないと「体年齢」が上がってしまう場合もあります。 「体年齢」を若くするためには「基礎代謝」を高めることです。「基礎代謝」を高めるためには、継続して軽い運動を行い筋肉量を維持・増進するように心がけましょう。「基礎代謝」高めつつ、体脂肪率を落して行くことで理想の体に近づき、「体年齢」も若くなっていきます。 ◆利用上の注意◆ 「体年齢」は統計データをもとに、弊社が独自の判定方法によって算出しています。本アプリにおいて表示される「体年齢」はあくまで健康の「目安」として認識し、ご活用ください。 「体年齢」は測定時間や水分の補給時間によって変化しやすい数値になります。「体年齢」が実年齢を上回った等で過度に数値を意識し、急に激しい運動に取り組むことは体を壊しかねませんので、くれぐれもご注意ください。 本アプリの利用およびダイエットの実施は、いずれも自己責任で行うものとします。本アプリを利用したダイエットにおいてトラブルが発生した場合でも、株式会社C2ではその賠償の責任を一切負わないものとします。 過度なダイエットは控えていただいた上で、ダイエット中に体の異変を感じたときは、直ちに医師にご相談ください。 ◆月額課金方法◆ 月額課金をしていただきますと、便利機能が開放されます。 課金方法はGoogle Playから『ポケットメディカアプリ』をダウンロードしていただき、アプリ内課金で『月額課金』を購入していただきます。 『ポケットメディカアプリ』で『月額課金』を購入していただきますと『家庭の医学forポケットメディカ』『処方薬事典forポケットメディカ』『アンチエイジング＋ダイエットforポケットメディカ』の便利機能が同時に開放されます。 サービスの詳細は、アプリ版ポケットメディカのwebページ（ http://pocketmedica.jp/pocket_all_app.html ）をご覧ください。 ◇◆アプリの権限について◆◇ 「ネットワーク通信」 起動画面で他のおすすめアプリを紹介するために利用しています。
release_text: ver3.2 ・体年齢の計算ロジックを修正しました。

description: Have you ever ran into a situation in which you were unable to use verbal communication but needed to pass an information to somebody as fast as possible? Have you ever felt your gestures are not good enough to show your message? Now Screen Message app comes to help you! You can easily use your mobile device to write a short text that will show up on screen with biggest possible font size, so person you need to communicate with should read it without any problems from any reasonable distance! Imagine you're sitting in a bus waiting for a green light and through the window you see your friend in his car. Want to ask him if he wants to play soccer today? Just write "Soccer?" and show it to him. You're working in open space office without Internet connection and want to go for a coffee with your buddy from other side of office? description: This app is meant to help those in Gymnastics do there Stretches with out the need to keep look at the clock just pick the preset second intervals 30sec, 45sec, 60sec, 90sec, 120sec, 180sec and the alarm will sound when the time has passed.This make it easier for you to focus on the stretch so you can get the most out of it and the best part is that this app is FREE!! -- -- Static Stretching for Flexibility: Static flexibility stretching is when a gymnast holds a stretching position for a certain period of time. An example of a static stretch is sitting in the splits. There are three types of splits that a gymnast must be able to perform. They are the right leg forward splits, left leg forward splits, and middle, also known as straddle splits. As a gymnast advances from level to level, gymnasts can extend their splits past a flat level, which requires even greater flexibility. Dynamic Stretching for Flexibility: Dynamic flexibility stretching is when a gymnast utilizes swinging movements of the arms and legs to increase flexibility and improve their range of motion. Examples of dynamic flexibility stretching are split kicks, leading splits, and scales. When a gymnast puts on the Myosource Lower Body Kinetic Bands, they allow dynamic flexibility moves and skills to be performed by adding resistance to build strength while increasing flexibility. The bands do not restrict movements and are hands free for performing gymnastics tumbling skills and flexibility moves. Acrobat and tumbling skills in gymnastics require shoulder and arm flexibility. If a gymnast’s shoulders are not flexible enough to rotate and roll it will be impossible to tumble with any explosiveness or proper technique to score high. Gymnasts must also remember that flexibility on both sides of the body must be trained to become equally flexible to perform gymnastic event routines explosively.

description: Do you need access to a skill quickly? With this app you will quickly get a random distress tolerance skill to do. An optional module for validation has been added as desired by participants. The application is designed in collaboration with the participants in DBT treatment. Dbt112 is available in Swedish, English, German and Hebrew. Want to help translate into other languages? Please e-mail! Dbt112 can never replace professional help, but can serve as a tool for DBT training. Encountering a tornado, hurricane, wildfire, flood or earthquake make sure you download the Red Cross app of the same name for in depth information and alert notifications ( http://www.redcross.org/mobile) . Red Cross Shelter also lets you immediately notify friends and family that you are safe during times of disaster by quickly posting your message on: Twitter, Facebook, Text, and Email. - View open Red Cross location-based shelters. - Monitor real-time, localized & national, Red Cross Disaster Newsroom feeds and alerts with videos, photos, and stories to keep you informed of disasters of all kinds, including hurricanes, tornadoes, floods, earthquakes, fire and more. - During a disaster - easily let friends and family know you’re okay with a customizable “I’m Safe” notification sharable through social media, text, and email. description: Find the differences: The Little Mermaid This game is all about the Little Mermaid. A little mermaid swims to the surface of the sea with her fish friends, even though her father told her not to. She sees a ship floating on the water, with a young prince on board. She falls in love with the prince instantly. The ship gets in trouble in a storm, and the prince end up in the water. The little mermaid saves him from the waves, and brings him to land. When her father discovers that the little mermaid fell in love with a human he gets so angry he smashes her stuff. The little mermaid is sad and angry, she decides to visit the sea witch. The witch changes her into a human, but in return takes her voice. The little mermaid needs to get kissed by her prince within 3 days, or else she will become a mermaid again! When the mermaid washes ashore in her human form, the prince finds her, but he doesn't recognise her! Now she has to do her best to make him fall in love with her, and she succeeds! But the witch doesn't like where that is going, so she transforms herself into a beautiful human woman. She puts a spell on the prince, and he becomes so in love with the witch that he wants to marry her within just a day! The prince and the witch are getting married on a ship. All the animals from the sea help the little mermaid by buying her time, they create such a chaos that the witch's magic shell falls to the ground and breaks. The little mermaid regains her voice! Right when the prince wants to kiss the little mermaid, the sun sets. The little mermaid transforms back to her original form, the sea witch takes her prisoner. Luckily, the father of the little mermaid finds out just in time. He captures the sea witch and gives the Little Mermaid her legs back, so she can marry the prince. They lived happily ever after! In this game you will get to know the whole story. Find the difference between the pictures and try to beat the high score! To play on your pc or laptop go to: http://www.mary.com/find-the-differences-the-little-mermaid.html

description: Language-learning app for preschoolers Make language come to life! This intuitive and colorful app for preschoolers is easy to understand through the combination of image and sound. Educational studies have shown that children of a young age are highly receptive to language learning and articulative expression. With LinguPinguin, curious children encounter a playful approach to learning foreign languages. Nine different visual worlds and a total of ninety funny objects are made available to explore. When tapped, each object comes to life with hilarious animated movements and sounds revealing the spoken word for the object in the native tongue or chosen foreign language. A creative language-learning adventure! Themes are: animals, transportation, food, body, farm, toys, nature, clothes, and apartment. NEW: THE LINGUPINGUIN QUIZ In the LinguPinguin Quiz all words are queried that were learned in the game. Up to 8 points can be collected. Depending on the result you will be rewarded with a funny animation. The LINGUPINGUIN QUIZ makes learning fun! Also for adult travelers, tourists or anyone interested in languages, LinguPinguin is an amusing tool to get in touch with a foreign language. The appealing illustrations and quality animations offered in this app were executed by the Elevision team, who offers other/more educational children apps in the App Store: "BioMio - My Firs Biology App", "PumiLumi - A Hide-And-Seek Adventure" and "MooPuu - The Animated Monster Puzzle" Visit LinguPinguin on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/lingupinguin
